1.content: Which region would your person of choice be from?
1.title: The Beginning

11.content:
Which Kanto official will you choose?

(Koga is considered the Elite Four for Johto, not the sixth Gym Leader for Kanto; check the Johto section for him.
Blue is considered the Champion, not the eighth Gym Leader in the Johto games.
Bruno is considered the Elite Four for Kanto, not the Elite Four for Johto.
Lance is considered the Champion for Johto, not the Elite Four for Kanto; check the Johto section for him.)
11.title: Kanto

111.content: Brock, Misty, or Lt. Surge?
111.title: Brock / Misty / Lt. Surge

1111.content: Stick with Brock or one of his family?
1111.title: Brock

choices: The thunderous splashing of a giant swimming in the pool
The booming slaps of a giant's sandals coming closer
The heavy snoring of a giant dreaming peacefully
1112.content:
A splashing noise in the distance interrupts your sleep. Still in a daze, you try to return back to peaceful oblivion...

Wait a minute, what's splashing? And are you sleeping on tile?

Forcing yourself awake, your vision is rudely welcomed by a set of huge, blinding lights on an infinitely tall ceiling. Where are you? What's going on? As your vision adjusts, you appear to be in a huge...indoor pool? Stretching out endlessly before you is a seemingly endless sea, with massive floating dividers bobbing up and down. Peering to the left and right, you make out more standard pool accessories...life savers, parasols...all seemingly built for giants in mind. As you stand up on one of the blue tiles you look behind you, only to see a lifeguard seat looming above you like the tower of babel. Could there actually be something large enough to use all this?

You don't have to wonder for long, as your train of thought is interrupted by-
1112.title: Misty, the Tomboyish Mermaid

choices: Find another way to get her attention.
11121.content:
There's a thunderous splashing from the pool, and as you turn to look, you can see why - there's an enormous girl swimming in the lake-sized pool. As she performs backstrokes from one end to the other, you can see her dripping-wet orange hair, her bright cerulean eyes, and glimpses of her white-and-blue swimsuit. She traverses around the pool with the sort of agility and grace that tells you that she knows exactly what she's doing. Given that the rest of the pool - and the whole building, for that matter - seems to be empty, you assume that she must be the owner. Does that mean she knows what happened to you...?

You call out from the edge of the pool for her attention, but to no avail, as your small voice can't carry over that distance (and even if it could, the loud lapping of the water would surely drown it out.) She occasionally has to stop for a breather or for a stretch near the edge of the pool before she practices another swimming technique, so you could conceivably reach her if you waited for the right time and swam out to her, but given how deep the water is, it's far from a foolproof plan. Then again, you're not sure what else you could try to make her notice you...
11121.title: Giantess in the Pool

111211.content:
As the giant begins swimming back towards your end of the pool again, you brace yourself for what you're about to do. You're a decent swimmer and can always float if it comes down to it, this may be your best bet of being spotted. You wait with baited breath as her toned arms churn through the water like windmills, and sure enough they stop, but with a graceful movement she turns around and you see her legs pushing her away as she swims the opposite direction, causing you to step back as huge droplets of water rain down towards you with each of her kicks. You wait for her as she reaches the other end of the pool, catching another glimpse of her determined face as she comes back around a second time...and then as she reaches your end she stops suddenly, stretching in the water, now's your chance!

You leap off the edge of the pool and into the water, plunging into the drink. Taking a gasp of air as you surface, you begin swimming towards the stationary giant, her orange hair like a beacon. Not wasting any time, you cry out to her as you swim forward, hoping against hope that you'll catch her ear before she begins swimming away again. The water begins to ripple as she...
111211.title: Diving in the deep end

choices: Try and hop onto her foot as she walks past.
Just stay out of harm's way.
11122.content:
The distinctive slapping of sandals on wet tiles is usually easy enough to hear, but as you find the source of the noise, you notice how it's even more distinct when the sandals in question are the size of cars. As a matter of fact, the feet occupying them are just as large, along with the legs they're attached to stretching up like literal moving towers. Your eyes continue to trail up as this giant approaches from afar, in a fashionable blue swimsuit and with orange hair that's glistening wet from her most recent adventure in the pool. Those cerulean eyes of her are focused on the phone in her hand, and not on the ground, where you are unfortunately placed.

With each booming step she takes towards, you debate what to do - at her size, she could very easily be dangerous, especially if she thought you were a bug or something. Then again, you don't much enjoy the idea of just scrounging around the pool alone like some wild animal. You are safely away from the path of her footfalls, but if you were going to stay with her and hope to grab her attention, you'd have to hop onto one of her feet as she passed. Is it worth the risk...?
11122.title: Here Comes Misty

choices: Yes!  She's stopping to take a look at you.
No!  She just got a phone call!
111221.content:
As your time to make a decision rapidly shrinks with each resounding footstep, you impulsively decide that you have to get this giant's attention one way or another, it may be your only way to figure out what's going on! Recklessly rushing into the woman's path as the slaps of her sandals begin to grow deafening. You break out into a cold sweat as the giant's feet are nearly upon you! As her right foot touches down a bit in front of you, you bolt towards it as fast as you can manage, leaping towards the relative salvation of her toes.

Immediately you grip onto the white strap just above her toes, your legs scrambling to find safe footing, successfully pulling them between her index and middle toes. Your clothes are instantly soaked by her wet skin, and you find yourself hurled face first against the top of her foot. The huge slapping sound is now all you can hear, and as you look up to try and figure out if she's noticed you, you're disappointed to find that she's still absorbed in her phone, the world whizzing by at a ridiculous speed overhead.

Your arms begin to ache as they desperately hang onto the strap above your head, and you feel your heart skip a beat as with another mighty step the giant foot slams onto the ground, bumping you badly enough that you slip, quickly grabbing onto the gap between her big and index toes, now lying somewhat awkwardly wrapped like a discount toering.

The relatively huge woman unconciously clenches her toes in response, causing you to struggle helplessly. You just want this to be over, and as if the Heavens are listening, suddenly the rumbling ends as the giant mercifully stops walking; has she noticed you yet?
111221.title: Ignoring Pool Safety

11123.content:
You bolted your head back to figure out, 'what was that' and, 'where did that noise come from?' You didn't have to search long because you saw a gigantic lounge chair, which is also where the noise is coming from. You approached the chair and began your ascent. You eventually reached to top and found out who made that noise, it was Misty, sleeping. I bet she wouldn't mind if you started to "Set Sail." In front of you was her feet. They still were dripping water, so Misty must have gotten out earlier.

You could climb her feet or you could move towards her pants.
11123.title: The Titanic drifts...

1113.content:
You woke up on a pale yellow floor. The smooth surface went on for miles and altered you to your new size.

A sudden booming sound filled your ears as well as make the ground shake. Looking behind your back, the feeling of shock doubled.

Stomping towards your direction was a tall man with spiky blond hair, sunglasses,and dog tags. He had on a green tank top that let his pecs and large biceps show, his toned legs were clothed in camo pants. Finally he had black boots that stomped the ground hard.

You watched in awe as the giant approached and towered over you. The boot sole passed over your head carrying the strong body, as the blond titan's muscled back became visible along with his firm butt. The giant soon stood on a stage slightly ahead, pushing his shades up and folding his strong arms over his chest.

Gulping, you decided to ask for help from the powerful looking man. Walking up to the stage and looking above at the looming body, you called out as loud as you could. It seem to work as the giant looked over his large arms down at you, the striking gaze made you shiver slightly.

But what did the giant see?
1113.title: Lt. Surge

choices: She heard you. She looks down and sees... a tiny person?
She heard you. She looks down and sees... a bug!
She didn't hear you. She seems very tired.
1121.content:
You wake up to the smell of fresh flowers. It's very pleasant but also very confusing. You open your eyes and see that you are face down in the dirt. You get up, rubbing the dirt off of your face and look around, realising where you are. There are certainly flowers, but these flowers are huge. There are tulips and roses and marigolds and daffodils and so many other vibrant flowers, ranging from white to red to gold to blue and so many other vibrant shades, but man are they huge. You aren't even as high as the stems, and you are lost in a field of these giant flowers. This is very unusual and frightening, and you can't imagine it getting any more unusual and frightening.

Wait, are the flowers big or are you...?

The ground trembles and the flowers shakes a little from the vibrations. You nearly lose your footing and trip as the tremors increase, growing closer in a steady rythym. They're almost like... footsteps? Terrified at the idea that you might be right, you hide amongst the thickest patch of flowers you can find and peek out through the petals. The footsteps grow and grow before they stop and a shadow blots out the giant's garden. The giant in question towers above you with her titanic size. She is garbed in a long yellow kimono with a maple leaf pattern around the hem, which ends just above her socked feet in traditional geta footwear. Looking higher and higher, you can make out her face, with her short black hair, her red headband and her calm brown eyes.

She kneels down, humming to herself and presumably unaware of your presence. She appears to be tending to her garden happily. You're not sure what to do in the presence of the giant. She seems gentle and kind, but you have no idea how she might react if she sees you or if she'll be kinder to her plants than you. As you try and decide on what to do, the heavy pollen of the vast array of flowers gets to you and you let out a loud sneeze. The giant stops for a second and you hold your breath.
1121.title: Erika: The Nature Princess

choices: "...I'll bring you to my ear so I can hear you."
"...I need to come up with a suitable punishment."
11211.content:
Maybe she didn't hear you...

"Who's there?"

Oh well...

The giant looks over shoulder searching for the source of the sneeze she just heard. If the somewhat annoyed look on her face is any indication, you probably don't want her to find you. Do you run for cover? If you do, the movement might catch her eye. But if you don't, and just stand here in the open...

"Aha! There you are!"

...that'll happen. Before your brain can finally send signals to your legs to move, a giant hand engulfs you. You find yourself unable to fight against the giant fingers, calloused from years of garden tending, yet still somewhat soft. Your sense of gravity leaves you as you're lifted- too quickly for your comfort- to the giant woman's face, her scrutinizing eyes filling your vision.

"Sigh... another peeping tom. When will the men of this town learn?"

"Wait..." you say, "I'm not a peeping tom! I don't even know where I am!"

"Though I'm curious how you got to be so small. That is... considerably more effort than the local perverts usually go to."

"I said I'm not a peeping tom!" you yell. You notice her ears perking. Now that you're yelling, it seems that your captor... well, she still can't quite hear what you're saying, but she can tell that you're at least trying to speak.

"Sorry, little thing. I can't quite hear you. Hang on..."
11211.title: Peeping Tom

choices: "...help me out around the Gym. Pay off your debts, so to speak."
"...worship me, little one. Maybe you'll appreciate women a bit more, then."
112112.content:
"Sorry, little thing. I can't quite hear you. Hang on... I need to come up with a suitable punishment."

What? You aren't okay with that. You aren't okay with that at all. You shout out to your jaded giant captor, trying to tell that it's all a huge misunderstanding (or at the very least, it's all just a coincidence) but like she said, the giantess can't quite hear you. Her eyes remain scrutinizing on your tiny form and, along with the ever-so-slight blush on her cheeks, she's clearly embarrassed by your 'peeping tom' antics. You can understand why she feels the need to punish you for your apparent intrusion, although you hold out hope that she's at least kind about it...

"Hm, I've thought of what you can do..." She says. "You can..."
112112.title: The Harsh Side of Erika

choices: Brew tea for all the members
1121121.content:
"Work? No! I need help, I-" you're interrupted as Erika's calloused thumb moves over your face, pressing down into your nose and silencing your voice. You desperately push against it, but her soft skin doesn't budge an inch.

"Now let's see, what's something a worker of your...stature can accomplish..." As Erika ponders how to use you, her thumb idly slides up and down your body, you quickly gasp in some air, but your relief is quickly replaced by a feeling like a brutal carpet burn as the immense digit scrapes against you.

"Aaaah! No! Nooo!" Despite your efforts to get her attention, Erika remains unconcerned with your cries, her face locked in a state of concentration. Suddenly her face lights up, and mercifully her thumb stops it's assault. You feel gravity shift again as she brings you in front of her face, her expression switching from one of triumph to a withering glare.

"Alright pervert! If you know what's good for you you'll be thankful for this chance to work off your debt to society! Today you're going to help me..."
1121121.title: First day on the job

choices: Yes, and Erika is pleased with your work.
No - near the end of your work, you fall into one of the teacups!
11211211.content:
"Today, you're going to help me brew tea for all the members."

Despite your awkward position, you manage a sigh of relief. You were expecting something more humiliating or taxing, like painting all of their nails or being some sort of toy, but Erika has given you a rather respectable job. A pretty taxing one at your size, but still. Still caught between her thumb and finger, you are taken through the air, getting an eschewed and blurry look at the gigantic gym interior. You spot a bonsai tree, and one or two girls talking, but nothing of significance.

Before long, Erika drops you down on a small table, depositing you near several large pieces of china, from plates and cutlery to fine teacups. She begins to heat water and set up tea-drinking equipment immediately - she seems to take this seriously. She begins to recite several orders to you, pointing to different teacups in the process, which you now notice are all named - she seems to take this very seriously. Kay likes it as black as it can be, Bridget likes lots of sugar, Lori only drinks tea that's been stirred counter-clockwise... It's tough work, but you manage to fulfill your orders.

Is it a perfect performance?
11211211.title: Working at Celadon Gym

choices: "Let's hear what they have to say first."
"Tina, get out the polish and nail brushes!"
112112111.content:
Erika leaves to let her gym members know tea is ready as you heft a lump of sugar into one of the teacups and lift the spoon above your head to reach into the cup and stir the tea around. Your arms and back are exhausted but you muster the strength to go on, spurred by the fact that there is only one order left. As you run the process of brewing the tea to Erika's specifications, you lean in to stir the tea in the final cup. Far above you, you hear the sound of giant foot steps and women's laughter as the girls sit down at the table, Erika clears her throat as you stand in the shadows of the giant garden enthusiasts.

"Ladies, today I caught another peeping tom sneaking around the gym." The crowd groans, this is obviously not the first time.

"Did you get rid of the pervert!?" An angry growl is accompanied by a girl in a picnicker uniform's fist slamming down on the table, making you fall over.

"Calm down Tina, this pervert went through a lot of trouble, look down at the table."

As Erika finishes, the girls look down at the table, and sure enough, soon they're all staring at you. Their eyes wide as they process the tiny person on the table looking nervously up at them.

"Oh. My. GAWD! This is amazing! Is it real?" The giant blonde whose cup reads "Bridget" booms down excitedly, making you cringe from the shrill explosion of sound.

"Yes they're real, AND they brewed the tea you're all drinking. No rest for the wicked after all." Erika giggles slightly at her comment. Realizing you might be able to get help from one of these girls, who begin shouting up to them.

"I think it's trying to talk..." A purple haired trainer holding the "Mary" cup says as she looks at you quizically. Bridget simply rolls her eyes at her friend's comment.

"Like who cares? I was totally getting bored today, and since it's already working for us it can like give us an awesome pedicure while we have our tea."

All eyes, including yours, are on Erika as she prepares to speak.
112112111.title: A job well done?

1121121112.content:
"Tina, get out the polish and nail brushes!" Erika announces to the group of girls before her, and they seem to burst with joy over the notion. The girl in question, Tina, scurries off quickly to fetch the supplies, while you remain quiet amongst the giggling masses. While Erika seems to have softened due to your diligent duties, you imagine that they aren't over just yet, and you're going to be helping. You wait in silence while the giants wait for Tina to return, and while you wait, you spot one or two of the girls occasionally glancing at you with a mixture of expressions, ranging from apprehension to... interest.

Tina arrives back with the polish and nail brushes, and Erika's eyes light up with excitement. "Yes, this will make for an excellent..."
1121121112.title: "Tina, get out the polish and nail brushes!"

choices: No, during one girl's pedicure you make a mistake
11211211122.content:
"Yes, this will make for an excellent pedicure."

You gulp as Erika carefully slides off her sandals and takes off her thick socks. As she sits straight up again, she holds out her hand towards you, and without being told you nervously step on, bracing yourself as a sudden shift deposits you on the grass by the table, her other hand setting the supplies down next to you and her pale toes extended towards you.

Determined to make it out of this in one piece, you grab a cotton ball and approach Erika's right foot, jamming it between her little and ring toes. As you place the cotton balls in one by one your thankful that her feet smell faintly of floral perfume, Erika clearly puts a lot of effort into her hygiene! With the giant's toes properly seperated, you carefully unscrew a small bottle of red polish. Ugh! Whatever pleasant floral scents had lingered in the air are quickly replaced by the harsh smell of nail polish. Breathing through your mouth, you quickly dip the brush into the mixture and set to painting Erika's giant nails. As you diligently ensure an even coat you can make out the giggling chatter above you.

"If the little thing can do my nails like that I should have it do like, all my makeup!" Bridget said while looking down at you excitedly.

"I can think of a few more uses than makeup..." Lori winks down at you as she makes her ambiguous but chilling comment.

"Lori! As a lady you should be more reserved!" scolds Kay.

"I guess the little bug knows whose the boss now huh?" Mary jeers down at you.

"Yeah, US!" joins Tina.

Finally you finish up Erika's left pinkie toe. Erika finishes a sip of tea and then looks down at her freshly painted nails, admiring your craftsmanship.

"Good job little thing, keep this up and perhaps I'll let you go."

You practically leap for joy! But it's no time to celebrate, there's plenty of girls waiting for you to dazzle their waiting toes, are you going to be able to keep this up?
11211211122.title: Time for a Pedal-Cure!

112112111221.content:
It took you a long time doing all that work on your own, but you managed to pull it off without making a single mistake. When you were done, you put the brush back and looked at all the girls admiring the job you did for them.


Oh my gosh! I just can't believe how good my toenails look girls!" Bridget said as she began showing off her toes to the other girls.


"I know right? If the little pervert is this good at painting toenails, i can only imagine what else he'd be good at doing." Lori said as she winked at you, making you feel slightly unnerved at her comment.


"Lori! I swear the things that come out of your mouth sometimes..." Kay said as she has a look of disgust across her face.


"Still, he did do a good job. For a little..." Mary was saying as she started flexing her toes in your direction, only to be cut off by Tina before she could finish.


"Pervert!" Tina shouted as her feet kicked the table, shocking everyone as you found yourself sliding off the edge and into the shoes of...
112112111221.title: Yes, you finish up perfectly!

1121121112213.content: So who's shoe do you fall into?
1121121112213.title: Erika / Tina

choices: Very subtle, just the way Erika likes it!
112112112.content:
Erika leaves to let her gym members know tea is ready as you heft a lump of sugar into one of the teacups and lift the spoon above your head to reach into the cup and stir the tea around. Your arms and back are exhausted but you muster the strength to go on, spurred by the fact that there is only one order left. As you run the process of brewing the tea to Erika's specifications, you lean in to stir the tea in the final cup. But as you're doing so the spoon shifts in your grip and you lose your balance, tumbling head first into the hot tea! You flail in the tea, trying desperately to grasp the edge of the cup, but it's just out of your grasp! You close your eyes to avoid the burning sensation of the hot tea, screaming as your sense of reason is replaced by the overwhelming desire to somehow escape! Far above you, you hear the sound of giant foot steps and women's laughter as the girls sit down at the table. Erika let's out an annoyed huff as she notices you are nowhere to be seen, but kneels down to join her members as well.

As the tea cools slightly and your mind slowly begins to return to you, the taste of the tea dripping in your mouth registers with you, and you realize with a sudden chill that it's...
112112112.title: Private Tea Party

choices: Erika notices something is wrong and spots you.
Erika remains oblivious - in you go!
1121121121.content:
A very subtle blend with a slight floral scent? This is Erika's tea! Indeed, Erika has seated herself right next to the teacup, and she is focused on talking with her female friends. You are about to call out for her help, when her hand dips down and picks the teacup (and you) up into the air. The tea sloshes around you, dragging you underneath in the turbulence, and stifling your cries for aid. You kick your limbs frantically to break the surface, but the motions of Erika's hand keep you from getting your head above the 'waters' for more than a few splitseconds.

You then feel gravity take hold as the 'pool' tilts to its side, and you know that Erika is about to start drinking! Your head breaks the surface once more for just a small moment, giving you a grand view of Erika's mouth opening wide, completely unaware that she is about to swallow you down with her tea...
1121121121.title: In Erika's Tea

choices: ...laughs. "Ahahaha! Enthusiastic, aren't we? You're just adorable."
...scowls. "Ugh, you've ruined my tea now! I see I need a new punishment for you
11211211211.content:
Just as it seems that you're taking a one-way trip into Erika's mouth and down to her stomach, you call out for help and wave your arms and do just about anything and everything to get her attention from gentle gossip to your life-threatening situation. Thankfully, from the splashing and the shouting, her large eyes finally dart down to you, and she gasps in surprise.

Erika swiftly tilts the cup back to a level position (throwing you around in the hot liquid once more - you decide that you are sick of tea now) and then gazes down at you with the sort of expression you would expect someone to have if they found a tiny person swimming in their drink.

You open your mouth to thank her, but you are cut off when Erika...
11211211211.title: Who's Been Swimming in my Tea?

11211211212.content:
The array of chatter and gossip amongst the giant girls drowns out your drowning pleas - you are inevitably pushed in a waterfall of sweet-smelling tea into Erika's awaiting mouth. You try to grasp at her tongue or her teeth for any sort of precipice, but the fast-moving liquid carries you too quickly and, despite your best efforts, you are dragged down with the current in the darkness. Warm muscles squelch and stretch as they knead you down her throat and straight down into her stomach...

Erika pauses, wondering why the tea tasted a little strange all of a sudden. She takes another sip and, finding it pleasant once more, carries on with her conversation, unaware of the tiny being trapped within her stomach...
11211211212.title: Swallowed by Erika

choices: Strong and bitter, for Kay's refined tongue!
1121121122.title: Second taste

choices: ...leans further down and pick you up gently.
...stands to her full height and prepares to stomp you out.
11212.content:
The giantess pauses and her eyes flicker around, even turning her head as she tries to find the source of the sneeze. For a moment, you think that you've escaped her attention, but sure enough, she eventually looks down and her eyes center on you. You continue to hold your breath, too frightened to react. Her eyes seem to light up as she notices you, but not with the shock you'd expect from seeing a tiny person. More like the mild surprise of noticing a bug...

Before you can muster the courage to move, the giantess moves her enormous body and...
11212.title: Erika's Intentions

choices: Yes, you manage to escape from Erika.
No, she manages to find and corner you.
112122.content:
Before you can muster the courage to move, the giantess moves her enormous body and stands to her full height, and as she raises one of her sandal-clad feet, you see that she is preparing to stomp you out! Thinking quickly, you sprint away and dive amongst the maze of grassblades and flowerstems around you, just as you hear a deafening thud and a rush of wind as the giant's stomp narrowly misses you.

"Ugh, foul little pest!" she says to herself. She seems to raise her foot again for another strike, but as you glance over your shoulder, you see her hesitating to do so. It seems that she lost track of where you are, and she doesn't want to risk harming her flowers with any misaimed steps. It's fortunate for you, but she isn't giving up easily, and carefully steps through the greenery while keeping her keen eyes scanning the ground for you.

You dodge and weave to try and lose the persistent giantess, but are you successful?
112122.title: Erika Hates Bugs!

1121222.content:
Try as you might, the jungle of grassblades is a maze, and your attempts to elude the angry garden-keeper giantess are not successful. As you scramble around to find another tulip or rose to hide under, and you unluckily find yourself in a patch with little to no flowers nearby, the kimono-clad giant sweeps close to intercept you. You trip and fall in the garden dirt, just as Erika slams one of her feet down in front of you with a tremendous thud. Her eyes skim across the ground for the 'foul little pest' and they quickly lock onto you.

"Aha! There you are!"

You gulp, and have no time to react as Erika swiftly positions her other foot high above you. You are treated to a brief glimpse beneath her kimono before the bottom of her dirty sandal fills your vision as it slams down on top of you, squashing you instantly against the thick soil and her immense force.

Erika lifts to ensure that the 'annoying little bug' is disposed of, before she returns to tending her garden, humming a merry little tune to herself.
1121222.title: The Bottom of Erika's Sandal

choices: ...take a risk and jump onto her foot.
...play it safe and let her leave.
11213.content:
The giantess merely shrugs and returns to her gardening, taking a moment to rub one of her eyes. On closer inspection, you notice the slouch in her posture and the vacancy in her eyes and guess that she's tired - it's either very early or very late. Your theory is confirmed as she uses her other hand to cover her mouth as she yawns. The giantess hoists up a large device, which you recognize as a watering can, and you quickly retreat far away from the water - at your current size, a few drops could easily knock you out (or at the very least, they'd soak you and it'd be kind of annoying.) You try to think of what to do while the giant continues her duties, unaware of your presence.

Just when you're starting to formulate, the giantess gives a smile, taking some pride in her work, and begins to stand up. You can tell she's about to move on, but you're not sure if that's a good thing. She might be your only hope at figuring out what's going on or getting any help, and you're not sure what else is in this garden. Then again, if she is the least bit surprised or disgusted to see you, she can kill you with barely any effort. If she's about to leave, you can easily jump on her foot and hold on for the ride - her sock looks very thick and you figure it'd be pretty easy to hold onto. As the giantess is about to walk away, you...
11213.title: Candid in the Garden

choices: ...her private chambers, to catch some sleep.
...her tea table, to socialize with some friends.
112131.content:
As a last ditch effort to remain close to the giant, you take a sudden sprint forward and leap onto her foot. You are met with a warm woolen surface - the white sock of her geta footwear. The thick material is easy to get a grip on, although it's also too thick for the giant to notice your presence. At any rate, you quickly find the red strap and hold onto it for dear life, just as the giantess begins her walk.

Her foot assails into the air and then slams back down to earth, even as she tries to make slow and careful movements around her flower garden, and you feel yourself being hurtled with each step. It's dizzying to say the least, but your arms remain tightly locked onto the strap and your body remains clinging to the woolen sock as much as possible. Eventually, through the enormous forest of flowers, you can determine the giant's intended destination. She is heading towards...
112131.title: Riding with Erika

choices: ...it's a Celadon Gym trainer - one of the Beauties.
...it's a challenger from Pallet Town - Leaf.
112132.content:
You decide to let the giantess pass by, and sure enough, after she finishes watering her plants, she stands tall and walks away. Left alone in the garden, you watch her leave before trying to decide what to do next. You venture through the forest of grassblades and flowerstems, walking cautiously through the dirt, unsure of what direction to choose (though you figure that any direction is better than just waiting here to get stepped on, of course.)

After a short while of getting nowhere, you begin to wonder if letting the giantess from earlier leave without you was such a wise idea. However, by a stroke of luck (or misfortune) you feel the earth tremble slightly to a rhythm, as another giantess approaches. You swiftly find a good hiding spot out of the way amongst the foliage, before staring out to see who the new arrival is...
112132.title: A New Arrival in Celadon Gym

choices: ...amazement. She thinks you're a little person.
1121322.content:
The newest giant to stomp their way into this strange place is a young girl. The most distinct feature is her wide-brimmed white hat, which sits nicely on her long brown hair. The rest of her attire is the cyan top, the red skirt, and the cyan socks with white-and-red sneakers. A yellow bag sits comfortable over her shoulder, and a small badge-like device is nestled on her chest.

The girl walks into the gym, her shoes plodding down through the dirt and the grass. The simple act of walking is, to your perspective, a pair of rubbery weights smashing through the landscape with ease. You make sure to stay clear of her path as she walks around, examining her device and looking around for someone.

You're still unsure if leaving Erika earlier was the smartest decision, and now that you're here with another chance for getting contact with someone - someone who could crush you between their fingers, but someone nonetheless - you feel like you shouldn't let this second chance pass you by...

It seems you don't get a chance as the giantess, with her keen brown eyes, suddenly notices you amongst the grassblades (although how she did was quite amazing - you're not exactly easy to spot.) She reacts with...
1121322.title: That's a Big Leaf...

1122.content: Your head is practically swimming as you find yourself returning to the waking world. Were you asleep? Unconscious? Knocked out? Whatever the case, it doesn't seem to matter, as you slowly regain control of your limbs and push yourself up to your feet. Groaning with lethargy, you look around to try and figure out where you are. You find yourself frozen in fear as you are now in...
1122.title: Janine, the Poisonous Ninja Master

choices: Nothing but silence. Time to go exploring.
"Ahahaha!" a female voice replies. "You're awake! Now the trial can begin!"
11223.content:
It's just pitch blackness, all around you. You can't tell anything about your surroundings - it could be a stadium or a closet for all you know. You tap your foot on the ground, and it feels and sounds like a smooth wooden surface, but that's all you can figure out. Lost and without any better ideas, you call out into the darkness for some help (and note to yourself that it doesn't echo and merely fades away into the distance - it seems wherever you are, it's very big.)

You listen intently for a response...
11223.title: Left in the Dark

112232.content:
"Ahahaha!" A female voice replies. "You're awake! Now the trial can begin!"

The voice alarms you as you turn around, trying to get a sense of which direction it came from (and why it seems so loud and booming...) You call out, demanding to know where you are and what they mean by a 'trial'...

"It means it's time to test your skills, of course!"

You spin around again, still unsure of where the speaker. It feels like their voice is all around you, reverberating off the walls of... wherever you are. You continue to protest against this random kidnapping and testing you've been placed under.

"These trials should be a lot of fun for you!"

The speaker either cannot hear you or simply doesn't care about what you have to say.

"Are you ready...?"

You're really not.

"HIYA!"

Suddenly, the faintest of light appears overhead, giving you just enough illumination to see something approaching you swiftly through the darkness. It's...
112232.title: Janine's 'Training'

choices: Stay still and accept your fate. Maybe she'll go easy on you?
Punch her in the eye - you're not afraid!
1123.content:
You wake up in an ordinary room, or at least what seems to be an ordinary room. It's not yours, though, so you are still frightened and confused as to where you are. You get out of the bed, which feels very stiff and has no covers, and look around. There is the typical furniture, like a dresser and a wardrobe, and when you open them you find clothes (albeit they look and feel very amateur.) Deciding to look for more clues, you head out into the landing. It is a very narrow corridor, but it leads to another bedroom. It is practically identical to the last one you woke up in, but this one contains a large wooden sculpture of a man, standing in the corner with a blank eerie stare. It freaks you out a little and you leave, going downstairs. There is a living room, complete with more tacky fragile-looking furniture like a sofa and a table, and another large wooden mannequin - this one being a young boy. You check the other room and find that it's a kitchen. When you examine the cooker and the fridge more closely, you find that they are fake and there are no leads or lights on them. In fact, the food inside the fridge is also fake. The model of the woman also sits in the corner, staring at you.

It's almost like this whole place is a dollhouse or something.

"Well well," a powerful booming voice echos not just through the house, but through your own head, like it's coming through your mind. "Look who's awake."

You dart around, trying to find the source of the voice, and you find it. The window is now occupied with an enormous red eyeball, which blinks and squints at you.

It goes without saying that you are just about ready to freak out and faint on the spot, because you are now in a dollhouse and someone is outside looking in - and they do not look happy. You are just about to go through with the 'freak out and faint' plan when you feel the house itself shake and quake, making you lose your footing and trip. What on Earth can you do?! The rational part of you is saying that there's no point and you might as well be obedient to this giant woman - she might be easy on you if you're no trouble - but the more frightened part of you is saying that you should run and hide somewhere, or maybe you could even take a chance and run over and punch her in that huge blinking eye of hers.

You can feel the house shake more and more as she fiddles with the locks. You make your decision.
1123.title: Sabrina: The Psychic Mistress

11231.content:
You decide that whatever strange nightmare you're in, you're not the one of control - you decide to stay put and do whatever she wants you to do. The red eye scrutunizes you more, interested in your obedience, before the house itself shakes and crashes around you, tripping you to the floor. You realise that it's simply the giant opening the house out. By the time you blink and get yourself back to your feet, the house has been completely split in half, showing off the world outside. It's a toy town, complete with other dollhouses, a road mat, toy cars, fake trees, and more model citizens who all seem to be staring straight at you. It's a playset and you're one of your toys.

You trip again as the giant easily flips your entire world around, turning the house around to face her. You recover again and look up, inching back in fright as the giantess stares down at you, her enormous face moving in to examine her new toy. She is a young adult woman, with thick black hair and strong red eyes that are even more disconcerting as the eyes of the fake people - you can even see yourself reflected in them. The giant woman looks down on you with an emotionless face for a moment as you wait and hope that submitting was what she wanted. Her stoic lips slowly but surely curve into a smile of...
11231.title: Resistance is Futile

112311.content:
"Interesting. You're the first one to accept your master. All the others protested, sometimes running to hide, sometimes attacking me." Sabrina's smile curves just a little more with a sadistic streak. "They regretted that. You're a smart one."

You try your best to keep a brave face and nod, wondering what "the others" are. Did she have other tiny people before you?

Without asking, she lowers her hand and picks you up, wrapping her firm fingers around your body and squeezing you as she tightens her hold. It hurts but you still manage to hide your fear and discomfort. She raises her catch, examining you closer with those eerie red eyes of hers. You squirm in her grip, and for a second her smile disappears. You immediately stop, and the smile reappears like a magic trick.

"How obedient." She continues to smile at you, but it's hard to tell the nature of her lips - it could be genuine or it could be fake. "You accept me as your master, don't you?"

You nod as fast as humanly possible. Sabrina gives a quiet laugh. "You'll make a wonderful..."
112311.title: This Pleases Sabrina

choices: "I want you to entertain me. Let's play a game."
"I want you to make yourself useful. Massage me."
1123112.content:
"...toy."

You don't like the sound of that, but you're certainly not in a position to argue with Sabrina when she could pull you limb from limb. You just keep nodding.

"Now then, my little toy..." Sabrina says, her voice still managing to find new ways to send shivers down your spine. "What should we do first?" She mockingly places a finger on her lip in mock thought (which actually makes you realize you're just about the right size to be eaten if you make her mad...)

Sabrina's red eyes light up and you gulp. She's got something in mind.
1123112.title: A New Toy

choices: "...if I can make you even smaller."
11231121.content:
Sabrina's lips curl into a devious smile.

"I want you to entertain me. Let's play a game."

You gulp, and hesitantly ask what kind of game she had in mind. The giantess puts a finger to her lips as she considers her options.

"Well, it's been a while since I shrank someone," - that's one mystery solved at least - "So I would like to test your durability, and see how sturdy my toys are for the future. A good amount of pressure should suffice..." You glance down and see Sabrina already shifting one of her feet, clearly eager to test just how much weight you can withstand. Of course, she wouldn't willingly try to crush one of her own toys, so it wouldn't be lethal... Hopefully...

"Then again, I could just experiment with my powers more. Perhaps I could try returning you to normal size to see if I can reverse the process..." Your eyes light up in anticipation, only for Sabrina to chuckle, obviously having no intentions of doing such a thing. "Or perhaps I could see just how small I can make you..."

You briefly imagine being even smaller than you are, and consider just how powerful Sabrina might be. Could she make you the size of a speck? A germ? Even smaller than that?!

Sabrina bares her teeth. "I've decided. Let's see..."
11231121.title: Sabrina's Games

112311211.content:
"...how much pressure you can take."

You really don't like the sound of that, but when you are trapped in the fist of a malicious giantess, you don't believe now is the best time to air your concerns with her. Her red eyes even seem to flash for a moment, as if she's daring you to do so. You hold your tongue.

"Let's begin, then."

You see the giant raise her other hand and snap her fingers. In a blur of purple light and sudden noise, you find yourself falling freely through the air, and then all of a sudden, it stops. You groan from the disorienting experience of what you assume was a teleportation, and then notice that you are lying on the ground. It feels especially soft and cushiony - it must be a mat or a chair seat or something similar.

As that thought crosses your mind, your suspicions are confirmed and you feel your heart stop as you look above and see...
112311211.title: Pressure Testing with Sabrina

choices: "Worship my feet as if they were sacred."
1123112112.content:
You didn't even have time to panic before Sabrina's colossal backside was pressing all of the giantess' weight down on you. The cushion of Sabrina's throne and the softness of her own posterior created a nonlethal, but highly uncomfortable prison of denim and flesh. Distantly, from way above you, you could hear Sabrina's voice, muffled by the constricting binds of her booty.

"Try not to die down there, we have so many more games to play.

She followed the statement with a quiet chuckle, causing her body to shake gently, grinding you further into the massive butt. You tried to yell, but found your lungs had barely any room to expand under Sabrina's weight. Immobile and nearly suffocating, you resigned to your fate underneath Sabrina and began the long, arduous wait for this torment to end. Far above you, your captress had pulled a book from a nearby bookcase, and was reading quietly, feeling you struggle under her might and loving every moment.

An hour later, and your torture was still continuing. You considered if Sabrina might simply forget about you, but the odd giggle as you tried fruitlessly to resist confirmed otherwise. Your body was sore all over, and breathing the stale air underneath Sabrina's rump was not getting any easier. You knew if this kept up much longer, you rant he risk of suffocating to death. As if hearing that thought, Sabrina suddenly burst out into hearty laughter. She spoke down to you again.

"Breathing should be the least of your worries, bug. I could increase the pressure and kill you whenever I desire. From now on, you live only because I will it.

At that, Sabrina made a show of force and increased the pressure on you, as she said. It felt as if you just had a mountain dropped on you, Sabrina's ample backside pressed harder and harder down on you, cutting off your breathing and nearly breaking your bones. You sank deeper and deeper into the cushion beneath you and the flesh of the behind above you, You heard Sabrina's voice again, but this time the words seemed to directly enter your mind not through your ears. She was contacting you telepathically this time.

"I own you now." Was all she said.

Her point made clear, you rapidly felt the massive weight upon you dissipate, as Sabrina stood back up to her full height. The psychic woman gave an about-face and turned to face you. She glared down at you from high above like a goddess, and once more, spoke down to you.

"This game is over, let's try something different.

Again, you felt an unseen force take hold of you. Sabrina telekinetically lifted you off the seat of her throne and carried you back down to the floor, placing you between her feet. The massive pink monoliths on both sides of you moved with grace unthinkable for something so big. Try as you might to run, you were too awe stricken by Sabrina's movements to do so much as budge an inch. Sabrina sat back down in her throne, and one at a time, removed her pink shoes and socks to reveal her gigantic feet. With a big toe, Sabrina pinned you to the floor, eliminating what little chance of escape you may have had.

"Your goddess demands tribute, plaything." Sabrina decreed. Her next command would come as a shock to you.
1123112112.title: That's No Moon

112311212.content:
Your blood runs cold at her statement, you'd honestly feel safer with the durability test. Sure it would hurt but who knows how small she's going to make you, you're just getting used to this already miniscule size. You don't want to be seeing the world through the eyes of a dust mite. Noticing your fear Sabrina smirks.

She lowers the fist holding you down to the floor of the playset. The fleshy cocoon opens and you land on the plastic street. Luckily the fall was only about a foot or two off the ground from your perspective so you could land right on your feet with no problems. You look around and see Sabrina's other hand grabbing something in the play set. The hand then appears beside you and sets what it grabbed right next to you. As her hand retreats you find out that it's one of the "inhabitants" of this town. The sculpture is of a women with red hair and green eyes. She seemed to be wearing a pink dress and high heels. There seemed to be an awful lot of detail on these models, it kinda freaked you out.

Sabrina's chuckling knocked you out of your thoughts. "Perfect." her stoic voice booms from above. You try to look over at her but something is keeping your head from moving.

"Don't worry about me, just keep looking at her. I want you to feel how small I'm about to make you. You may be looking at her eyes now but soon you'll be looking at her...well I don't want to spoil the surprise." Sabrina explains with an almost sadistic glee. You couldn't see her face but you could just tell that she was grinning from ear to ear.

Suddenly your vision is hazy, you could barely make anything out. Your entire body was in pain, like someone was taking your body and compressing it. After a few seconds the pain subsides. Everything's still a little hazy so you blink a couple of times to regain your vision faster, you wish you hadn't

You...
112311212.title: "...if I can make you even smaller."

choices: ...you, as she picks you with her mind for a closer look!
...the doll, as it suddenly comes to life to 'play' with you!
1123112122.content:
You stare upwards and upwards, terrified to find that the doll is now towering above you, like a colorful Statue of Liberty. The plastic legs reach into the sky, whilst the doll's blank expressionless face is hidden behind its chest. At your eye level, you can't see above the sculpture's high heels, and at your tiny stature, even the most minuscule scuff and mark seems visible. You are overcome by the scale of everything around you - just how small are you right now?

A stiffness in your neck vanishes and you can feel your head move again.

"Hm, impressive," a voice echoes out. If it was loud before, it is practically reveberating through your very bones now. You can't stop yourself from trembling with each syllable - it's like the voice of a god. "Just as I intended."

You look to the heavens and, sure enough, you can see a single solitary eye staring down at you, as Sabrina is peering down to try and spot you. At your scale, her face consumes the whole sky - even as she blinks, you can see each individual eyelash, and you realize that even the tiniest inhale from her mouth or nostrils could be seriously dangerous to you (hence why she isn't looming that close.)

"Well then," she announces, before laughing mischievously and shaking you to your very core once again. "For my next trick..."

An aura of blue telekinetic energy surrounds...
1123112122.title: Microscopic Before Sabrina

choices: “That was a fun game, wasn't it?"
11231121221.content:
You suddenly feel lightweight as the blue aura surrounds you and lifts you in the air. A part of you feels relieved that you don't have to deal with that doll, but that relief is short lived when you find yourself staring at a huge face.

"Oh, my...you really are that small..."

Fearing what she has in store for you next, you brace for the worst.
11231121221.title: Out of One Fire and Into an Even Bigger One

112311212211.content:
Her voice is especially booming here. Though for some reason, any sense of hostility in it has strangely faded away, as if she was having a normal conversation with you.

She laughs once more, but this time it sounded a lot more jovial, as if she just heard a joke.

"You should've seen the look on your face when I called you a toy. To think that I actually had those dark impulses all those years ago!"

There was a long period of awkward silence as Sabrina studies your new...uh, state of life. Feeling a sudden wave of relief, you release all of your pent up anxiety in the form of...well....

"Oh dear, it appears I have taken it too far..."

Sabrina notices that you have curled up in a fetal position and more-or-less shut down. Feeling a bit of regret, she brings out an open hand and gently lowers you into her palm.

“I am rather used to dealing with a number of unruly trainers and knocking them down a few pegs. Even psychics can fall victim to autopilot, it seems.”

You were already surprised to see Sabrina change into what appears to be her true personality, so your emotions are tossed around even more when the now gentle giantess brings her hands to her chest. At least her heartbeat and stomach growling help calm you down a little bit.

“I’m so sorry I scared you. I hope you see it in yourself to forgive me.”

As nice as she seems to be now, you are still at her mercy. You try to open your mouth and say yes. Before you could actually talk, you suddenly feel faint, likely due to stress from the past hour. Before you completely pass out, you hear Sabrina’s voice again, this time soothing.

“That’s good to hear. Rest easy now, little one. Sweet dreams.”

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------

It felt like a few minutes. When you come to, you find yourself…
112311212211.title: Mountainous Mood Shift

choices: She’s at a restaurant, and doesn’t want to risk losing you.
She's interrupted by someone or something.
1123112122112.content:
It is very dark and moist. You would’ve mistaken it for a rainforest if the ground wasn’t so soft and squishy.

“Ah, you’re awake. Did you sleep well, little one?”

Sabrina’s booming voice surrounds you from all sides. Which means…

“I didn’t want to scare you by putting you in my mouth right away. Is my tongue comfortable enough for you?”

In all fairness, her tongue does feel like a giant mattress made out of slugs. You try to muster a “yes,” and a rumbling giggle tells you what she heard.

“Don’t worry. I can speak with you using my mind. I didn’t want to hurt your tiny ears with my voice…”

Thankful that Sabrina looks to be very kind now, you decide to briefly explore your new “haven.” Your eyes have adjusted to your surroundings, and you’re able to make out a multitude of pillars that make up her teeth. Her canines look especially intimidating, with the sharp, pointy ends that could probably take out an entire fleet of armed ships.

You take your eyes off of the living meat-grinders and decide to look back towards Sabrina’s throat. Her vast, bumpy water-bed sprawls far back like a savanna, almost pulsating with each breath the titan makes. Hanging over the yawning abyss is the inverted tower that is her uvula. You become weirdly fascinated with how it gently sways back and forth with each movement Sabrina makes.

“I’m glad you seem to be making yourself at home. I know it’s not the best place to be, but I don’t have any pockets and…”

Before Sabrina could finish that sentence, a low grumbling noise catches the attention of the both of you.

“Oh…my stomach must not appreciate me skipping lunch. Care to join me, little one? I promise I won’t digest you.”

You’re naturally worried about taking a boat ride in Sabrina’s dinner, so you ask if she can at least take you out of her mouth.
1123112122112.title: Psy-Chompers

11231121222.content:
You watch as the towering doll is consumed in a bright blue light. The light is so bright that you have to put a hand up to shield your face. After a few seconds the light wears off and what you saw surprised you. The doll looked exactly like it was before. Did Sabrina fail at...whatever she was planning on doing to the doll? Confused you turn around to look at Sabrina. God she was huge. The playset was at her waist level yet her face still seemed looked miles away. You thought she was large before but geez, both of her eyes are big enough to literally get lost in, her nose a large hill with two monstrous caverns, her lips as long as highways...wait a minute. Why is she smiling?

BOOM!


Your entire world shakes and you land on your face. You roll over onto your back and find yourself staring at a pink ceiling. What is this place? Did Sabrina use her powers on you again? You lay your palms on the ground and push yourself up to a sitting position. You look around more and realize that the "pink ceiling" is really more of an arch. You get to your feet and turn around. You find yourself staring a huge pink column. Suddenly the entire arch starts to lift off, once it's lifted off the ground it starts to move backward. Eventually light comes flooding in and you find yourself staring up at the ceiling of Sabrina's room. So you weren't teleported or anything like that. You look forward and are finally given your answer. You watch as the previously inanimate doll sets her foot down right next to her other one. "You're a little too small for me to play with you personally, so I used my little friend here to fix that problem. And just for the record, I didn't miss. I just don't want to break my new toy just yet." Sabrina's voice booms.

You look back up at the doll, its previously green eyes are now covered in some blue aura. A sign that Sabrina's working her magic on it. The doll's lifeless eyes stare at you as it takes a small step forward. You take a small step back. You look around for any good places to run and hide. You see that the dollhouse you had woken up in earlier was still open from when Sabrina grabbed you. At your new size that could host a whole lot of hiding spaces. You look around some more and see Sabrina sitting there. If you could just get to her then you could probably jump onto her body, forcing her to stop the game. You might even be able to hide on her humongous body. It would be risky and incredibly stupid. It would also be unexpected, which could give you a fighting chance despite your small size.

After thinking about it you begin to dash towards...
11231121222.title: Playing with dolls.

112311212222.content:
The dollhouse would be too obvious, besides not like you can outrun a statue of liberty sized doll and an unimaginably huge psychic. But if you can surprise them you might have a chance. It's risky, but it's all you got. On that thought you dash towards Sabrina. The doll just stands there dumbfounded as you run in between it's legs. While you run past you can't help but look up and sure enough these dolls are very detailed, with panties painted on and everything. You don't let your perverted thoughts slow you down though and double down on your sprint.

You get a good distance away from the doll when a shockwave rumbles through the ground. You stumble but don't fall as you take a glance back and seeing that the doll is now turned around and heading in your direction. You look forward again and realize that you're no where near Sabrina, the doll's gonna catch you before you even get close. You gotta get that lifeless bitch off your trail, but how? As you run you decide to turn a corner to fake her out. You dash into what resembles a backyard. A plastic tree that rises into the sky seems to be the centerpiece of this area. You take a closer look at it and see a small hole around the base of it. A small imperfection to anyone bigger but at your size it could be a hiding spot.

The rumblings get closer and you realize you only have seconds to hide. So you dash towards the whole in the tree and slide into it. Even at your size the hole is small enough that you have to crouch in order to fit. You feel small tremors under your hands and knees and watch the bottom half of the doll come into view. You gulp as those high heels get closer and closer. You can imagine the doll moving it's plastic head around, looking in every direction for you. Eventually the doll leaves your sight and the rumblings get further away.

Here's your chance to get away. You crawl on your hands and knees out of the hole and start in a sprint in the opposite direction of the doll. You're gonna make it!

Suddenly...
112311212222.title: Sabrina!

11231122.content:
How does she expect you to massage her? You're barely the size of a small doll! Does she have any idea how difficult it will be for you at your current stature?

One look in her eyes tells you what you need to know - she doesn't care. You think to yourself that you'll just have to agree to what she says.

Sabrina giggles, as if she can read your mind... "Yes, good. I'm feeling sore on my..."
11231122.title: Where to Massage?

choices: “...need some help.” (her hand pushes you towards her sole?!)
112311222.content:
“...feet.”

Without another word her hand begins pulling away from her face and you feel the giant's grip on you disappear, and find yourself falling helplessly to the ground. Before you can scream your legs buckle under you as you unexpectedly land on a hard surface. You look up to see your cruel master's midrift staring back at you, and realize that you are on a table! She sits down, her red eyes locked on you, and then leans back, her legs beginning to swing upwards. Realizing what is about to happen, you run back away from the table edge, just as two huge pink flats smash down upon your former location, resting on their heels, the dirty white soles facing you.

“Remove my shoes.”

You involuntarily grimace as you gaze at the massive footwear, each far bigger than your entire body. But you've already realized that resistance is futile, and gloomily move forward to her left ankle.

As you place your hands on the edge of her shoe, you briefly marvel at the pale skin of her ankle, the delicate wrinkles in what would normally appear to be smooth skin making it clear differently you must interact with the world now. You push against the shoe with all your might, bracing your legs against the table. You struggle for breath as your arms shake from pushing with all their might, but slowly the massive shoe begins to loosen, and mercifully gravity takes over and it plummets to the table.

“BAM!”

While you're breathing too heavily to shout in triumph, you immediately feel a sense of achievement from having successfully forced off the bus sized flat. You nervously turn to find yourself facing a massive bare sole, five looming toes stretching as the threatening voice booms in your head.

“Hurry up toy.”

You hastily rush towards her right ankle and repeat the process, the blood rushing against your face as you strain with all your might, timing your exhales with your strongest pushes. Just as you begin to fear you won't be able to, the second shoe starts to tilt, and once again gravity forces the shoe away from you. But this time you don't stop to celebrate, and instead immediately turn to face your master's feet.

Her toes towering over you, you can't help but notice the atmosphere has become unmistakably the scent of lotion. Knowing that any normal rubbing wouldn't even register against the giant's comparatively thick skin, you ram your elbow against her arch and leap against it, thankful that her feet appeared to be well cared for, the soft skin yields just slightly for you. As you continue to work as hard as you can to knead the giant's soles, your senses begin to adjust to the humid, lotion-filled air and you can just barely detect the underlying scent of the two bus-sized peds. But your work abruptly comes to an end when a voice once again thunders through your mind.

“Stop.”

You freeze immediately and look up at your master's red eyes. While her voice sounded angry, she seemed to have just a hint of a smirk on her haunting face.

“That was really sub-par, my feet barely felt anything. I think that you...”
112311222.title: "...feet."

choices: "This will be your new home. Sleep now." Sabrina leaves.
"Get back to work." Sabrina begins to lower one of her feet into the flat...
1123112222.content:
"That was really sub-par, my feet barely felt anything. I think that you need to climb in my shoe."

You gulp. You're in no position to argue against her request, given how immensely powerful she is compared to you. As if she was reading your mind at that moment, she taunts you by wiggling her slender toes, reminding you that just one of them would be enough to put you in your place if you disobeyed. With no other choice, you turn to the nearest discarded pink flat and head towards it. You clamber up and over the well-worn material and land inside. Unlike the freshly-lotioned soles you just finished serving, the innards of her flats are more sweltering and sweat-laden. The insole even feels a little spongy and moist, and you can guess why.

Your giantess captor looks down at you with her red eyes, staring at you through the opening of her flats. Her expression remains as flat and unreadable as ever. You at least obeyed her command, so you would hope that she's pleased with you.

"Now then..." she says, her voice echoing through your mind once more.
1123112222.title: In Sabrina's Shoe

choices: One way or another, you're going to escape tonight!
Better safe than sorry, move to the toe of the flat to conserve heat
11231122221.content:
"Now then, this will be your new home. Sleep now."

With these ominous words your master turns her back on you and walks away, her booming footsteps softening slightly. You don't dare move or speak aside from lying down on the insole, shivering slightly as you feel the sweat soaking your clothes. A moment later the lights in the room turn off, you wait another moment, thankful for the warmth that still radiated from the shoe. No! What were you thinking? You weren't thankful to be stuck in someone's well-worn flats! Just as soon as you have your indignant thought, you stop, afraid that Sabrina might still be reading your mind. You wait anxiously on the insole, staring up at the darkness of the room above you, the warm haze and musky scent lulling you to sleep...

You awake curled in a fetal position. The once warm shoe has cooled down and your sweat soaked clothes are more than a bit uncomfortable. From somewhere in the room you can hear the surprisingly gentle snoring of who you assume is your master. You had tried submitting to Sabrina, and all it had gotten you was slave labor and a used flat for a home. Perhaps now that she's asleep you can actually escape? Then again she may be the only one that can restore you to normal size, and you don't want to think of what would happen if she caught you trying to leave. You stand up in the flat, your arms wrapped around yourself as you shiver a bit in the cold. Finally, you've made your decision...
11231122221.title: Heel!

choices: Spend the whole day under her foot
112311222211.content:
You smelled the disgusting aroma of Sabrina's foot sweat, forced to endure it as it is your source of warmth inside a shoe. This would be where you are when you sleep, awake you would be doing whatever your master required, be it another foot rub or a game she devises for her amusement. Say she is the only one who can restore you to normal, what's stopping her from keeping you like this forever? And what if she didn't want you anymore, would she grow you back to normal? Or would she just squish you and find other toys. Either way wasn't good, one option you live as a slave the other you die, with these thoughts you realize that you have nothing to lose if you escape. Besides whose to say that Sabrina is the only physcic? Truly there are others, hopefully you can find them and they can restore you to your normal size. And if not at least you wont have to deal with her and her abusive nature.

You stand up and listen for Sabrina, who still snores peacefully. This can be your chance, she couldn't read your mind when she's asleep right? You quickly grab on the inside of the shoe and begin to climb. It was soaked in Sabrina's foot sweat, but you didn't care, after this you won't have to worry about her disgusting feet ever again. All you need is to find a way out, you kept climbing until you were out of the show and jumped down landing on your butt. "Oww" You say as you stand up holding it, you closed your mouth worried if Sabrina heard you, you then hear light feminine snoring much to your luck. You sigh relieved and run for the opened door, you look back trying to see Sabrina was going to wake up, you can't see her on the bed but you do hear snoring so she must still be asleep, you turn around to see a plight of stairs, you sigh as you carefully climb down each one, you decided to be quick so your 'master' doesn't wake up should she be an early riser. You finally made it to the bottom of the stairs and releasing a huge sigh of relief that you are now only another doorway to freedom, hopefully you'll be able to sneak under the door and leave to find help. You then walk down the hallway on your way to freedom.

You turn the corner at the end of the hall, and hit something moist, smoothed and smelled of lotion. You look to see a very familiar set of feet, frightened you began to look up a towering set of legs, higher a slim waist, higher a modest bust until you see the red eyes of Sabrina actually glaring down at you. You give a frightened expression unsure of what to say, you try to turn around however a blue energy surrounds you keeping you in place, and your voice was still keeping you from trying to beg her not to hurt you.

Sabrina hid her anger well enough however inside she was furious, she thought she had found someone who'd make a wonderful pet, but instead like all the rest tried to run away. Furious she sends a telepathic message through her mind.

"I had hoped you already learned that you're mine, glad I teleported here." She boomed with a hint of anger withn you're mind, you wanted to hold your ears, but you couldn't move. It wouldn't do anything as you hear it from you're mind anyway, before her voice sounded like a god, now it sounded like an angry god. "I knew you're obedience was too good to be true, so I devised this test to see your'e loyalty." You were shocked when you heard the word test, she knew you'd escape? "That's right, I've read your mind, if you had stayed within your shoe you would have passed and I would reward you in the morning, however you being here means you failed this test and you will be judged." She told you within your mind, you started to regret running away if it meant she was going to give you special treatment but now instead. You see Sabrina lift her foot high above you, you wanted to move but couldn't as Sabrina's power still held you in place, you watch helplessly as Sabrina's foot comes down.

*STOMP!*

You were crushed flat, but weren't killed, and yet you feel a tremendous wait on you. And you were still conscious, how is that possible?

Sabrina heard this thought and sent a mental message. "Don't be so surprised, I have made you indestructible when I shrunk you, however while indestructible, you will an impossible amount of pain no human can ever experience alive." The woman then lifts her foot up, with her telepathic abilities she presses you against her sole making it look like you were stuck to it, she then stomped the first stair causing you more tremendous pain.

You wanted to cry as she stomped her way up the stairs with you stuck on her sole, your face between your Master's biggest and second toes. When finally it stopped she lied down and then cloth surrounded you and her foot. It was a sock!

"You won't escape this time Plaything, you're real punishment starts tomorrow, I can make it lighter than you deserve if you kissed my foot as I slumber." Sabrina's voice boomed in your mind. "Good night Toy." She then cut off the telepathic link and went to sleep as she slumbered.

You decided that you would not think about escaping as Sabrina stomped you up the stairs, you don't know what her real punishment will be, however you don't want to find out, you then puckered your lips and kissed her foot as the night went by, hoping that her punishment will not be so severe.

When she wakes up what will your punishment be?
112311222211.title: Escape Attempt

11232.content:
You are not going to hang around and see what this giant wants - she's got red eyes and it's always the bad guys that have red eyes, right? Right.

As she fumbles with the locks on the side of the dollhouse, you run around, trying to find somewhere to hide. You figure she'll look downstairs since that's where she saw you, so you head upstairs and panic as you try to decide whether to go left or right.

"Hiding, are we?" The voice calls out again, combined with the sound of fingers fumbling with catches. "I might just have to tear the house down if you do that, toy. But let's play a game - I'll only tear down one side. Heads or tails? Left or right?"

You've got no choice but to play along - you were going to do that anyway. But which way, left or right?!
11232.title: Which Room is Yours?

choices: Sabrina is still here, impressed that you survived.
Sabrina is gone. She must have assumed she got you.
112321.content:
You head left, into what appears to be a drawing room. You look around and you quickly notice a chest, which is full of fake drawing tools. You throw them out as quickly as you can and throw yourself in (it's a tight fit but you manage it.) The house flips out, as you feel the world shift around you, and you very slightly nudge the lid up, just enough that you can see out by a slit of space. The giantess looks over the seemingly empty house, apparently unsure where you are.

"Hm, you went to hide? Fine." She smiles, standing up. All you can see of her now is her legs - the dollhouse barely reaches her hips - and one of them bends up to hover out of view. She's going to demolish one side of the house by stomping it to pieces! "Eeny, meeny, miny, moe..." She sings in the most sweet way possible, which is creepy beyond belief. You quickly clasp the lid shut as tightly as you can.

Please pick the other one, please pick the other one, please pick the other-

Your thought is cut off as you hear the sudden sound of something smashing down through several layers of wood. The world shakes more from her stomp, and you can even hear the aftermath as bits of furniture crash down through what you imagine is a demolished side of a house. Your assumption is right, at least - she chose the wrong side.

"Hm." The giantess says stoicly. "...Now for the other side."

Wait, wh-

You hear the sudden sound of something smashing down through several layers of wood, except it is far louder this time and much closer. The chest flips and tumbles as it rolls in the aftermath of the entire room losing its ceiling and floor, and you smack your head.

*

You wake up very groggily. Things are still pitch black and the back of your head hurts, but you're relieved that you're alive. It seems like the chest you hid was very well made. Taking a moment to recover and a deep breath, you nudge the lid open and look outside. The chest is lying upside down, having fallen just outside the dollhouse. The two main sides of the house have two gaping holes through them, along with most of the walls missing. The giant certainly has a powerful stomp, as most of the furniture in the rooms were reduced to splinters and remains. Even the model people were caught in the demolision, limbs and fragments tossed around randomly in the chaos.

You crawl out and find that...
112321.title: Hiding in the Chest

1123211.content:
The chest lid flips open as you push on it, and when you crawl out, the first thing you see is a massive pair of pink shoes, each of them as big as cars to you. You pan your head up, looking at the white pants of the giant's legs that seem to stretch on forever. You pan it further up, to the small pink top, and finally stop as your eyes connect with hers. Those dreaded red eyes squint down at the toy by her feet.

"Well, how about that?" She says, her voice booming in your mind - whether it's the size, the distance, or some weird unusual power of hers is unknown. "My toys don't usually survive that. You're a clever one."

She kneels down, her huge body blotting out the sun (which happens to be the room's ceiling light) and her eyes seem to glow as they stare down at you. You are terrified after her attempt to murder you, but you do your best to hold your breath and keep looking at her, rather than babbling down and crying in fear like most people might. She gives a tiny smile.

"We'll have to play a new game, then."

Oh no. Her first "game" involved trying to kill you, and you've got a feeling that this next "game" won't be that different...

"How about a game of..."
1123211.title: Round Two

112322.content:
You head right, into the bedroom you woke up in. In a hurry, you hurl yourself under the bed. The sheets dangle over the edge so you're hidden, and hopefully she won't check underneath. The house flips out, nearly hurtling you out from under the bed, and you press your head against the floor, just enough that your left eye can peek out from under the sheet. The giantess looks over the seemingly empty house, apparently unsure where you are.

"Hm, you went to hide? Fine." She smiles, standing up. All you can see of her now is her legs - the dollhouse barely reaches her hips - and one of them bends up to hover out of view. She's going to demolish one side of the house by stomping it to pieces! "Eeny, meeny, miny, moe..." She sings in the most sweet way possible, which is creepy beyond belief.

Please pick the other one, please pick the other one, please pick the other-

You never finish the thought as a pink sneaker easily crushes the roof, the bed, you, the floor and everything in between in a second. Your body gets mangled between the white rubber sole and the wooden furniture and boards. Sabrina twists her leg a little more, surprised at how fragile her dollhouse is. She raises her leg out of the ruins and checks the bottom of her shoe and sees the red smear of you among the bits of broken wood and dirt.

"A psychic always know." She smiles again, before stepping down and rubbing her shoe against the floor to get the remains off. "Now I need a new toy."
112322.title: Evicted

choices: ...raises you up to her uninjured eye.
11233.content:
In your current state of panic, you run up and punch the red eye. The red eye's the weak spot in video game monsters -- hell, this reminded you of one game in particular where you literally face a giant eyeball as the final boss -- so you figure that it would sufficiently harm this lady, even if the eye itself was about your size. And to an extent, you were right. Immediately after your fist made contact with the smooth, slick, somewhat slimy surface, the giant woman shouted in agony as she covered her eye. You think to yourself, "Success!", but oh no. You're, for lack of a better term, utterly screwed.

Unbeknownst to you, her other eye glows for a brief second, and you're surrounded in blue... whatever this is... before being pulled out the window and thrown to the ground. You look up, seeing the woman for the first time now. Long, dark, mostly straight, blue-black hair that tapers and curls just above her thighs, pale skin, and a red, angry eye looking down at you -- accompanied by a long-sleeved pink top with gold cuffs, a pink miniskirt, a black full-body suit, white gloves, gold legwarmers, and pink boots -- all seemed to scream "This lady is bad news, get out of here!"
