As the giantess seems to fall asleep in the serene spa atmosphere, you figure that you should make a trek across the living landscape of the lounging woman. Hopefully, you can get her attention (although you hope she won't be too upset about the situation.)

You decide to get to work straight away, walking up to her bare soles and carefully climbing up the moist vertical wall of her foot. It's slippery and smooth, but you manage to find precipice with the wrinkles on her sole. As you ascend, she seems to murmur in her sleep, and her feet shift a little, nearly knocking you off balance. Maybe your climbing tickled her? Who knows. You finish your ascent, pushing your way between two of her large plushy toes, and slipping down her ankle and onto the 'bridge' of her leg. It dips a little bit underneath the water, but nothing you can't traverse safely. You walk across her leg, admiring the 'scenic vistas' you can see from your unique perspective, and swiftly arrive at her hips, just before her navel.

As you step onto her stomach, and briefly look at her belly button, you hear her murmuring again. Is something wrong...?
13211.title: The Island of Flannery

choices: You slip and fall into the water!
You try and grab onto the giant's hand.
132111.content:
Like something out of a black-and-white B-movie, an enormous hand suddenly appears and begins to approach you, its slender fingers twitching just enough to indicate its intentions - you're an itch that it wants to scratch. You stumble backwards, and find yourself slipping down the 'slope' that is the giant's sides, with the hot water awaiting you below.

(If it wasn't so frightening, you'd admit that it's a pretty cool, if surreal, moment.)

What happens next...?
132111.title: Flannery Felt That!

choices: Nat 20. You grab her hand and hold on.
Nat 1. You fall into the water with a small splash.
1321112.title: Can you hold on?

13212.content:
There's no way you're swimming all that way to get her attention - you'll probably sink before you reach her head. Then again, you do need help from someone and as intimidating as the giantess is, she's the only help you can find. You're stuck for a moment, before you think her new relaxing pose has given you an oppurtunity. You walk up to the feet the giant has planted over the edge of her bath. Her soles are fiery red from the hot spring water, and she absent-mindedly wiggles her toes as she sinks further into the water, humming peacefully some more.

You venture closer to her feet and they loom over your tiny size. As the giant gives another relaxed sigh, completely unaware of the tiny thing by her soles, you think of what to do. Tickling them would be gentle and nice, but it doesn't seem like the most effective way of grabbing attention. You could instead bite them and get her attention more sharply and quickly, but she might not appreciate the odd little creature nipping at her. You wager it on whether she seems friendly or not, tossing the coin in your mind while her feet continue to loom over you, almost inviting you to try something. Eventually you step forth and...
13212.title: Getting your Feet Wet

choices: "Oh my... what are you?" She didn't know you were here.
"Oh, you're awake! I didn't notice." She knew you were here.
132121.content:
You can't imagine why you'd try biting her - that's probably just an angry stomp waiting to happen. Instead, you opt for a more safe decision, and you slowly begin to scurry your hands up and down one of her feet. The skin is very smooth, given that she is bathing, and it feels soft and slippery to the touch. They're even pleasantly warm, given the steaming water that the giant is bathing in. You move your fingers erratically to make a tickling sensation, while moving your hands up and down the sole. She doesn't seem to notice at first, so you exaggerate your movements and put more effort into your routine. Eventually, the giantess is heard giggling, and her foot twitches a little. You continue, and it twitches again, and the giantess is chuckling now. Finally, it twitches again and you hear her say, "what is that?"

Her feet suddenly slink back into the bath, and the giant woman can see you clearly standing on the rocky edge where she was resting her feet. She blinks for a moment, her mouth hanging open a little, before saying...
132121.title: Warm to the Touch

1321212.content:
You blink, not sure how to take what the giant just said. You've finally been noticed, but it seems she's not surprised at all, is she responsible for taking you here? Her burning red eyes gaze down on you as her mouth curls up in a cute smile, well, it would be cute if you weren't petrified at the size of it's owner.

“I was wondering when you'd finally wake up! You're lucky it's so relaxing here or I might have just shook you awake.” As she says the word “shook” a huge hand swings out of the steaming water and before you can do anything but flinch you find yourself swept up between her fingers.

As you're lifted up to her unnaturally red eyes you manage to feel even smaller, your reflection barely fills her pupils! The breath from her nostrils, comparatively cooler than the steaming air around you, blows around your body.

“Just what were you doing there at my feet anyways? Listen, I uh, don't have time for all that "why am I tiny" nonsense, I don't mean to be rude but I can't be soaking here for too much longer so you've got to get to work cleaning my-”
1321212.title: Discovered at last?

choices: She was honest - there's something sharp wedged behind her back tooth.
She lied - and she begins to tilt her head back!
13212122.content:
You barely have the time to object before the giant's hand snaps shut around you, enclosing you in a dark cage of wet skin. You instinctively struggle, hoping that she isn't planning to snuff out your life so easily, but luckily she seems to keep away from too much pressure - just enough to make sure you stay where she can find you.

Her hand rocks in senseless directions as your captor presumably leaves the hot bath and gets herself dressed (doing so without unclenching her fist - she must be quite dexterous) and after some more worrying vibrations that you soon realize to be the giant merely walking, the hand opens up once more and you're flooded with light and the visage of the red-haired giantess, looking down at you with a smirk.

"Perhaps you can give me a hand?" The giant suggests. "If you do, I'll tell you what's going on. Deal?"

You feel that you should give this girl a piece of your mind - that you'd rather have those answers now, instead of later - but as you consider it, her smile widens to a grin and she displays her pearly white teeth for you. Whether she meant to or not, she reminded you of just how small you are - you are quite literally bite-sized right now, and you would not want to anger the red-eyed giant, just in case she is feeling particularly hungry right now. Swallowing your dignity in the hopes that she won't swallow you, you agree.

"Great! Now, there's something wedged around here..." She opens her mouth and points inside, giving you a full view of her colossal maw. Hot breath swamps over you as she splays out her large tongue, in some attempt to help you see what she's pointing at. However, to you, it's just murky darkness with an unpleasant surprise at the end. She closes her mouth. "It's, like, something sharp at my back tooth, and I can't reach it! Can you get it out for me?"

This time, you really do want to openly object, perhaps to suggest a better plan or a safer alternative. However, this giant teenager doesn't even wait for a response before widening her jaw once more and unceremoniously dumping you inside her mouth. You land with a splat on her tongue, which quivers and flexes at your touch. You begin to panic, looking back towards your exit, but the giant has blocked it off with her hand, leaving only just enough room between her fingers to give you some light. You stand unevenly on the pulsating muscle that is her tongue, being careful not to fall and trip into a face full of saliva, as an abundance of it pools around your feet and drips from the 'ceiling.' Like the girl and her surroundings, it makes you hot under the collar, as her breath circulates around her mouth, overflowing with humidity, like a desert wind. You can even detect a hint of something spicy, which makes you wrinkle your nose as it hits you hard with every breath, but it's hardly the most important thing on your mind right now. Tentatively, you step across her large tongue towards the back of her mouth. She was truthful enough about it being time to wash her mouth - you can see bits of peppers and chilli still caught amongst her molars, but none of them seem sharp or painful.

You just hope that it was an honest request, and not some ruse to get you into the ideal position for a bathtime snack...
13212122.title: Flannery's Spicy Mouth

132121222.content:
You inch your way around the molars, carefully trying to keep your balance on Flannery's enormous tongue, while looking as keenly as you can for anything sharp or pointed. Sadly, nothing seems to be protruding from her teeth. But then why would she...?

Your worst fears are realized as her jaw snaps shut, eclipsing you in darkness. Her tongue quivers up and down rhythmically as she chuckles at your naivety. In a panic, you start to run back towards her shut lips, in hopes that you could maybe squeeze your way out somehow, but her slobbery tongue proves to be difficult terrain and you slip on its saliva-coated surface. Flannery silently chuckles again, her tongue seizing up and down more viciously now as she can feel your pitiful attempts to flee. The tongue sloshes from side to side, coating you all over as Flannery seems to taste you, and after a few terrifying moments of being probed by the enormous muscle, she seems to deem you worthy of being her snack. The whole cavern that is her mouth tilts diagonally, and while you grasp for something to hold onto, only the blubbery tongue can be reached - and its wet softness proves too awkward for you to cling to. You slide straight down into her throat, and you feel a rush of humid air and choking heat as you tumble downwards.

Flannery swallows her unsuspecting snack, a little upset at the lack of spice but otherwise pleased with the unique taste. She could hardly believe it had been so easy! Feeling one last sensation as the meal dropped down into her stomach, she patted her belly and finished brushing her teeth. Flannery made a mental note to herself to add some peppers or chilli to her next 'snack'...
132121222.title: A Snack for Flannery

choices: You are still by the steam bath, but Flannery didn't find you and left.
You are somewhere else. Flannery must have found you.
13213.content:
You do not want to take chances with this giantess. Even if she is a nice girl, you doubt she'll take kindly to finding you here while she's half-naked and bathing. It's hard to explain that sort of thing.

The outside of the steam bath is made of smooth rock. It's rough enough to give you some places to grip so that you can climb down. It's quite a way but you're convinced you can make it to the ground. As you survey your path down, you finally notice where you are. The ground below is made of wooden planks and the walls - far away on the horizon - look like those paper-like walls you see in Japanese films. It's some sort of spa house. You can't hear anyone else, at least - it seems like the red haired girl here is the only person around. Maybe.

The giant in question shifts her feet again and they nearly drop down on you again. Having nearly been squashed by her twice now, you quickly get to the plan and start climbing down the outside of the bath. It's a slow descent as you look for places to grip, but you slowly start to safely descend to the floor. It seems like everything is going smoothly.

"Hm, let's see if the bubbles are working." The giantess says to herself. You hear a click, presumably from a button somewhere, and you then hear the water bubble and froth up in chaos. The water spills over the edges of the bath a little, but a little is a lot to you and soon a little water spills over above you. You're hit by a waterfall and you scream as you plummet the rest of the way, hitting the ground like an anvil and blacking out.

When you awake...
13213.title: Bath Time Accident

choices: Flannery hears you and stops, looking down.
Flannery doesn't hear you and steps on you.
132131.content:
You awake slowly, feeling very sore all over. This is at least a relief - feeling something probably means you're not dead. You're not totally invincible though, as it feels like you've been pulled through the wringer and back. You grit your teeth as you try to move and get yourself back to your feet, and it takes much longer than it normally would. You would guess several minutes at least, but without a watch or a sky, you can't really tell the time. You can't tell if you were knocked out for a minute or two, or a couple of hours.

Finally managing to get to your feet, you look around. Without the sounds of bubbling water and giggle above the rock formation looming over you, you can guess the steam bath spa is empty and the giantess has left. Around you is an enormous plain of wooden planks, along with a gigantic screen door in the distance. The architecture looks like a simple home from a Japanese film or game or something. With nowhere else to go, you head forwards in hopes of finding some help or shelter.

However, as you are halfway across the wooden plain, you hear something thunderous approaching, and the ground seems to creak and ground. A tremendously tall shadow appears in the screen door, and it opens to reveal the bathing giant from earlier, now clad in a bathrobe. You're not sure why she came here - perhaps she forgot something? - but as she focuses on straightening out her still-wet hair, she begins walking across the room, shaking the ground with each booming step. Her enormous feet slam down, getting closer and closer, and you're still feeling very slow and sore from the fall. With no other plan, you shout and scream as loudly as you can to grab her attention, just as she is about to step on you...
132131.title: Alone in the Spa

choices: "...Oh no! That poor bug is hurt!"
1321311.content:
By a stroke of good luck, your tiny flails and frantic shouts manage to reach the ears of the towering giantess, and she halts in her path (only a step or two short from stepping on you.) In a moment of confusion, she looks around to find the source of the tiny noises she heard, and then finally, the enormous redhead looks down and spots you, wounded and weary by her feet.

Her eyes widen for a moment in shock, and then she parts her lips to say...
1321311.title: Spotted by Flannery

1321312.content:
It seems that, in the midst of your panic and confusion (along with the difficulty of seeing so far away) you failed to notice that Flannery is wearing earbuds, no doubt another part of freshening herself up as much as possible. Unfortunately, her decision to make sure she cleans out her earwax has inadvertently caused your demise, as she fails to hear your shouts and screams, and in a dreadful instant, her wet sole raises in the air and then falls down on top of you. As soft and pampered as her feet may be, you can't survive the (relative) tons of pressure pushing down on you, and you go out with an underwhelming "squelch".

Flannery would later be irritated that, during her spa treatment, she had neglected to notice that she had stepped in something, and would near another clean to get all that red off her foot.
1321312.title: Flattened by Flannery

choices: ...Flannery staring down at you, as she holds you in her palm.
...glass all around you and a lid above you. You're in a jar.
132132.content:
With a dull throbbing beat pounding at the back of your head, you slowly return to consciousness. Your eyes creep open, light bursting around you as they do, and you have to blink repeatedly to try and clear the severe blurriness. What happened? Was it all a dream? Your ribs ache and moan with every breath, but you bite your lip and soldier yourself up to a sitting position. It hurts like hell, but you haven't fallen to your death, not have you been eaten up or squished, which is not what you want because if you did, you'd just go to the story outline and find the (END) chapters.

Shaking your head of any unnecessary thoughts, your vision slowly comes around to normal again, and you look around at your surroundings. You are greeted by...
132132.title: You used Recover!

choices: "It's good to see you awake. I was really worried about you."
"What are you, and why exactly were you peeping on me?"
1321321.content: You freeze as you notice the landscape you're sitting on - it's a human hand. Your eyes crane upwards and your heart seems to stop as you find the hand's owner staring down at you. The giant's hair is a fiery mess of red, and her eyes are somehow even more red, which unnerves you as they seem to fill your vision. She seems to notice that you've awakened, but doesn't say anything and instead leans her face in to inspect you closer. You futilely try to back away from her intimidating enormity, but her fingers curl upwards slightly and you back into a wall. You can see your own panicked reflection in her eyes. After a few seconds of silent observation, the giantess moves her head back and says...
1321321.title: In Flannery's Hand

133.content: Tate, Liza, Wallace, Juan, or Sidney?
133.title: Tate & Liza / Wallace & Juan / Sidney

choices: A strange sun-like creature floats in the room.
13311.content:
You wake up on a mat, much like those found at a gym. You are immediately confused as to why you are on a gym mat, and as your cloudy senses begin returning to you, you are even more confused! Stretching out beneath you in all directions is a huge pink mat, that turns blue and seems to descent down a sudden drop. The ceiling is far above you, the huge lights distant enough to make warehouses seem small. There is a wall above you with a huge heart-like emblem, but what worries you most is quite a bit closer to you.

There, wearing a taijiquan uniform and sitting cross legged beside you is an actual giant! You notice he appears to be meditating, and as you look around the room, he's the only other one in here. Did he do this to you? Either way, he might be your only chance at getting back home. As you ponder what to do...
13311.title: Tate, half of the Mystic Combination

choices: ...he looks straight at you. "Oh. There you are." He's spotted you!
...he looks towards the door. "Liza? Is that you?" He hasn't spotted you.
133111.content:
As you ponder what to do, the giant's head raises a little, and slowly, they turn around and their eyes snap open. There's something unusual about them - they're blue, yet pale, as if he's looking for something you can't quite notice. It's a little intimidating (pun not intended.)

You find yourself frozen to the spot in hesitation as the giant's eyes scan around the room, until...
133111.title: Noticed by Tate?

choices: ...opens her eyes - she has sensed your presence!
...gets up - she is going to perform a ritual dance.
...continues to pray. You are free to think of what to do.
1341.content:
You wake up to the sound of wild creatures and the taste of thin air. You blink and get up, looking around at where you are. You're lost in a field of grass - enormously tall grass, blades that reach up way above you. It's either very big grass or you're very small, but either way it's a frightening world you've woken in. The sound of wild creatures calls out again and you scan around, wary of any sudden movements sweeping through the blades. It's even worse as there is a low lying fog all around you, masking everything in a grey veil and making it hard to breathe (you guess that you're also at a high altitude.) With nothing else to do, you venture out in a random direction to try and find out where exactly you are.

After some cautious walking you come across a huge stone monument, even taller than the towering grass, along with a near-identical one alongside it. You examine the first and read the chiseling on the face, which depicts a large angular titan rising from the earth. You look up and see a large shining red orb perched on top of the stone. You stare at it in awe for a moment before looking at the second stone. This one depicts a large curved leviathan rising from the ocean, and the orb on this stone is a deep blue. They seem important but you can't place your finger on what it means-

Tremors. Soft but rhythmic tremors are coursing through the dirt. They feel like footsteps - big footsteps. You quickly run and hide behind one of the obelisks just before the owner of the footsteps arrives.

It is a giant girl - you feel like an insect in her presence. She has soft bronzed skin and bright blue eyes, along with a short brown haircut hidden between two large floral hair decorations. The only things she seems to be wearing is a blue tube top and a blue floral pattern skirt, along with a shiny pink band on her left leg, just above her bare feet. Her attire reminds you of a dancer, or possibly some sort of medium. As she walks closer, the tremors get less soft and they shake you more, and you are terribly afraid of this huge girl and her booming footsteps. She stops just before the two orbs and kneels, closing her eyes - she seems to be praying. Before you can think of some plan of action, she...
1341.title: Phoebe: The Dancing Medium

13412.content:
She fnishes her knelt prayer and for a moment, you think that she is done with her duties and that she is leaving. However, she begins to hum a ballad of some kind and she poses, ready to do something. Before you can react and think of leaving yourself, she begins to dance rapidly, apparently a part of her ritual. She steps to a very fast pace, slamming her feet down on the earth one after the other and turning the simple tremors into a horrible earthquake. You are shaken to and fro from the vibrations, knocking you down, and even as you get back up, she seems to move to another part of the dance and you lose your balance again. The grass blades beneath her are trampled and flattened into the earth without her notice, making you deathly afraid of her otherwise innocent practice.

Well at least she's only dancing on the spot.

She starts moving around.

Oh damn.

The giantess moves in a circle around the two orbs, making the earthquake even more unpredictable as the vibrations come from new directions every time you think you have braced from them. She sweeps to the side, stretching her legs and her arms in wide fluid motion as she steps and waves to the drums in her head. You'd find it very impressive if you weren't in danger now, as you are now in her path. The giant steps around you over and over, and each time you try to dart away, she seems to have moved there and blocks your path with more frantic footsteps. As you think to dodge to between the two stones, she culminates her imaginary verse and ends with a twirling jump, slamming the earth and knocking you onto your back. Your head hits the ground hard and the world goes blurry and your ears are filled with a high pitched whine.

As your vision clears up, the giant ritual dancer has reached the crescendo and she stands above you, holding her breath and balancing on one of her legs. Her other leg lies suspended in the air, dangling above you. Her foot is smudged by the dirt and grass blades have been mulched in, squashed and powerless. You struggle to recover and move your limbs. She exhales, and just as she finishes her balance and her foot descends, you make a last ditch effort to roll to...
13412.title: Dance of the Dead

134121.content:
You roll to your left, hoping that she will step to the right. Her foot wavers away for a second and you smile, but then she hops and regains her balance, and she gracefully begins to set her foot down. You have no time to escape and you can only stare at the foot of the goddess as it descends. You can see every wrinkle on her sole, caked in dirt and grass, and in arguably the strangest of final thoughts, you wonder if that will make things softer for you. It does, but not by a lot as you discover as her dirty sole slams down on you, her massive weight trampling down on your tiny body. There's a brief moment as she compresses you into the earth, and finally your body is crushed into the mud like nothing.

The dancer finishes her ritual. Ironically enough, it was for a funeral.
134121.title: Left isn't Right

choices: Yes; she looks down at her feet.
No; she's just examining the tablets.
134122.content:
You roll to your right, hoping that she will step to the left. Her foot hovers closer to you for a second and you freeze, but then she hops and regains her balance, and she gracefully moves her foot to the side - just enough to spare you as she steps down, her massive foot only inches away (to you at least.) As she finishes her ritual dance with another quick psalm, you take deep breaths and simply lay on the ground by her feet, too exhausted to do anything else and too relieved to care about it. The image of the giant's sole blotting out the sky and hovering over you to crush you like a puny insect... You really doubt you are going to sleep tonight.

"Phoebe!" A voice calls from the distance through the faint fog. The giant dancer turns around, called by her name. "Are you done? We still need to scatter ashes at the mountain lookout!"

She nods and starts finishing her psalm, muttering her words faster than before. As terrifying and potentially deadly as 'Phoebe' is, you can't do anything at the top of a mountain alone at a tiny size with wild animals around. You're going to have to take a chance with the giant. You quickly get up and notice the pink band tried around her ankle again. You could grab onto that and hitch a ride, but you're going to need to hold tight.

She finishes her prayer. No time to lose - you run up to her enormous foot and leap up, grabbing onto the pink band. Phoebe pauses for a second - did she feel that?
134122.title: A Step in the Right Direction

choices: She sees that you are a tiny person.
She thinks that you are a bug.
1341221.content: You latch onto the giant's anklet, getting a firm hold. However, it happens to shake the band as you do so, and the giant briefly pauses and looks down. You gaze up at her face, peering down at the little thing that has thrown itself on her ankle. You instictively freeze in fear as the giantess squints her eyes at your tiny form - surely, she must notice that you're not an insect, right?
1341221.title: Phoebe Felt That!

choices: You survive, although stuck to her foot.
13412212.content: One annoyed frown and several fast swings of her foot and you were lying several meters away from her. At first you were shocked by the fact that the fall didn't kill you, but your shock has been quickly replaced by fear when you realized that Phoebe was still continuing on her way, already forgetting about small "bug". You wanted to run, to try and save yourself, but when a shadow of her foot surrounded your shrunk body, you decided that all hope is lost and stopped running. You turned around to face her falling sole and death with dignity.
13412212.title: She thinks that you are a bug.

choices: You manage to endure the walk.
You eventually run out of energy and pass out.
134122121.content:
You are treated to a wonderfully terrifying view of Phoebe's dirt-covered sole hovering above you for a split second, followed by the same view looking much larger as it hurtles down on top of you. You feel a tremendous weight slam on you with a thud, and for a moment, you close your eyes and grit your teeth as you imagine the awful death you've just had and start wondering if there's an afterlife (and if so, if everything will be giant there too.)

Luckily for you, this is a question for another day, as you draw a breath and realize you're still alive. Unluckily for you, that breath draws in a distinct musk, mixed with smushed dirt and wet grass. You feel something very smooth and warm weighing down on the top of your body, and something similarly smooth but much cooler beneath you, as you are compressed between the two. You open your eyes to see nothing but brown, two shades distinct - an earthly dark brown and a gentler caramel shade. You spot an enormous grassblades pressing against your face, and you vaguely notice a few large wrinkles in the parts with the lighter shades. You finally realize what exactly is on top of you.

Great.

Despite the undignified position you find yourself in, you're at least glad that you survived. Perhaps the softness of the giant's sole and the wet moldable muddy ground cushioned the impact and saved you. Or maybe you're invincible or something (which would also explain why the impact didn't even knock you out or hurt all that much.) Either way, you intend to squirm or dig free in some way, when the foot weighing down on you twists side to side, causing some serious discomfort and plastering you even more against the sole as Phoebe grinds you, in some attempt to finish off the bug she thought she had already got. You're so thick in dirt now that you can't even move. How could things get any worse?

On that very cue, Phoebe decides she got the little pest and begins walking again. To your surprise and severe worry, you feel air rush against your back for a brief moment, and you realize that you're being carried along for the ride. The no-doubt rather-arduous and terribly-painful ride. The movement halts for a fraction of a second, and you grit your teeth again as the foot slams back down into the soggy ground. You survive again, but damn that knocks the wind out of you. It's beginning to hurt, too. It seems you just lucked out on the first stomp, and now you're about to be stomped over and over again for what could be hours on end. In some attempt at escape during her next step, you try to wriggle free, but all the dancing has caked the dirt clinging to her sole - you might as well be trying to free yourself from clay (which might seem easy, except that you're also being trampled by a woman the size of the Statue of Liberty, which makes it a little harder than it sounds.) Her foot slams into the earth again and your head rolls around in dizziness and pain.

You also remember you're on a mountain.

Your attempt to curse aloud is cut short as Phoebe takes another step, silencing you as you are sandwiched between her foot and the mud once more. This is going to be a long ride.
134122121.title: Stuck in the Mud

choices: You try to climb up towards her ear.
You try to tickle her soles.
13413.content: The giantess simply holds her position, sitting on her knees with her eyes closed and her hands pressed together whilst humming slightly. She must be lost in thought with her prayer or her meditation or whatever it is she's doing. This gives you ample time to try and get her attention. You try the usual 'shouting loudly' thing but that humming of hers, along with your small size, seems to be drowning you out. You briefly contemplate how else to get her attention, and then with your decision made, you slowly make your way through the grassblades towards this living mountain of a woman.
13413.title: Mt. Phoebe

choices: Yes, she stops her prayers to see what is tickling her.
No, she still doesn't feel you and you are shrinking again while on her foot.
134132.content: You make it to the exposed soles of Phoebe as she continues her prayers, hoping that tickling her soles will at least get her attention. So you climb on the foot closest to you, her right foot, and you get to the center of her sole. You get on your knees and you begin tickling Phoebe's foot. So far it doesn't seem to be working so you try harder. Does Phoebe feel you tickling her foot?
134132.title: You try to tickle her soles.

14.content: Which Sinnoh official will you choose?
14.title: Sinnoh

1413.content:
Your whole body aches as you emerge from unconsciousness, feeling confused and lethargic, like you've just passed out after running a marathon. You will your limbs to move, and once they do, you push yourself to your wobbling feet and stand up, blinking and looking around at your unfamiliar surroundings.

Wherever it is, it is enormous - either everything was built to accommodate giants, or you are suddenly standing at the same height at most bugs. As you gaze around the strange new world, you realize that you have awoken in a gigantic....
1413.title: Maylene: The Barefoot Fighting Genius

choices: ...the sauna is occupied - Maylene is here, fast asleep!
...the door unlocks, as Maylene walks in and takes a seat!
14133.content:
It might be built for giants, but it's definitely a sauna that you've woken up in. You're not exactly sure how or why, but that's the situation you're in.

It's relatively small (for giants, of course - it's enormous to you!) with a single stack of hot coals in the middle of the room, with wooden seats lining around three of the four walls (as the fourth wall contains a door that you could fit the Statue of Liberty through.) You yourself are situated on one of the wooden seats, and you can already feel the heat seeping through your clothes, making you sweat below the collar.

With all your keen detective work finished, you finally realize that...
14133.title: In Maylene's Sauna

141331.content:
The gigantic sauna has an equally-gigantic occupant - Maylene, the Fighting-type Gym Leader! She is robed (although she withstands this much heat, much less sleeps through it, is beyond you) and snoring peacefully, slumped over the wooden seats. Her head is tilted on the side, with her pink hair coated in sweat (from both the heat and training throughout the day) and several bandages on her face. Her body rises and fall with each snore, hidden beneath thick white cotton, and her legs are propped on the seats, displaying her warm and tired soles.

As the giantess snores, you realize that there isn't a way out of here without her - the door is the size of a skyscraper, and there's not enough space to slip underneath it. Whether you like it or not, you need to wake Maylene if you want to get anywhere fast (and in this sweltering sauna, that seems like a good idea.)

Maneuvering carefully along the flat wooden benches, you head towards...
141331.title: Sleepy Maylene

choices: It was because of you and she checks her feet for the source of the biting
It wasn't because of you and she gets up, not noticing you between her toes
1413312.content:
You slowly head towards her massive feet. Your thought process being, that the best way to wake her up would be by using a more "sensitive" part of her body. And out of all possibilities you could think off, her feet seemed like the least questionable one.

You approach them, but even from afar you can tell that they seem to be quite sweaty. Figures, given you are in a sauna still. Lucky to you, one of her feet is laying a bit on its side, exposing the smooth sole to you. You take a deep breath before getting to work.
First, you try banging on the sole, which did nothing (except cover you in her foot sweat). Next you tried the same on her heel, but the skin on there was way too thick for you to even leave a proper impact. Finally, you choose to try and tickle her toes. You rub all over them, trying your hardest to make something happen. And something does happen!

...only not what you wished for. In her sleep, Maylene shook a little (maybe because of you?), which caused her feet to shift a bit away from you. This, coupled with you leaning on them, causes you to fall face forward between her toes, which break your fall. You take this as a small moment to relax. You got used to the smell by now and they are quite soft. Yet, you've been wasting so much time and energy on getting any reaction and nothing happened! You let your anger out on the innocent little (well, not so little to you) stubs, biting into one of them.

And it worked! You can hear Maylene groaning above, slowly waking up. You smile in satisfaction. Finally you got her attention! Or... did you? The thought started to cross your mind. Did she really wake up because you bit her? Because if she didn't, she will just get up normally, with you still stuck in between her toes!

You try to get back up, but the heat and exhaustion are too much! You pray that she wakes up because of you, because if she didn't, you'll be spending a lot more time at her feet...
1413312.title: ...Maylene's feet.

142.content: Crasher Wake, Fantina, or Bryon?
142.title: Crasher Wake / Fantina / Bryon

1431.content: You slowly begin to awaken. You blink unevenly, trying to clear the sleep from your eyes, and while most of your senses are dulled, you can immediately feel something - cold. Wherever you are, it's pretty damn chilly. You groggily try to rise to your feet, but you trip over and find yourself aching more than usual. Was it the sleep or the cold? Probably both. You slowly try to regain yourself and figure out where you are, and as your vision clears and you can see your own breath in the air, you find yourself in...
1431.title: Candice: The Diamond Dust

choices: She hears you at the last second
She doesn't hear you and you get swallowed
14313.content:
You realize that all around you is a light white tint. The ground is uneven and Its hard to walk on. You see some kind of barrier surrounding the white land, beyond the barrier you see a giant roof in the distant. This roof seems to be about 200 meters tall and completely redundant in the scheme of things. "Who would need a roof that big?" you say to yourself.

You take a few steps trying to figure out where you were when all of a sudden you hear a deafening sound of something falling or slamming beyond the barrier. You hear booms and becomes incredible scared, yet confused. However you become one hundred percent confused when you see someone beyond the barrier. It was a giant Girl. With long twin ponytails and a white school shirt on. Your so confused how a giant girl could possibly exist but you got bigger issues, for example the giant silver spoon shes holding coming towards the white landscape. The spoon digs in and brings out a huge chunk from the ground. You watch as the spoon goes in her mouth and when it came out all of it was gone, and that's when you pieced it together. You were in a bowl of Ice Cream!

You see the spoon come down once again and pick another chuck of the ice cream off. You realized that she isn't big but you must be really small, smaller then a bug maybe if she doesn't even see you. She sticks the spoon in her mouth once again. "Hey, girlie down here!" you say shouting and waving your arms. However she didn't see you as she lowered it down once again for a spoonful and too make matters worse its coming under you. You see the spoon dig under the ice cream and starts lifting the ground your standing on. You almost fell over as you get lifted out of the bowl on the spoon and see it approach the gigantic sized face of the black haired girl. She opens her mouth giving you a good look at her pearly white teeth. She starts bringing you to her mouth and you shout once again, half in fear and half in hope, hope that she will hear you.

Does she hear you?
14313.title: In Candice's Ice Cream

choices: Sooooooo you want to be my pet (She's Not Helpful)
How did you get so small (She's Helpful)
143131.content:
You lose all hope as she starts bringing the spoon closer and closer to her mouth. You can just imagine the pains of being chewed by her killer teeth, being nothing but a bloodstain at the end. Or imagining falling down her throat into her stomach. Being consumed by her lake of burning stomach acids, you honestly don't know which one sounds worse. Your just about to accept your death when the spoon came to an abrupt stop. You notice that your aren't moving forward anymore. "No Way!!" you hear the girl gasp as you finally realize she has spotted you. Her giant eyes are wide open as she looks directly towards you.

You feel the spoon tilt left as you quickly lost your balance. You trip and roll across the land of ice cream until you fall off the spoon, but instead of falling all the way down to the hard floor you fell into the soft Caucasian hand of the girl. Now that your out of the bowl and not fearing for your life you take a look around. You seem to be in some kind of kitchen, with all the kitchen utilities. The bowl seemed to be on a counter right in front of where the girl was. Outside the window you see snow falling which is weird because last time you checked it wasn't winter.

Your train of thought was interrupted as the girl's giant finger rammed into your torso, knocking you down on your ass "Ow. Why did you do that" you yell up at her not liking being hit down. "Wow, I didn't think you were real, I mean... It's just I've never seen someone so..... Ummmm" "Small." you say finishing her sentence "It's fine to say"

"Yeah small. So how did you get so small or were you born that way, are there more little people?, what were you doing in my ice cream, I cant believe I almost ate you. "Slow down" you say to the girl who's obviously intrigued about finding you. "First things first, my name is _______ what's yours?" She puts on a confident smile and says "My name is Candice, and I'm the Gym leader of the Snowfront Pokemon Gym"

You have a million questions running through your head but Candice also had one to

"______________________________"
143131.title: Candice Hears You

choices: Wait it out for a while.
Try and sneak away from him.
1443.content:
You wake up with your face on something smooth, but certainly not your bed. You open your eyes and find that it is polished wood. Confused, you stand up and realise where you are. Books the size of cars are scattered around on a wooden field that appears to be a gigantic desk. A lamp hangs overhead, towering above and glaring down at you like a spotlight on the tiny creature it has found. Empty glasses and writing pens lay scattered around your new world, but they are hidden amongst the piles and piles of books. The room beyond this desk is hard to see from your perspective, though you can tell the walls are lined with a purple wallpaper with a fancy decorative pattern - most of it, however, is hidden as most of the walls are covered in bookshelves. All of the bookshelves look fit to burst with the massive amount of books they are burdened with.

The door, seemingly miles away, clicks. Someone is coming! You quickly throw yourself behind a pile of books before the door swings open. You peek around just the slightest bit to see the giant owner of the giant desk. It is a tall man, fairly young and rather tall and skinny. His skin is a bit pale, suggesting that he doesn't see much daylight. He has purple hair that waves as he walks and his purple eyes are shaded behind his rounded glasses. He is wearing a very fancy and spotless crimson suit and equally clean black shoes. He seems to scan the room for a second and you hide behind the pile of books again. Satisfied that he is alone, he walks over and sits down at the desk, nearly making you leap back in fright as he reaches for the pile of books... and picks the one on the top, opening it and humming as he buries himself into the pages.

You're unsure what to do. You could reveal yourself but you have no idea how this man could react - he could be freaked out or hostile. You could stake it out and wait until he leaves or does something else, but you don't know how long he'll be reading (though judging by the surroundings, it might be a very long time.) Lastly, you could try and sneak away before he can find you, but it will be difficult to escape without being seen from his prowling eyes above you.
1443.title: Lucian: The Literary Genius

14432.content:
Your two main options don't seem very good - you don't trust the giant and you doubt you can get away while he is here. It seems like you're going to have to play the waiting game. Lying down and resting your back against the pile of huge books, you try and collect your thoughts and calm yourself over the absurd but true fact that you are in a giant library of some kind. The giant hums as he flips pages in seconds - he certainly reads fast - and soon enough you tune it out. After a while he tones down the brightness of the desklamp and the world takes a more dim and subdued shade. It's almost sort of peaceful...

...You wake up.

I must have fallen asleep.

When you remember the situation you're in, you practically spring to your feet and check on your surroundings. The giant is...
14432.title: Quiet in the Library

choices: She did; she gets down and looks for the source of the tiny shriek.
She didn't; she came inside to get some sleep.
She didn't; she came inside to do something else.
145.content:
You wake up with your face planted on a wooden floor, dusty and rough. You cough the dust away and get up, confused as to where you are. It's very dark and there seems to be no walls - it just seems to be a huge endless plain of wood. You look up and see a ceiling that seems to be made of wooden planks as well. Confused and lost, you decide to venture out and see where you are. After a moment of travelling towards a large opening of light, you make it out from under the wooden 'ceiling' and see where you are.

It's a room. An enormous room.

The walls and ceiling are infinitely far away, making you feel like an insect in the giant room. At any rate it seems to be the only room in the house as indicated by the single door and windows, suggesting that it's a villa or a bungalow of some kind. You were under a large bed the whole time. Out on the horizon, you can see the other towering furniture, including a writing desk, a bookshelf, a fridge, a television, and other various items that don't seem important but remind you of your tiny size. You are deathly afraid of your situation, but even more so of meeting the gigantic owner of this villa.

Right on cue, you hear something clicking at the monumental door. It's someone unlocking the door. You retreat straight back to beneath the bed where you can't be seen in the shadows. The door clicks some more and opens. You hold your breath in suspense and wonder if it is just your overly wild imagination, but just as you start to relax, a series of tremors run across the floor - footsteps - and an enormous black boot slams down ahead of you by the bed. You can't help but shriek in panic from the giant's step, along with the second boot slamming down next to the other, sending another shockwave through the wooden floor. The giant pauses for a moment and you are afraid that she might have heard you.
145.title: Cynthia: The Sinnoh Champion

1451.content:
For a second you hope that this giant with the thunderous footsteps didn't hear you and that she will go on her way. Unfortunately, you can see her shift her feet from side to side as she looks around the room for the tiny shriek she heard. She pauses for a moment before she suddenly drops down and checks under the bed. You leap into the darkness, holding your breath in suspense.

The giant's head blots out most of the light but you can still make out her features. She has very long blonde hair, nestled with two black decorations on each side of her head. Her skin is very fair and she has bright blue eyes that seem to spark with curiosity. They scan through the darkness and you freeze on the spot, hoping that you are too small to be found in the shade.

Her eyes seem to brighten up even more as they focus on you. "Hm, what's that?"

Your body automatically panics from the giant predator and your legs begin to move (even though there is nowhere to flee to) but already the giant has stretched out her huge hand, fingers spread wide and descending over you. The rest of your body catches up and you turn around, but you meet a wall of flesh and her cupped hand scoops you out into the light of the enormous room. Her face looms over you, curious yet intimidating, and her blue eyes seem to narrow at the strange thing she has found under the bed.
1451.title: Cynthia's Investigation

14511.content:
"O-Oh my! Who... are you?" She asks. She seems a little shocked, but moreso curious.

You stand there shaking, still terrified by the giant. You stammer for a second and she seems to sense your hesistation. Slowly she drops a finger down and pats you. It's a bit demeaning but you're thankful that she's using her finger to pet you and not to smear you into the ground or something. You stop stammering and finally gather the courage to tell her your name.

Her eyebrows rise for a second before she regains herself and lowers them. "Well my my, you can talk as well? You're... certainly very interesting."

You shuffle on your feet, still feeling awkward with her face looming over you with wide eyes, like you're a science experiment to her. "U-Uh, you're not, um... I thought you would freak out a bit more."

She gives a smile. It's hard to tell if it's genuine or not. "So did I, but I've seen stranger things, believe me."

"...Like?"

"Well, I've been to an alternate dimension of pure chaos to fight a legendary ghost dragon."

You're not going to argue with that.

She pats you again. "I think you're going to make a wonderful..."
14511.title: Meeting Cynthia

choices: Ask Cynthia to call Caitlin over.
Spend some time with Cynthia first.
145111.content:
"...friend."

Oh good, I was really worried she'd say something like 'slave' there.

"I suppose I must seem rather frightening to you from this view." The giantess lies out her oepn palm, and you gingerly step on board the platform. She raises you up as she gets to her feet and walks over to her desk. It is remarkably clean, with only a desk lamp and a few notes and an open binder full of notes on some sort of history subject. She slowly lets you down and you step onto the desk, as she takes off her coat and sits down in the chair. It's much more comfortable to see here from this angle but her size still intimidates you. You're thankful she's a good guy at least.

The giantess opens a drawer and takes out a notepad and pen, holding it in her hands and gazing at you with those curious eyes. "Now then, I'm Cynthia. And you are?"

You tell her your name and she scribbles it down. You feel a bit uncomfortable, as if this is a science experiment to her, and she continues to ask where you came from, if you were always this size, and what exactly you were doing underneath her bed. To the disappointment of both of you, you mostly just answer with "I don't know."

"Hm." Cynthia says, obviously annoyed that she hasn't learnt much. However, her eyes regain that shine - she seems to be even more determined to find out. "I'll call my friend Cailtin. She'll find some answers, I'm sure." Cynthia looks back at you. "Or maybe I could call her tomorrow. I don't suppose a night with me would be too terrible, would it?" She winks at you.
145111.title: Interview Time

1451112.content:
You ponder that question as Cynthia changes into a comfortable nightgown. Unsurprisingly, it’s as pitch-black as the rest of her wardrobe.

Still feeling very intimidated by her skyscraper of a body, you stutter trying to tell Cynthia that you want to get yourself more comfortable with her before doing anything else, no matter how long that takes.

“Aww, I’d love to spend time with you.” Cynthia cooed, seeming to now treat you as the little brother she never had.

She slowly cups some fingers around you, scooping you into her palm and gently pressing you against her chest in a hug.

“Don’t be scared. I will see it to myself that you feel safe and happy.”

Cynthia brings her cupped palm to her face with you close to her soft lips. A warm gust breezes past you as the gentle giant gives you a little kiss.

*smooch *

It probably seemed like a little peck to her, but to you it was large and wet.

“Just take it easy for a while, alright? You deserve a lot of rest.”

She then brings her hand back out in full view.

“So, my ‘dust buddy’, have any ideas for a good night?”

You take a breath to say something, but a deep, ominous noise interrupts you.

*rrrrrrrrrrggggh…*

Cynthia makes a funny-looking grimace as she uses her free hand to massage her full belly and quell the eldritch noises within.

“Oooooph…I’m sorry if that spooked you. My dinner is taking quite the joyride in there.”

Not unlike the kiss, what may have sounded like a cute little groan to her was amplified to an unclean mix of a storm drain and a disgruntled Snorlax.

“How about a movie and some snacks, hmm?”
1451112.title: Quality Time With The Sweet Champ

choices: ...reaches down and picks you up. She wants to keep you.
...stands up and raises her foot in the air. Uh oh.
14512.content:
"...Ugh, what a strange bug."

That was not what you were hoping here. You're not even insulted that she's confused you for an ugly insect as you're a little too busy being terrified. The giantess frowns and you can't tell if it's from disgust or intrigue. Slowly the giant rises on one knee and you gulp for a moment, hoping that she's not going to do what you think she might do.

She sighs and...
14512.title: Friend or Vermin?

choices: Try and find some means of escape.
Accept the situation and get some sleep.
145121.content:
She sighs and she reaches down with her hand, her index finger and her thumb poised like the claw of a predator. Before you can even try to shout and reason and show your sentience, she grips your tiny body with her huge digits. Under normal circumstances, you'd say that her fingers are soft and gentle, but at your size, you feel like you're being pinned tightly between two pillars of flesh. As she pinches to lift you up, she knocks the wind from you and you wheeze, not able to bring yourself to say anything (let alone shout it). You can only sit there in her grasp and wriggle - and when you do that, she grips tighter and you feel another snap of pain through your body as she does. It turns out you can't do anything at all.

Cynthia brings the little squirming thing to her eyes, which bear down on you as she examines you with the utmost interest. You figure that she should recognise you as a human being, but maybe she just lives in a world with such strange things that this doesn't seem unordinary to her? You can't tell and don't - the whole "I'm being picked up by a giant woman" thing is taking up most of your attention. She blinks, apparently satisfied with the specimen, and she dangles you as she goes to her desk. You force yourself not to look down as she uses her other hand for something out of your sightline. You hear something being unscrewed and put to the side, as she then brings up the mystery object. It's a jar.

Ooooooh boy.

"I think I'll keep you," she says, moving her hand like a crane in a prize game, bringing her catch of the day to the jar. You make one more effort to shout and alert her, but your winded lungs can't bring up the decibels, and she casually drops you into the jar. You land with a bump, thankfully uninjured, and she clasps the lid on the jar (which happens to have breathing holes poked in the surface - you have a feeling this prison of yours has been previously occupied).

"Enjoy your new home," Cynthia tells you with a smile. It seems genuine, but you can't tell through the muffled glass.

With her business done, Cynthia suddenly checks her watch and notices that she is meant to be somewhere. With a cheery wave to her new specimen, she turns and leaves the villa.

You're trapped in a jar. You wish you were dreaming.
145121.title: Your New Home

1451212.content:
Surrounded by walls of glass, with your only exit barred by an immovable lid, you don't feel confident in your chances of escaping your new prison. Perhaps you can simply talk with Cynthia tomorrow and let your I'm-not-a-bug-ness be known to her. It's not like there is much else you could be doing right now.

Resigning to your strange fate, you do your best to get comfortable (and fail miserably - glass is, as you swiftly find out, not as pleasant as a mattress) and, after a long while, you eventually manage to drift to sleep.

A sound stirs you back to the waking world the following morning, and while you thought this whole 'being in a jar' thing was possibly just a bad dream, you come back to reality and find that it is, in fact, not a dream. The sound you heard was the sound of knocking on a door. Far away, through the jar and across the giant room, you can see the door to the room slowly opening. You expect Cynthia, but you are surprised to find that it is not her. In fact, it's...
1451212.title: Waking to a Stranger

14512122.content:
You are aware that Cynthia is an exceptional Pokemon Trainer, so she can leave her Pokemon unsupervised without much worry (unlike most novice Trainers, who will find their not-so-compotent Pokemon getting into trouble frequently.) As such, you're not entirely surprised when one of her Pokemon enters the room - while humanoid in shape, the canine features and fur are a clear indicator that you are looking at a Lucario. (The giant spike in its chest is also a dead giveaway.)

The Lucario doesn't seem to be interested in you, darting its eyes around the vacant room and sniffing ever-so-slightly, presumably to pick up some trace of where its Trainer has gone. You remain still in the glass jar - you're not really going anywhere - while the Pokemon investigates. You figure that it's going to leave you alone.

However, just as that thought crosses your mind, its eyes lock onto you. Its eyes seem vacant for a moment, and you remember that Lucarios can sense the auras of other beings, typically to tell if another creature is friendly or hostile. It would also seem that this works both ways, as color fades into the Lucario's eyes. It's...
14512122.title: The Giant Lucario

choices: Yes; you are safely in between the heel and sole, and she misses.
No; she makes sure to position her sole over you, and finishes the job.
145122.content:
"Honestly, the exterminator promised that there wouldn't be any more pests in this villa..." Cynthia says aloud to herself. Sighing, she raises her right foot. "Oh well, I think I can finish the job."

*

The giantess is looking down, her face in the heavens where you can barely discern it, but then it is blocked out by her raised foot. The dirty sole of her black boot blots out the ceiling lamp, casting a shadow over you. You are frozen with fear for a moment before your survival instincts finally kick in and you belt in the opposite direction. You sprint away just as she steps down, her boot slamming onto the floor and sending a shockwave through the boards. The vibrations nearly make you trip and fall, but you keep your footing and continue fleeing for your life. The giant scowls and raises her foot, aiming ahead this time. Again, you notice and quickly halt your progress, just as a wall of black smacks down and you are blown back by the force of the stomp. The world flips in chaos as you roll away, you feel something ache and snap, and when your roll is finished, you flop down in pain and exhaustion. It was barely a few metres (to you) and already you've lost? In all honesty, you knew you weren't going to escape, but it's only when you're lying there with something in your leg searing in pain and staring up at the looming figure above you that you accept it.

*

Cynthia raises her foot for a third and final time. "Stay still this time."

*

You can only stare as Cynthia positions her foot above you, and slowly but surely, it descends down to finish you off. There is no way you could survive this, right?!
145122.title: Cynthia's Bug-Stomping Boots

choices: Cynthia checks what's under her shoe, finding you
She doesn't check. Probably just some dirt.
1451222.content:
No chance. Her foot hits the ground, making a light squishing noise as you are struck by the massive shoe.
"Gotcha!" Cynthia can't help but feel satisfied by doing this. She has a bug problem for weeks now and finishing off the last one by herself feels fit. But in the end, it's just a bug, which is why she quickly forgot about it and went on with her day.

To you on the other hand, it was a bit more than just "Squash" and done. The immense pressure quickly turned your body to much, leaving nothing but a red splat.

...or at least that's what you thought would happen. Despite all odds, you're still kicking. More or less. Like a piece of Bubble Gum, you are stuck to the sole of the massive shoe. You assume that it must've been dumb luck, or maybe your new size had something to do with it? You did once hear that some bugs can't die from falling down great heights, because they have too little mass. Maybe the same applies here?

But you don't have time to think about that. Before you know it, you are lifted "high" into the air and soon crash back down. You might've survived the first step, but unless the next few finish you off, you're bound to be slammed into the ground a few more times as Cynthia goes on with her day.

Speaking of which, Cynthia simply went on with her day. Some paperwork regarding the Sinnoh-League, checking on her Pokemon via PC, nothing special. Though she can't help but feel as if something is stuck to her shoe, like some gum. It doesn't dawn on her that it might be you (or your remains), given the event left now impact on her. Unlike you.
She could check if something really is stuck to her, but on the other hand, its not like it's a nuisance.

She could check.
If she feels like it.
1451222.title: No; she makes sure to position her sole over you..

choices: The bottom end of the bed, near her feet.
The middle of the bed, near her body.
The top end of the bed, near her head.
1452.content:
For a moment, she seems to stop and you wonder if she heard your shriek. However, she is merely pausing to stretch and yawn, apparently tired. Your suspicions are confirmed when she begins to take off her coat and boats, and then ventures over to her cupboard and changes into her nightgown (which is, like her usual attire pitch black). Shuffling over to the bed, she gives another yawn and settles on the mattress. You hear it squeak and moan above you as she lies down and begins to get some rest. You can't say the same, though. You have no idea where you are or how you got here, and it seems this woman is your only hope for help. You guess you'll have to disturb her beauty sleep and wake her up for some help - sitting here and starving to death doesn't seem like a fun alternative.

You walk around beneath the bed, trying to find a means of getting up. Fortunately, you find a stack of books and papers by the edge of the bed, and you can make your way on top of them to get within reach of the bed covers. The material looks soft, but climbable. You grab onto it with both of your hands and it turns out to be true. You slowly but surely climb your way up with each grip of the sheets, and while the woman occasionally shifts in her sleep and you nearly lose your grip at one point, you eventually make your way to the surface of the bed. As you take a moment to catch your breath, you notice which part of the bed you climbed up to...
1452.title: A Sleeping Champion

choices: Risk it and spend some time here.
Play it safe and move on.
14521.content:
As for on cue, you climb up at the bottom end of the bed as Cynthia yawns and rolls over in her sleep, laying on her front and continuing to rest peacefully (or at least it would seem that way.) From your position, you can see her long golden hair far away in the distance, along with her huge body and her long legs hidden in the nightgown, and finally her bare soles before you. You advance towards her.

With the giantess sleeping on her front, her feet seem to slope for you, with her toes nearest to you and her heels raising up in the air. Their complexion is as smooth as the rest of her, and they look remarkably soft. Even from a normal sized perspective, they would seem large with their long size and slender toes, but from your scale they seem even more massive than you previously thought. Figuring that going back down would be pointless and going around might be dangerous if Cynthia rolls over again, you nervously climb onto her right foot. Her toes seem to twitch as you do, and you find yourself almost surrounded by her sole, which feels just as soft as it appeared. You contemplate whether or not you could spend a little more time here, but you wonder how sensitive Cynthia is and just how displeased she might be to find you if she awakes...
14521.title: At Cynthia's Feet

choices: ...Suddenly, Cynthia's hand reaches down to "scratch an itch!"
14522.content:
The giantess's body lays before you, spanning out almost as far as you can see to the left and right. Her black nightgown hides the smooth skin beneath, and even from your distance, you can see her body expanding and relaxing slightly with each breath. You admire the sight, but then you remember where you are and realize that you should probably find somewhere else to stand - it's a long fall back down to the ground, and she might be inclined to roll over in her sleep.

The nightgown is soft, but at your small scale, you can easily find a grip as you grab onto the material and hoist yourself upwards. The giantess mumbles slightly in her sleep and you freeze, but it seems like a coincidence and you keep climbing. Eventually, you find yourself on a large plain of black silk, and the ground rises and falls in a rhythm as the giant breathes. You admire the landscape as you walk around. Her seemingly endless legs stretch off to your right, while a certain pair of hills almost seem to loom from the left.

Before you can decide on a destination, you suddenly feel your step give way and you trip, falling flat against the "ground". The nightgown hid the belly button from view and you tripped over the "hole". The giantess mumbles once more, a bit more noisily than before, and you think you sense something wrong...
14522.title: The Land of Cynthia

choices: You try to wake her up.
You decide to venture inside her mouth.
14523.content:
You hear where you are way before you see it - the loud and reverberating noise of a woman snoring, only amplified by the fact that the woman is absolutely colossal and you're literally standing right before her face. Cynthia's visage fills your entire vision as her head rests on a pillow, endless curtains of blonde hair draping down around her shoulders and over her face, hiding her eyes. At this scale, her beautiful skin is even more perfect, flawlessly smooth and vibrant (even in the darkness.) Even as she sleeps, unaware of the tiny person standing on her bed, her amazing beauty and her goddess-like size makes her nothing short of majestic.

Cynthia snores once more, snorting a little as she loudly wheezes. Well, almost majestic.

As Cynthia continues her slobbery sleep, she unknowingly gives you a wide view of her mouth, her bright lips parting with each snore and revealing what lies within. Even in the darkness within, you can see her pearlescent white teeth gating the huge moist tongue within. With another noisy snore, her warm breath glides over you, inviting you inside. You try to snap out of it, since you came up here with better intentions. Then again, it's getting colder now, and there's nowhere warmer...
14523.title: Snoring Beauty

choices: ...Cynthia tastes you in her sleep and spits you out!
...Cynthia instinctively swallows you in her sleep!
145232.content:
It's incredibly foolish, but when are you going to get another chance...?

You head forward, almost hypnotized, towards Cynthia's yawning mouth as her warm breath envelops you. Being as careful as possible, you push your way between her lips and squeeze into the humid cavern that is her mouth. You flop onto her large tongue, which writhes and pulses as she breathes, and feel the slick coating on saliva on your body. The breathing echoes around you, and you see the 'cave' stretch with each breath, slightly outwards and then back in. It is so strangely organic that it's fascinating. You lay on her tongue, appreciating how soft and impressionable it is on your body, and feel yourself warming up with each divine breath of the giantess.

However...
145232.title: In Cynthia's Mouth

1452322.content:
Your warm rest is rudely interrupted when suddenly, her tongue shifts beneath you and tilts itself upward! Knowing what this means, you quickly try to grab one of her taste buds to avoid the long trip down.

Unfortunately for you, the saliva has lubricated her mouth to the point where it's very hard to get a hold of anything. This is also true for the uvula, which proves to be too slippery for you to even keep your hands on it. The only way is down...

------------------------------------------------------------

Cynthia's eyes slowly open as she notices a slight ticklish feeling in the back of her throat. Thinking it is just a weird itch or a small ant, she swallows it without much of a second thought. If it was anything, it’s her stomach's job to sort through it anyway.

Speaking of, she is a feeling a bit...peckish. Perhaps a little midnight snack wouldn't hurt, now would it?
1452322.title: Cynthia used Swallow!

choices: Yup. There's no time to waste!
Nope! Game Genie to the rescue!
14523221.content:
Even though it only took seconds, the "journey" into the champion's belly felt like minutes. After a slimy "massage" from the esophagus, you are squeezed out and land in Cynthia's stomach with a wet plop.

If you weren't contemplating just how small you were before, you definitely are now when you notice just how cavernous this place is. The distance from the stomach's entrance to where you are standing is comparable to a skyscraper! With this in mind, it would be very difficult to escape.

You also notice a small pool of acid next to you, with unrecognizable mush floating in it. Must be what's left of her dinner.

Before you can consider your options, the entire stomach flips, sending you and the acid tumbling.

------------------------------------------------------------

Cynthia gets out of bed and yawns. Looking to keep her stomach happy for the rest of the night, she motions towards the fridge, with her long, bare feet shaking the mysterious small world beneath her.

When Cynthia opens the door to the fridge, her stomach seemingly takes notice and gurgles loudly. She gently rubs her belly in an attempt to soothe it.

After some rummaging, she finds a small bag of yogurt bites. Satisfied with her discovery, the giantess heads back to her bedroom, her feet continuing their unintentional rampage.

------------------------------------------------------------

The sudden flip threw you into the acid pool. You quickly scramble out of the acid, expecting to feel like someone just sprayed you with a flamethrower. Does that gruesome sensation fall upon you?
14523221.title: Snacktime with Cynthia

145232212.content:
Much to your surprise, however, you don't feel any pain. Your clothes don't even melt off! Whatever brought you here also must have made you impervious to corrosion, logic be damned. "Just go with it..." you mumble to yourself as you regain your composure.

Your new world is then shaken by the giantess' movements. "She must be hungry," you thought.

*glllurrrrrrrrp*

You watch with a "F*** my life" look on your face as yogurt-mush rains from the not-really-heavens and coats the landscape.

------------------------------------------------------------

"Mmmmmm..."

Cynthia is happily munching on yogurt bites as she sits on the bedside.

"I wonder where that new trainer went. I haven't heard from since we planned that get-together for this weekend..."

To cap of the midnight snack, she grabs a water bottle from a nightstand and starts gulping away.

------------------------------------------------------------

After what you believed to be the last of the yogurt comes crashing down, you hear even louder squelching sounds from above, indicating that she is drinking something. Lo and behold, a waterfall cascades from the bio-gate above.
You thank whatever deity you worship for those swimming lessons you took a couple summers back. Otherwise, you would've been a goner right here and then.

You look around for some sort of solid object to rest on while the stomach churns away. Thankfully you bump into something...a wad of gum! Cynthia must've swallowed it by accident a while back. As gross as it sounds, this is your safest bet.

You hoist yourself on top and prepare to wait this digestive storm out. The only complications this might have is when excessive air gets tossed out, which of course happens right as you get comfortable. You were nearly knocked off by the preceding tremor.

------------------------------------------------------------

*b-uuuurp*

Cynthia sighs in pleasure with that small belch. That snack was delicious! It makes her a little gassy, but it was totally worth it.
She looks down at her belly, smiling with content. The rumbling as the food settles feels great. She places both of her hands on her tummy and gently caresses it.

Resting her head on the pillow, she sighs one more time and slowly falls asleep with a cute smile on her face and a hand resting on her rumbly belly.

------------------------------------------------------------

Thankfully, it didn’t take all that long for the yogurt to further dissolve and drain into her small intestine. Now, with a somewhat calmer stomach, you rest your head on one of the folds in the wall and try to get some sleep.
145232212.title: Nope! Game Genie to the rescue!

1452322121.content:
Opening her eyes slowly, Cynthia wakes up and stretches at bit. That long nap felt great!

Looking past a window, she is ready to start a new and exciting d-

It’s raining. Fantastic.

Sighing to herself, Cynthia decides to spend most of the day indoors, at least until the rain lets up. She has no major plans for today anyway, so she can unwind for a change.

"It's not often I do this," she thought to herself, "so I wonder how I should spend my 'lazy day...?'"
1452322121.title: Cynthia's Lazy Day

choices: She thinks back to that bug she swallowed last night...
She carries on without giving it too much thought.
14523221211.content:
She is about to change out of her nightgown and take a shower, but she is interrupted by a feeling in her gut.

*glooorg…*

“Seriously? That yogurt wasn’t enough?” Cynthia thought to herself.

Since she’s in no big rush to get things done, she decides to fix herself something to eat first. Taking a shower can wait for a few minutes.

------------------------------------------------------------

Due to going to sleep rather late, you are out like a rock, even with the giantess moving around as much as she is.

It took a glob of chewed-up sandwich to the face to bring you back to the harsh reality of Cynthia’s belly. Your eyes are quickly met with a pile of said sandwich and the stomach expanding and contracting in preparation to turn that sandwich into paste.

Here we go again…

------------------------------------------------------------

“That sandwich was yummy! Who knew that peanut butter and jelly would go so well together?”

With a hand to her belly, she puts the plate into the sink.

“Though…I’m still hungry…”

Cynthia grabs the nearest appealing food she could find: A bag of blueberries. She dumps some into a bowl and brings it over to a reclining chair next to the bookshelf.

”A snack and a good book. A good way to start the day if you ask me!”

She grabs the first book that catches her attention and sits down. With her feet propped up, the champion begins reading.

------------------------------------------------------------

Of course, of course it ain’t over yet. Just a few minutes after the stomach goes into high-gear once more, something blue and purple comes oozing in from above and crashes into the acidic bay.

You somehow find a way to keep yourself in a steady position by sticking yourself onto a stomach wall after mucus has coated it. You don’t know how this is working, but you just go with it, no questions asked.

------------------------------------------------------------

“Hmm, this book has a pretty slow start…”

Cynthia has quickly grown bored of the book after reading the first chapter. She heard it gets interesting a little later, so she’s able to keep reading. These blueberries and her own train of thought certainly help, too.

“It’s a bit of a shame that it’s raining outside. *gulp* I was hoping to look around…”

She glances out the window, recalling what she wrote in her diary some time yesterday while continuing to munch on her snack.

“I met another trainer yesterday. They weren't the most talkative fella I've seen, but they seemed pretty friendly. *gulp* I was going to set aside some time to do a little get-together with them, but I haven't heard from them yet...”

She leans back and pops another blueberry into her mouth.

“I've head stories about trainers mysteriously shrinking. *gulp* I can't think of any Pokémon that's capable of doing that. Nonetheless, I hope nothing bad's happened to the one I've just met. *gulp*”

Before she could muse further, Cynthia feels something quietly brewing from deep within.

*glrrk…shlrp…girrg…*

“*b-rrrmp…* Those blueberries are making a bit of a ruckus…”

Gently rubbing her belly, she looks into her bowl, surprised to only find a few remaining.

“Well, no wonder! I ate those like no other! *urp!* My stomach’s probably not used to this.*

She puts the book down and grabs the last of blueberries, dumping them into her mouth.

Continuing to rub her slightly bloated abdomen, she carries the bowl to the sink.

"Guess I'll go take a shower now. *gulp!* Wherever that new trainer is, I hope they're doing okay..."

The giantess walks into the bathroom to take a shower.

If she can think of the possibility of you ending up as her snack, she wouldn’t have to look very far…
14523221211.title: A Penny For Her Thoughts

14523222.content:
Even though it only took seconds, the "journey" into the champion's tummy felt like minutes. After a slimy "massage" from the esophagus, you are squeezed out and land in Cynthia's stomach with a wet plop.

If you weren't contemplating just how small you were before, you definitely are now when you notice just how cavernous this place is. The distance from the stomach's entrance to where you are standing is comparable to a skyscraper! With this in mind, it would be very difficult to escape.

You also noticed a small pool of acid next to you, with unrecognizable mush floating in it. Must be what's left of her dinner.

------------------------------------------------------------

"...nah, I'm not feeling that hungry..."

Cynthia lets her head sink into the pillow as her eyes go back to feeling heavy.

------------------------------------------------------------

It didn't take very long for her stomach to recognize something new inside, as acid has immediately begun seeping through the wrinkly walls and dripping from the "ceiling". You quickly find yourself trying to dodge these giant drops of acid.

Your only hope now is some kind of miracle. Is Lady Luck on your side today?
14523222.title: Power Nap

choices: Go over and try to get her attention.
Hide in her boots for now.
Tyr and find another hiding place.
1453.content:
