The giant unpauses and continues her walk, and you let out a sigh of relief. The tremors continue with each footstep before she finishes at her desk on the other side of the room. From your viewpoint you can now see the whole of her, albeit only from the back. She has very long blonde hair, nestled with two black decorations on each side of her head. She is wearing an equally long black coat, black trousers, and the aforementioned black boots. The giantess decides to change her appearance a little as she hums to herself, taking off her coat and hanging it on the back of the office chair in front of the desk. She then kicks off her boots, picks them up, and then walks back to the bed. For a second, you're worried that she will look underneath and find you, but she merely tosses them underneath and walks back to the desk.

She really likes the color black.

The giant opens one of the drawers and pulls out a book, quickly and quietly writing down on the pages - it is probably some kind of diary or journal. She seems wholly invested in it, and you stand under the bed, wondering what you should do. You could go over and get her attention somehow. It might be a challenge, and you're not sure if she will be friendly, but you can't imagine any other way to get help and find out how this happened. Then again, you could always try and hide somewhere for now. Despite what you would expect, her room is remarkably clean. There isn't even anything under the bed except for the boots she discarded, which seem like the only viable hiding place (for better or for worse.) You could also look for another hiding place, of course, though that would mean leaving from beneath the bed and thus she's more likely to find you. What to do?
1453.title: Dear Diary...

14531.content: You're small, lost, and alone. As frightening as it might seem, you reluctantly convince yourself that you need the giant's help if you want to figure out what to do next. As the giantess continues to write away, blissfully unaware of you, you scurry across the gigantic floorboards and towards her. As you stand at the base of her chair, you have to crane your neck up as high as you can to even get a glimpse of her face, high above in the sky. Even as she is idly sitting, she seems to loom over you, her attention placed far above you while you are left down on the ground below her. You stand by her stocking-clad feet, wondering how to possibly get her attention. You consider jumping up and down and shouting as loud as possible, but the desk gives you no good angle for her line of sight, and you can manage to see that she's wearing earbuds of some kind, probably listening to music. You ponder what else you could do...
14531.title: How to Get Cynthia's Attention...

choices: Get in front of her face.
145311.content:
With a panicking mind, you climbed up onto the toe of the woman's black high-heels. You prayed that she wasn't going to move, and thankfully she did not. She seemed preoccupied with her music, her head bobbing to the beat.

Jumping and shouting would be a no-go, and you doubted she could she or hear you by doing that. Hell, you doubted she could hear you even normally, but if you climbed her body, you could do one of two things. You could get in front of her face so she could hear you, or you could try and yank those earbuds out and get in her ear.

Whatever the case, you couldn't do either unless you were closer to her head, and right now you were down by her feet. Her pant leg was too high to grab for you, so you began shimmying your way up along her black stocking, which providing several handholds that you could use.

About where her knee was, the stocking ran out, becoming smooth skin that was a lot harder to climb. You pondered what to do as you climbed further, feeling you had to make a decision now.

Would you..?
145311.title: Climbing Up

choices: Play it safe and climb up her arm.
Be risky and climb up her body and chest.
1453112.content:
You decide it's best to just get in her line of sight so that she'll notice you straight away (and hey, getting another look at that sweet face is a good bonus.) Unfortunately, it still leaves you stuck down on her leggings, and you don't dare to try any further on her smooth skin where you'll probably lose your grip and fall all the way down. How are you going to get any higher?

By a fair amount of good fortune, Cynthia chooses then and now to adjust her position, feeling a little uncomfortable in her chair. She swings her leg up and you grip tightly for dear life as the world rotates and she rests her left leg on her right knee. You nearly fall off from the sudden inertia, but thankfully, Cynthia has good taste in stockings and the material is strong enough for you to keep hold (albeit with white knuckles.)

You shuffle your way onto the now-horizontal leg as you find yourself on Cynthia's lap. It's still only halfway, but you now see two options - you can climb up her right arm, which is at a diagonal angle and seems pretty easy and straightforward, or you can try the more difficult "scenic route" by climbing up her upper body. You doubt Cynthia will be the least bit pleased to find you wedged between her chest during your ascent, of course...
1453112.title: Getting a Boost

14531122.content:
You decided to take the risk and climbed up her body, you grab on the fabric of her shirt and pulled yourself up her stomach. You continue climbing until you’re under her chest. You manage to climb them and you take a break in her cleavage. They were nice and soft and cold.

Cynthia however felt an itch on her chest and she moved her hand to where you were. You try to move out of the way but her hand feels you and Cynthia notices something not familiar there. She looks down to see you in her cleavage lookin back up at her with a fear stricken face. Her eyes go wide and mouth agape as she gently picks you up with her hand.

At this point your completely terrified of how she’ll react. Cynthia had a slight blush on her face, embarrassed at finding you there.

“Wh-who are you? Why were you in my chest? And why are you so small?” She yells angrily

You don’t reply and just sit in her palm fear in you eyes.

Cynthia notices your fear and calms down slightly. “Sorry for shouting like that, I didn’t mean to scare you.” She says softly.

She pats you head with her finger and smiles making your feel better but still wary.

“My names Cynthia what’s yours?”

You silently say you’re name and Cynthia smiles. She continued to as you questions about yourself but you replied mostly with “I don’t know”. Cynthia was disappointed with the lack of information but didn’t mind.

She asks if you’re tired or hungry you gingerly reply with...
14531122.title: Be risky and climb up her body and chest.

choices: ...'scratches the itch' by planting her foot on top of you!
145312.content:
Climbing her would be, for lack of a better word, difficult - you figure that it's easier to just get her attention from your limited reach on the floor, rather than risking a tenuous climb up her mountainous body. Falling from such a height (from your perspective) onto her hard wood floor would be more than a little painful.

Tentatively, you step towards the only part of the giantess you can feasibly interact with - her large, looming feet. She is sitting on her chair, so her feet are resting just above the ground, her toes tipping against the floor while exposing her soles to you, hidden behind the dark layer that is her stockings. Even through the stockings, you can see the subtler details in her sole, from the delicate arch to her lengthy toes.

You snap out of your investigation and get back to the task at hand. Stepping up to her right foot (and feeling a slight tingle of warmth, no doubt emanating from her skin) you run your fingers frantically across her foot, trying to tickle her to get her attention.

Cynthia feels a tickling sensation on her feet, and...
145312.title: A Tickling Sensation for Cynthia

choices: Be patient and wait for an opening.
1453122.content:
The absent-minded giantess feels a slight tickle on her foot, and instead of looking down and spotting you as you had hoped, she instead decides to non-chalantly rub it out - by planting her foot down! You barely have enough time to react before a wall of sock-clad skin pushes down on you, like a large plushy weight. Fortunately, it's not anything too forceful, so you're intact and, for the most part, fine (although it certainly knocked the wind out of you, and you think you feel a bruise or two swelling up.)

With the sensation gone, Cynthia hums contently and returns to her work. Meanwhile, you are trapped under her foot, where it's even warmer than before. It's undeniably soft and, given that you weren't just instantly crushed instead, it's actually rather pleasant. However, being trapped won't solve any of your problems.

You could keep scratching and hope she pays a bit more attention this time, but then again, she could just rub harder this time, and you're afraid that anything stronger than before could be seriously painful. Then again, just lying here under her sole until she shifts her foot is your only alternative...
1453122.title: Trapped Under Cynthia's Foot

14532.content:
You stare at the large pair of boots, the openings showing you the soft fluffy interiors in some attempt to invite you in. You initially shrug it off as a terrible idea, but after a while, when you see one too many twitches and hear one too many hisses in the shadows, you decide that it's probably best to hide at least somewhere - you don't like the idea of fighting a spider when they're the size of a cow or something. While casting one more glance at Cynthia to ensure she's busy, you head over to the discarded pair of boots, which luckily landed on their sides. You creep your way inside, noting the cotton-esque material on the inside, which feels rather soft and warm. It doesn't smell particularly pleasant in here, but not terribly so - probably because it's currently vacant. You head further in and towards the toe of the boot. The sole of the shoe - which is now the right wall - is somewhat blackened and worn down, but fortunately, you'll be sleeping on the softer stuff tonight, as the boot interior remains fluffy and comfortable. You settle down at the furthest point in the boot and remain on station in case anything should happen, whilst you formulate some plan of action.

But of course, at some point, you doze off.

Your relatively peaceful sleep is eventually broken when...
14532.title: A Strange Shelter

choices: ...in the middle of the boot, underneath Cynthia's sole.
...at the end of the boot, underneath Cynthia's toes.
145322.content:
Your relatively peaceful sleep is eventually broken when you feel the boot moving. Your senses slowly return and, realizing what all this movement must mean, panic makes you fully awaken and you sit up, just in time to be knocked back down as the whole boot is lurched on its side and picked up by its giant owner. The boot is laid upright, next to its twin, and it leaves you trapped below.

You can see the giantess above through the boot's opening, completely unaware of your presence, and while you call out for help, she doesn't seem to hear you. You can vaguely see her slipping on the other boot first, and you can swiftly gather what's about to happen. You retreat as quickly as you can, just as the light is blotted out and a massive black-pantyhose-clad foot slithers down into the boot and heads towards you. Without any room to escape, you are pinned...
145322.title: Here Comes Cynthia's Foot

1453221.content:
You feel a warm, soft mass push against your back and knock you onto the fluffy sole of the boot. The giant's foot slides across your body before settling on top of you, and immense weight stopping you from so much as moving your shoulders. That doesn't stop you from trying though! As you do your best to squirm beneath the titan's sole the strong scent of stale sweat coming from her pantyhose begins to make you lightheaded. It was clearly a mistake entering the boot!

Unbeknownst to you, Cynthia feels a slight irritation against her foot. Deciding her pantyhose must have bunched out a bit, she decides a quick stomp should flatten it out.

Your stomach lurches as you suddenly feel weightless, and before you can process what's going on, a sensation of falling is replaced with crunching noise, and then oblivion.

Cynthia sighs in relief as the annoying itch on her foot goes away. Whatever it was it wasn't significant enough for her to give any further thought about.
1453221.title: Sole mistake

choices: Cynthia feels something in her shoe, and decides to play with it.
Cynthia doesn't feel anything, and goes for a walk.
1453222.content:
With nowhere to go, you find yourself pushed further and further into the boot, until you are wedged between the 'wall' of the boot's end and five wiggling masses that you recognize as the giant's toes. While the interior of the boot is fluffy and the toes are undeniably rather soft as they press around you, the lack of space makes things more than a little uncomfortable. On top of that, the giantess' pantyhose are already making you sweat from the humid and sweaty atmosphere. In the distance, you hear a contented sigh as the giant shifts her foot, practically smothering you under her large slender toes.

You struggle in your sweltering prison...
1453222.title: Pinned Under Cynthia's Toes

choices: Horrified and worried, she's so sorry!
Excited, her day keeps getting better!
14532221.content:
Finishing up her morning ritual, Cynthia felt a slight irritation under her toes. Worried it might be a stone she began to try and shift it away from her toes, she had just put on her boots and would rather not be bothered to change again after all!

The giant's toes press down on you, then try to rake you forward. You cling desperately to the boot fluff as the masses try to move you forward, but even if you hadn't you're stuck pretty well in the boot's toe. Your eyes begin to adjust to the darkness and you can once again make out the dark outline of the foot that is keeping you prisoner. The end spreads outwards and comes down on you again, catching your face in a net of sweaty nylon while you feel soft but implacable toes clenched down on either side of your body; they squeeze you mercilessly, causing a scream to become lost in your throat as the salty taste of her pantyhose assaults your mouth. This is the worst!

This was the best! Cynthia had been worried that something hard had gotten into her boots, but whatever it was was soft but firm, and actually felt great against her toes. She decided it wasn't a big deal that it was in there, on the contrary it was kind of fun. Giving a satisfied giggle she headed out for her day.

Far above you hear a faint giggle, almost immediately followed by chaos. Your entire world rushes up and back, then shifts down again, landing with a shrill booming noise, The ball of her foot leans in against you as her toes forcefully press you down into the soft ground, and then the process repeats. You realize that the giant is walking now. It abruptly stops, and you hear the jingle of keys above you. Before you can take in some deep breaths her toes scrunch up, pressing your face forcefully into the ball of her foot, eliciting another contented sigh as the titan enjoys the comfortable sensation of some insignificant object forced against her foot. As you hear the creaking of an opening door the rhythmic swinging of her walk continues, your hair becoming damp from the sweat that is begininning to leak through her pantyhose, coughing as the intense scent of her foot increases.

You startle awake as the toes begin to retreat away from you. How long had you been out? How long had you been conscious through that miserable event? As the black nyloned toes retreat from view, they give one last wiggle, as if wishing you farewell. For a moment you breathe deeply, trying not to think of how sore you are, and how sore you'll be tomorrow. You feel the room lurch upwards, and gravity shifts as you roughly slide down the fluffy boot leg, some slight carpet burn added to your list of injuries. You fall onto an even softer surface, a pale white, and your nose greedily takes in the fresh air. You nervously look up as you realize you are in the giant's palm, the awesome being looking down at you with an unreadable expression.

"A tiny person!" She booms, her voice...
14532221.title: Cynthia's toy

choices: Alder / N / Roxie & Marlon / Kalos Region

(Cilan, Chili, and Cress are grouped into a single entry as the Straiton Brothers.

151.content: Cilan, Chili, Cress, Lenora, or Burgh?
151.title: Straiton Brothers / Lenora / Burgh

choices: Try and get out of here.
1521.content:
You wake up to a very faint sound. It sounds enormous and powerful, but also very far away and thus quiet. It still manages to reach your ears and coax you into consciousness, and you open your eyes. You're not in your room anymore. It takes a bit of time to get up, but soon you are on your feet and it's only when you are standing and fully awake that you realise where you are. It's shocking to you but soon enough you can't deny the truth before your eyes.

It's a dressing room. A big dressing room.

The room has black wallpaper with bright yellow rims around the ceiling and the door, which has a single star and the word 'Elesa' printed proudly in the center. The carpet seems to be very rich and possibly velvet, yet it is a bright electrifying yellow. All around the room there are huge posters of several fashion models, but most of them focus on a blonde woman with blue eyes. The furniture in the dressing room is typically all about the costumes and makeup. You yourself have somehow wound up on the makeup table, with an enormous mirror towering behind you, reflecting the mess of lipstick, brushes and other tools of the trade scattered around you, seemingly massive to your size (which you measure to be about two inches, give or take.) There are cupboards and dressers and coathangers also around the room. There are several pairs of thick techno-esque headphones, yellow high heels and other items.The whole room represents its owner; a bright woman who loves the spotlight.

It takes a while to grasp the situation and get over the shock, but eventually the droning noise from far away dies out and you realize what it was; an audience.The audience has stopped and that means the show is over, and that means the show's star is coming back! What should you do? You can hang about on the dressing table and get her attention, but you have no idea how she will react - she might freak out, or maybe she'll be violent! You could perhaps find somewhere in the room to hide and see what's she like before you try getting her attention. Then again, you could always just run away - surely someone else must be around to tell you what the hell is going on?

You can hear footsteps from afar. She's coming back. You'll have to decide quickly!
1521.title: Elesa: The Shining Beauty

choices: ...laid out carefully on the pillow of Elesa's bed.
15211.content:
You decide it's best to face the music. You're going to need help - no matter the danger. The door opens and the star walks in. It is the same woman as the posters - Elesa. She is even more glamorous in person, as a walking giant celebrity that you feel you should be in awe of. Even from what seems like miles away (which is actually just a few metres) she takes up the whole world and the light bounces off of her golden hair and shiny clothing.

Elesa walks to the dressing table, apparently exhausted yet still taking the large powerful strides of a master of the catwalk. She hums the music from her performance and sits down at her dressing table, reapplying the makeup that got ruined by that awful glaring spotlight, taking off some of the less successful accessories from the modelling, and nodding to the tiny person on the desk.

Elesa stops. The two of you just stare at each other, shocked at the impossible situation you are both locked in. Her eyes widen in surprise, her lips move a little - the glitter on her lipstick bobs comically - and she just trembles for a moment.

"...AAAAIIIEEE!" She shrieks. You flinch back at the solid wall of noise that hits you, but at least it doesn't hurt as much as the huge hand that slams down and swats you.

*

You groan in delayed pain as you wake up, finding yourself...
15211.title: Shocking the Star

choices: The box opens, with a massive blue eye peering in.
152112.content:
You groan in pain, groggy as you came to. You remembered the encounter with the young woman named Elesa in the dressing room. That... could have gone better. She was so shocked she outright smacked you.

But, where were you now? A darkness was covering you; had you been out you long that it was apparently nighttime? Then again, even nighttime wasn't pitch-black, you couldn't even see ten feet (by your standards) in front of you.

You began walking, your feet rustling through some thin, brush-like material. Grass? No, it wasn't grass. It actually felt a lot more like... felt? It was strange, but you gained an insight on your prison when you bumped into something.

You cursed in pain as you kicked something cold and metallic, clutching your knee.

"What is this?" you said, putting a hand on the smooth surface. From the limited light, you could tell that it was silver, and quite a bit bigger than you.

You walked around the side of the wall, running a hand along the cold siver. When you got to the end of the tube, you saw an opening at what was apparently the tip, and a strange smell overcame you.

You peered into the hole and put a hand in, feeling an oily material.

"Eww..." you said, withdrawing you hand. The red stuff in the tube was...

Wait... red?

You paled as it dawned on you what this was. It was a tube of lipstick, and over there was an eyelash curler! Had that woman put you inside her make-up kit?

You screamed and ran away, not caring what you tripped over. Looking up at the sky, you could see that you were trapped, and when you hit up against the side, your felt prison would not give way.

"Let me out! Let me out, please!"

You collapsed against the wall, pondering what to do next.
152112.title: Make-Up Prison

choices: I guess this one fits well too.
15212.content:
Judging by the fact she might not take the news of your appearance very lightly, you decide to find somewhere to hide. You run into her closet, the easiest accessible thing you think you can hide in is her shoes. You quickly find a pair of furry boots to hide in. Without thinking, you climb in. You fall to the bottom and you smell a strange lemon scent (like perfume or lotion.) You lie down to rest again.

Your rest is disturbed when you feel the boot moving. You climb to the top of the boot and see that you're inside of a car with the girl. She's driving to a shoe store. Uh Oh. You stay out of sight while watching her walk into the store, walk into an aisle, and put the boots down. She gets out a box and takes off her shoes. She has shining, beautiful, white, yellow nailed feet with really long toes.

She puts on the other pair. "Huh, well what do you know. A perfect fit." She says as she grabs the other pair. Uh Oh. Again She puts her foot into the boot, and you're smothered with a gigantic, lemon scented foot. She shifts her foot around due to her feeling you. It goes on for a few more seconds until she says something.
15212.title: A particularly impulsive decision

153.content: Brycen, Drayden, Iris, or Shauntal?
153.title: Brycen / Drayden & Iris / Shauntal

15322.content: Would this be the Iris as the Gym Leader from the first Pokemon: Black and White game or the Iris as the Unova Champion from the second Pokemon: Black 2 and White 2 game?
15322.title: Iris

153222.content:
You wake up to a brief, but excruciating headache. You try to remember what happened to you last night, but everything is a dull blur. You remember your name, you know you were a Pokemon Trainer out to join the Unova League, and you had a dream of battling one of the Elite Four, possibly even having a chance encounter with the Champion, too. Then one day, while on Route 9, you encountered a Gothitelle while she tried to cross the road. You were ready to catch it with your faithful Pokemon companion while the Astral Body Pokemon was channeling her Psychic abilities.

And then... nothing.

Moments later, for Arceus knows when, you woke up with the most powerful headache in your life since that tetanus shot's aftereffects eight years ago. With your vision trying to focus into a dim darkness, you've felt something underneath your hands. It was cool, soft, silky. It felt like a blanket. Had someone found you lying in Route 9 and brought you here to rest? You couldn't tell. Although, there was some breathing somewhere in this room. It sounded so feminine. Maybe she was the one who picked you up and brought her here. The only question was, who was it, and where are you now?

As you blink your eyes a few times and look around the room, you notice that it was different somehow. Like everything was bigger then you normally hoped. Were you sleeping on a queen-sized mattress? Is this place a warehouse storage facility? What was going on?

As you look around, you turn your head, and suddenly your heart leaps to your throat. Lying down behind you was the figure of a colossal human, bigger than the smallest Wailord, lying on her side facing you, and snuggled up to her pillow. You jump back, skitter to the edge of the now-gigantic mattress and tried to scream, but no voice came out. You were in complete shock. Was this giant girl, born a giant, took you to a top secret base underneath Unova!? Or maybe that Gothitelle shrunk you to the size of a Joltik!? Either way, this was wrong on so many levels! There was no way that he was shrunken down to size and somehow teleported onto that giantess's bed!

That strangely familiar giantess's bed.

You've seen this girl before. When your eyes fully adjusted to the dark, you could make out the dim outlines of the girl's figure. She had light brown skin with that oversized dark violet hair. Her dress, cream colored with that enormous pink skirt tied off at the waist in a bow. And those white, open-toed sandals, flickering with every unconscious wiggling of her toes. You knew this girl from somewhere. You try and think, what was the name of the Champion, again? The Champion was a young girl, she beat the previous Champion, and she was a former Gym Leader of the Opelucid City Gym. Her name was named after a flower.

Was it Daisy? No, that wasn't it. Rose? Uh-uh. She didn't look like a rose. It certainly isn't Daffodil, either.

Iris? Yes! Yes, that was it! Iris, the Dragon Pokemon Trainer and current Champion of the Unova League! She's the most famous Trainer in the League! You've always wanted to battle the Champion ever since you've set off on your journey, and what an amazing coincidence that he was appearing as an insignificant bug before a dark-skinned goddess like her! You just needed to get her attention, first. If this was really a dream, or if you've actually been shrunken down, then you needed to somehow wake Iris up. You knew deep down that the Champion would help any Trainer in need. Now you had a choice to make: Should you touch her feet (the closest body part next to you), or do you climb over her body and yell in her ear?
153222.title: Unova Champion Iris

1532221.content:
You felt compelled to go over to Iris's sandaled feet. Her crossed feet were close to you, and if you happen to get a response from the physical contact, then it'll save you time instead of trudging over her mountainous body. As you walked over to those oversize load-sized feet, you stop for a moment to bask in the sights. You soaked in the colors of Iris's light ebony skin, her tan toenails to contrast the color of her skin, the white sandals to hold them together. As Iris took a deep, nasally breath, her toes scrunched up a little, making a shuffling, rubbing noise in response.

You had no idea why you didn't move, but any psychological test would indicate that he was being aroused by the sight.

Suddenly, Iris's left foot uncrossed from on top of the right foot and gently set itself down behind her right foot, snapping you out of her thoughts. You suddenly remember; this was no time to experience puberty for the first time, this was the time to get yourself unshrunken, dream or not.

Without any further delay, you walk up to Iris's right foot. A pleasant scent wafted into your nostrils, like an herbal foot cream mixed with moisturizing lotion. You didn't know what the actual smell of irises were, but if you did, this would be the only scent of Iris that you didn't want to forget. You reached out to touch the soft, delicate foot skin and rubbed it ever so gently. With the gentlest touch, Iris's foot suddenly wriggled, making it's giant owner moan a little in her sleep. You touched the surface of the skin, and the foot began to move back as the littlest sensation of your fingers made Iris...
1532221.title: Go to her feet

1532222.content:
You eventually made it up to her ear. You try to get her attention, but she does not hear you.
Should you go deeper or try another route?
1532222.title: Climb over her body

15322221.content: You decide to go deeper in her ear, hoping that she could hear you better. The further in you go, the more wax that infests her ear, to the point where you cannot go further. You decide this would be a good place to scream for attention. She hears your voice and....
15322221.title: Go deeper in her ear.

153222211.content: The whole place shifted and as you turn around, you see a huge digit worming through the wax. You can dive into the wax and escape, or take your chances by clinging to the finger.
153222211.title: Regards it as an itch

choices: Try and get out of her ear
1532222112.content: The wax is sticky, and not at all nice. You can see a large ebony digit slowly retracting, leaving you sitting there in the wax not knowing what to do. Should you:
1532222112.title: Dive into her limitless earwax.

choices: The top; you are near Caitlin's head.
The middle; you are near Caitlin's chest.
The bottom; you are near Caitlin's feet.
1542.content:
You wake up somewhere new. It is strange and unusual, and as your eyes open, all you can see is... something golden. You are confused, feeling out at the material. It feels like...hair? That's impossible.

Whatever it is, you're engulfed in a sea of the stuff. You can't see any way out and with no answers as to where you are, you decide you might as well journey through it. You swim through the golden locks, unsure of where you are. Sometimes you can see through gaps of the hair to see a white material ahead, which looks soft and plushy. As you push through the hair, you can hear some kind of noise, deep and rhythmic, but you can't tell what it is.

Eventually, you emerge from the hair and bump into... is this a body? You look and feel and examine the huge form before you and it's undeniably true - it is a sleeping giant! The golden material was its hair, the white material was a bedcover, and the deep noise was its snoring. As you try and grasp the revelation, you realize where you are on the bed.
1542.title: Caitlin: The Castle Princess

15421.content:
You are face to face with a sleeping giant. She is truly enormous, like a fallen Statue of Liberty, and you feel insignificant in her presence. She has very fair skin and her seemingly endless blonde hair is spilling over her eyes. She is certainly beautiful but you can't help but be intimidated, especially as she snores and shifts in her sleep, making the whole bed bounce and nearly trapping you in the hair again. You manage to keep your stance and she gets back to rest, but you are still frightened and unsure what to do. You feel that you should at least try and wake her up... somehow.

She is sleeping on her side but you can easily climb up and reach her ear. You figure you could shout into it and hope that it's loud enough to wake her from her slumber. Alternatively, you could wake her up from her eyes or nose or mouth or whatever you think could work. You think of what to do while the giant sleeps peacefully...
15421.title: The Face of the Princess

choices: Her eyelid flitters open and her eye focuses on you; you woke her up!
She yawns, opening her mouth wide - and you fall inside!
154212.content:
She looks like she's not going to wake to sound, no matter how loudly you shout in her ear. You figure you'll have to move to a different plan with a different sense. After a while of thought, you get an idea; opening her eyes! You'll just have to get on her face and tug her eyelid open or... something.

As the giantess breathes in and out in her slumber, you scramble over to her cheek and carefully climb your way onto her face. It is so alien to not only be in the presence of a giant person, but to be climbing on them like this. At this scale, the details are very clear to your eye - she has very thin features, with faint lips that tremble with each breath and a narrow dainty nose. After another while - this time spent admiring the giant's face - you get back to the plan and walk over to her right eye. You tug at her eyelashes and you feel her eyelid budge a little, but not enough. You tug a little more and she murmurs, but still nothing. Annoyed at this deep sleeping woman, you tug even harder and you get a reaction.
154212.title: Hush Hush, Eye to Eye

choices: Try to climb back up her tongue and push your way out.
Carefully inch down towards her throat and kick her uvula.
1542122.content:
For a moment, you think you've gotten a reaction from the sleeping giantess - you can feel her moving in some way from that last tug. What you were hoping for is maybe her eyes to flicker open or something else to let you wake her up. Unfortunately, Caitlin is infamous for being a very deep sleeper, and she can barely feel you. However, the tug does make her react, and as you hear a deep sound that seems almost like an enormous yawn, you feel the "ground" give way as her lips part from her yawn and you tumble down into her mouth.

You panic immediately and only just manage to focus yourself into grabbing onto something. On instinct, your arms reach out and wrap themselves around the nearest object you can find. You pant as you look down, the dark abyss of Caitlin's throat threatening you like a bottomless pit. Hot air rushes upwards from it as she continues to yawn, stretching her mouth as she does, giving you a well-illuminated view of your predicament. You're grabbing onto her large tongue, almost pressing yourself against the soft wet muscle so that you won't fall down. It seems to quiver at your touch, as Caitlin subconsciously tastes you on her palette. Rows of pearly white teeth line around above you, and the outside world taunts you through the mouth-shaped hole above you. Caitlin finishes her yawn and she closes her mouth, shutting you in darkness.

As a trickle of saliva splatters on your head and rolls down you, you try to think of what to do. You can't hold out forever, and eventually you'll slip down her throat to your end. A potentially pleasant and uniquely enjoyable end, but an end nonetheless.
1542122.title: Vertical Tongue Climbing Action

15421221.content:
You figure that you should try to climb back up to freedom. Doing your best to hold on for dear life, you seize a grip on the rising wall of saliva and flesh that is the giant's tongue and begin your ascent.

Unfortunately, your best isn't good enough.

Your hands can't find any precipice on the slick and slobbery tongue, and your efforts only served to 'tickle' the sleeping giantess even more, making her tongue quiver. You try desperately to cling to something, but the chaos of her quivering mouth shakes you too much and you find yourself falling, down to her throat. On instinct, the sleeping giant seems to feel something in her throat, and she swallows it down. You are enveloped in darkness and warm kneading muscle as you are squeezed down her throat, hearing the inner workings of her body as her heartbeat thumps somewhere in the darkness and you hear a distant content sigh from above. You are pushed all the way down into her stomach, and you realize what is about to follow...

As you are digested in Caitlin's stomach, she rolls over in her sleep, completely unaware that anything ever happened.
15421221.title: Eating in your Sleep

choices: Try and wake her up by tickling her.
Do something else while she's asleep.
15423.content:
You bump head first into the feet of the sleeping giantess. They loom over you, as you don't even reach up to her toes, which seem to twitch and wiggle every so often as the giant naps. Her soles are almost a bright pink, and they are completely spotless with barely a wrinkle on the perfect skin.

You press a hand on the skin and it feels soft and clean. You run your hand up and down to get a better feel and the giant murmurs a little - she can feel that. Maybe if you tickle her soles, you will get her attention? Another question is do you want her attention? After all, it's not often you find yourself in this kind of situation...
15423.title: The Feet of the Princess

choices: Caitlin wakes up and notices you
She either doesn't wake, wakes but remains unanaware, or mistakes you for a bug
154231.content:
You decide that it'd be too dangerous to try anything other than contact her. At your size it'd be extremely difficult (not to mention dangerous) just to get to the floor- then, you have no idea where you are. She could live by herself and you'd have to trek possibly miles before you could find another person. And then you wouldn't probably have another chance at one that's calmly sleeping and easy to approach. That's not even getting onto how to get people to notice you from the ground. No, there were just too many things that could go wrong. This was your best chance at being noticed.

You take a few deep breaths and begin to mentally prepare yourself for what you're about to do. You want to do this right; with just a flick of her foot the wrong way she could squish your frail little body like a bug under her pretty sole without even waking up.

Gulp.

How did bugs live like this again?

Running over a few choices in her head, you decide it'd be safest to get attention from your current location- it'd be easier for her to notice you near her face, but it'd take too long to trek, and there's no body part more sensitive to irritation than the bottom of feet. So you could tickle her foot, hope she wakes up and doesn't just rearrange herself- possibly rolling her feet on top of you and squish you. Or think you're a bug in her drowsy state of mind and do flick you off her bed, possibly breaking all of the bones in your body.

Ugh.

So when she wakes up, jump, scream, do whatever you can to help her identify you as a tiny person.

Taking another few deep breaths, you look her up and down again. From your current location, positioned a few feet (from your perspective) away from her feet (which were conveniently just barely sticking out of her sheets) and between them, you could just barely see the rises of her body under her bed spread in the distance. She was unimaginably huge compared to you, her big toes almost as big as your entire body. You can just the slightest glimpses of her face, uncovered by her blanket and propped up into vision by several frilly, large pink pillows. You couldn't see much, but you could tell she was as pretty as she was big- flawless features and soft, smooth, feminine skin. For a moment your heart skips a beat.

Great. Pretty girls are already intimidating enough when you're the same size, now you're dealing with one that's a hundred times your size. Sigh. For a moment you appreciate every average, approachable girl you've ever met in your entire life.

Taking one last deep breath and one last run over of your plan in your head, you approach her delicate, and proportionality dainty but, from your perspective, massive foot and place your hands on her soft soles. Closing your eyes in concentration and nervousness you push in further against her plush skin and begin rubbing, hoping to stir sleeping beauty.
154231.title: Try and wake her up by tickling her.

choices: Caitlin thinks you were peeking on her as she slept and shows no mercy
1542311.content:
While the moment seems to last hours due to how (understandably) tense you are while rubbing her soles, it's not long in actual time before the massive girl in front of you begins to stir.

You can't see it past her sole but, her eyes groggily flutter open, and she proceeds to let out a large yawn and stretch her arms up lazily to help push away the tiredness. Although you still can't see this, she naturally shifts her body slightly, which to you is basically a small earthquake, causing you to lose your balance and slip closer towards her. At first you begin crawling away, but thankfully your brain shifts out of pure survival mode momentarily and you realize you need to keep contact with her to make sure she can feel and, hopefully, notice you. Sliding back towards her foot you grab at it and once again start to tickle her. Although the fact that you fell over means you can only reach her heel, your plan seems to work; after just a moment she bends upward at her waist, her legs still sticking out straight. She begins to move her huge hand in your direction, presumably to scratch her foot. Her, eyes only half open and clearly not aware, look right at you and she just kind of casually gazes for a second.

Then the hand stops. Her eyes widen, and her jaw literally drops.

YES. SHE SEES YOU. Success.

After a brief moment of your heart practically jumping out of your body, your stomach begins to sink again.

She was already pretty intimidating with just her foot leaned over your tiny body, but now her entire being, which was immeasurably huge from your perspective, now menacingly loomed over you, the light in the room unfortunately being cast in the most intimidating way, from behind her, casting a huge shadow over (from your perspective) at least ten times your size in any particular direction. Your mind tries to comprehend that this is still a person, that she's most likely a sweet girl, and lord knows she's incredibly beautiful, but the primal part of your brain is screaming out, mentally beating you up for just standing there, especially with her hand frozen mid air, poised towards right where you were standing. The instinctual part of your brain eventually takes over and it screams just one action to you.

Run.

As fast as you can, you pull yourself up, both physically from being ass down on the bed and mentally out of your trance, turn around, and sprint harder than you ever have before.

Not that there's anywhere to go... not that you're thinking about that.

Either way, it's only a few seconds of intense sprinting before you fall flat on your face, your foot getting caught on a fold in the sheet, which is ankle high to you, even though it normally wouldn't even register at your full size. Just another cruel reminder of your diminutive stature. You push yourself up onto your hands and knees, crawling, trying to build up enough speed to get back into a sprint. Before you can get hardly any further, though, you feel a tight clamp just underneath your arms, and then a strong feeling of vertigo.

Panic mode sets back in. Without even realizing that you're being picked up by the titaness, two of her fingers yanking you up by your armpits as if you were a toddler, you begin to wildly thrash, but she has a firm hold of your torso, leaving you just swinging your head, arms and legs wildly in the air without any real aim. Eventually the feeling of vertigo stops, and you begin to slightly calm down, enough to regain control of your limbs. Breathing heavily and heart racing, you look up to see your face to face (or, well, face to body...) to the girl, who's look of shock has subdued to a mixture of interest and curiosity.

At first there's only a dead silence throughout the room. Then, you feel a profound sadness. Dangling in the middle of the air, your literal entire, now horrifically delicate life now between a young girl's fingers, the stress of the whole situation finally hits. You ran out of adrenalin, and now only have your fear and instinct left. First, you just break eye contact, looking towards the ground. Then the soft whimpering comes, with no words at first. Then you begin to mutter quietly, slowing building up until you're outright sobbing, "please don't hurt me", "please put me down", among lots of stress filled gibberish and unfinished sentences.
1542311.title: Caitlin wakes up and notices you

choices: She doesn't believe you- uh oh
15423111.content:
Your entire body tenses and shakes as you continue to cry, small tears possibly not even noticeable to the titaness in front of you. You've never felt more scared in your life. The slightest, even accidental movement from her, could snuff you out in a hundred thousand different ways, each one flashing vividly in your mind as you hang limp and can do nothing but sob harder when the thoughts are too hard for you to bear.

But then, suddenly, your body shifts. You feel yourself settle into a laying position, though not by your own movement. Clarity coming back, you see the girl shifted your body into a laying position on her palm. Then, her thumb gently wraps itself around you, softly pressing you into her palm, almost like a hug. You couldn't tell if this was intentional or not, but at the very least, she's given you a sign of friendliness, or at least concern for your well being. A few sniffles and you regain the courage to look up to her face again.

She still had a curious look, but her gaze was less piercing and demanding, and perhaps now even vaguely concerned.

After opening her mouth to speak a few times but not seeming to be sure what to say, she finally starts. "Hey... I'm not gonna hurt you, or anything, but..." Her talking was sheepish and awkward, but she had a very pretty voice, which in itself kind of calmed you a little bit. "...I'd kind of like an explanation, if you can handle it..."

You gulp a bit, trying to work up the confidence to speak. You start to speak, but the words get caught in your throat. You try again, starting from a different angle, but a sob makes you cough suddenly. Thankfully, the pretty giant seemed understanding and patiently allowed you to collect yourself. After about a minute of failing to speak, she sets a finger to your mouth mid speech.

"I still want an explanation of why there was a little inch tall person crawling around... inside my bad... while I was asleep..." You were worried she'd think of it like that. "...But you seem pretty upset, so for now I'll trust you didn't have bad intentions. You need some water?"

Wow. Weren't you lucky. You ended up with someone far more understanding than anyone has any business being considering the situation. You nod and utter a weak "please". Setting you on the nightstand next to her bed, the girl gets up and walks out the room, leaving you alone, presumably to get the water she offered.

This gave you a chance to finally take in your surroundings. It was clearly a bedroom; a large, queen sized bed, many girly Pokemon plushies (which now towered over you, another upsetting reminder), a vanity mirror with some make up, a closet filled with night gowns and dresses, which seemed to be her clothing of choice... Altogether she was clearly a high class lady, despite how young she looked. Your thoughts began to retreat back inward, worrying about how you might be able to get her to believe your absurd story and not just squish you thinking you're some weirdo scientist pervert who shrunk themself intentionally to get into bed with her...

Although both sounded weird as hell, the latter was the more likely to be believed. Maybe you could lie and make something up that's believable? You felt nervous and began running a bunch of scenarios that would be more believable in your head, before your thought process was interrupted by both the fact that you couldn't deal with the pressure well enough to think and the fact that Caitlin had now returned.

You now had your chance to really appreciate her. She had clearly taken the chance of getting you some water to freshen up a little bit- you were kind of surprised by this, but given that it looked that she was fairly high class and had just woken up, I guess it wasn't too hard to believe. It broke your trance as she set down a bottle cap filled with water at your feet and knelt in front of the night stand to remain face to face, possibly to be less intimidating for your sake, not that it actually helped much...

"Obviously I don't have any cups your size, but hopefully you'll be able to get a drink out of this." She stood back up, then sat back down onto her bed, pulling her legs up to sit indian style. You gulped, as she towered back over you now, but tried not to look at her and paid more attention to getting a drink.

Unfortunately, even the generous gift of water was a bit of a reminder how small you were- the tall brimmed bottle cap now stuck up just below your knees and was as wide as a small drinking fountain. Still, you graciously knelt down and cupped your hands together, dipped your hands in and drank. Once you had your first drink you realized just how dry your throat was, and worry that your little tantrum that happened as a result of her picking you up didn't go on too long. How embarrassing.

A blush graced your cheeks and you mentally slap yourself. Now wasn't the time to worry about first impressions.

Taking a few last drunks and pushing the thought that you might have heard the titaness to your right quietly giggle at your attempts to drink, you look back up at her sheepishly.

"Okay... I think I can handle giving you an explanation now..."

And so you decide to tell her your story for how it actually happened- not that you had the energy to make up a lie right now, anyway.

How does she react?
15423111.title: Your "captress" takes pity on you

choices: Caitlin has once again decide to take pity on you- she'll let you stay with her
Caitlin isn't willing to help- either abandoning you or something more violent
154231111.content:
After you finish your story, there's silence. The giant young girl had been, and still was, watching you intently. To the average person her gaze probably wouldn't be very intimidating, in fact most probably would describe it as "soft", but to you it felt like you had been impaled. All you could do was avoid meeting her gaze directly, sheepishly staring to the ground, biting your lower lip tight.

"You know... that story is really unbelievable.." Uh oh. "But even if you were a weirdo, I don't think you'd do something as dangerous as this. This is too much. And the way you broke down before..." Pause. "...I believe you."

A huge weight was lifted off your shoulders and it took all of your strength not to just pass out upright from the sudden release of tension.

"But I'm not sure what I'm going to do now. I have enough room to house you here with me until we figure something out but I don't really feel comfortable just bringing some random person into my life, even if they're tiny..."

Shit, you didn't think of that. You could only think far enough of getting noticed so you'd be safe in the short term, what now? Your brain was too stressed out and trying to think of a solution hurt your head...

"Well, let's start with introductions. What's your name? Where were you from before this?"

Good, you found someone who was smarter than you. Still, it was intimidating talking to her, so you keep your gaze down. "Um... my name is (insert yours here). I'm from Cinnabar."

"...Cinnabar? The Island? In Kanto?" Although you're still avoiding eye contact, you can see her eyes widen out of the corner of yours and her lips curl down a little bit.

Your stomach sinks. "Y-yes in Kanto. Isn't that where we are? Why would you ask?"

It was just a stupid little slip of the tongue. It was an accident. She didn't mean to ask. The stress of the situation clouded her head for a second, everything is fi-

"No, you're in Unova right now."

Unova?

Fuck. Shit.

Your stomach drops through the floor.

Unova and Kanto are on separate continents.

You finally can't handle any more of this. You feel another sinking feeling then collapse and pass out on the spot.

What do you find when you wake up?
154231111.title: She believes you

choices: Play a game to try to get more comfortable with each other
1542311111.content:
You regain consciousness on top of Caitlin's nightstand, at first alone in the room but quickly joined by sleeping beauty.

"I was wondering when you'd wake up. You're welcome to stay in my home until you figure out how you want to approach finding help. We're currently in a rather extravagant villa that I own so it's no trouble letting you stay here. I went out and bought some doll clothes for you to use while you stay here while you were asleep, so don't worry about that." She idly talked to you while making her bed and setting a few things aside, surprisingly casually all things considered.

"Um, t-thanks. It means a lot." You stammer, still a bit uncomfortable with talking to someone so much bigger than you that you don't even know.

"It's no big deal. I get a bit lonely here anyway." She stops her busywork, and looks down a little and blushes. "Besides, you're kinda cute, all little like that."

You blush a bit yourself. "Anyway," Caitlin quickly moves on before the subject can be talked about any more, "you're probably hungry, right?" Your stomach growls in affirmation, prompting a bashful smile from you and a amused smile from her. "Come here, I'll take you to my kitchen." She lowered her hand for you, which you cautiously stepped onto, still a bit wary despite her kindness. She brought her hand close to her, leaning it against her stomach to help keep it steady for you.

Once she reached the kitchen, she set you on the table and opened her fridge, pulling out a plate of assorted fruit, some in normal sized pieces and others cut into very small pieces, the latter presumably for you. "I didn't know what you'd like to eat, but I figured fruit is a safe bet. Would you like some?"

You nodded, and she set the plate next to you, sitting by the table to eat her pieces too. You climbed onto the plate and began eating. After a few bites you looked up at Caitlin, who was munching on a piece of her fruit with a small smile on her face as she watched you. You blushed a little. "Um, what's that look about?"

"It's funny watching you get all messy trying to eat like that." It's true, fruit juice had pretty much completely stained your clothes, which you hadn't noticed in your hunger. "Don't worry, I gotta run some errands after this, you can take the time to wash up."

True to her word, when you both finished eating you she brought you into her bathroom, where she gave you a small sliver of soap, a shallow bowl of warm water, a towel, and a clean set of the doll clothes she gave you. "Feel free to take your time, it'll be awhile before I get back."

Once she gets back, what's the next thing you both do?
1542311111.title: Bonding

15423111111.content: What game do u play
15423111111.title: Play a game to try to get more comfortable with...

choices: No - she shifts around in her sleep, and accidentally pins you under her feet.

1542312.content: You give it your best, trying to wake the sleeping princess as you massage as hard as you can, hoping that she will feel your small hands in her slumber. Occasionally, she shifts her foot a little or her toes twitch a bit, but otherwise she makes no sign of noticing. Just when your arms begin to ache and you feel that this might not work, a low rumble comes from further down the bed. It takes you a moment to realize that it is a yawn. Expectantly, you lean around and look at the giantess, who has indeed yawned. However, from this angle, you can't quite tell if her eyes have fluttered open or not. Has she really woken up?

choices: She is far too sleepy, and didn't notice you.

15423122.content:
With another mighty yawn and a stretch of her arms, you think you see her eyes open. Success! Now to get noticed...

However, as she slowly rises to a sitting position - casting a dreadful shadow across your tiny form as she does - she rubs her eyes lazily and mumbles quietly to herself. Her momentously long hair has sagged over her face, and she seems far too tired to notice or care. Her eyes are now hidden beneath a blonde curtain. Even as she sits up, she seems to sway a little, as if "being awake" is a strange and unusual sensation for her. You were hoping this lady would be a bit more alert and attentive when she woke up, but as she continues to rub her eyes and moan, you realise that if you don't make an effort to get noticed now, she might pull herself out of bed and leave you alone here (or, perhaps more likely, she will just collapse back to sleep and you'll be back at square one again).

With no other plan of action, you take a deep breath and shout at the top of your lungs, while jumping up and down like a maniac. The girl doesn't seem to hear anything for whatever reason - the reason being the earplugs hidden beneath her mass of blonde curls - but she takes a moment to stop rubbing her eyes and looks in your general direction, down by her feet.

Did she notice you? On second thought, you're not sure if that would be good or not...

Either fall into her shoes, and wait try to get her attention again from there. choices: He noticed you, and is coming over to get a closer look.
He dismissed the sound as something unimportant, and is going over to his bed.
15512.content:
You wake to the feeling of rough plastic underneath you. With a groan, you push yourself up and open your eyes. You seem to be in a child's bedroom, with toys scattered all over the place. Looking around, you see a train car in a basketball hoop, building blocks all over the place, and train tracks that have parts thrown about. One of those parts is the surface you woke up on. You shudder, thinking to yourself, "What kind of child would deliberately do this?" Whatever kind of kid that was, you don't want to meet them.

The door opens as you're thinking, and you instinctively turn toward the sound. Instead of a child with attitude problems like you expected, you were looking at a tall, slim, green-haired young adult, appearing to be in his early twenties or so. You notice his hair was tied in a low ponytail, and he wore a white collared top, grey pants, a black undershirt, green sneakers, a necklace that reminded you of a planet or a UFO, multiple bracelets, a black and white cap, and a Menger sponge clipped to his waist. Overall, this man seemed strange, but also somehow calm, despite the disastrous room that seemed to be his.

Of course, the real trouble came from the fact that he was walking straight towards you. With nowhere to run, you scream for help -- it's your only useful option at the moment. The man stops for a moment, looking in your direction. You stare into his cold blue-grey eyes for a moment, hoping that he didn't think you were an illusion -- or worse, a bug.

The giant resumes moving again, still heading in your general direction. What are his intentions?
15512.title: N: The Plasma King

155121.content:
Each deafening thud that slams the ground rattles your bones as the giant slowly approaching, his massive figure dwarfing you as he gets closer and closer, his strange blue-grey eyes remaining locked on you. You subconsciously find yourself inching away, but there would be no use running - one of his steps could cover dozens of yours. Despite the massive weight he seems to be from your perspective, you at least notice that he's walking sort of tentatively, with his steps being slow and leaning away from you. It seems he doesn't know what to make of you (which could be very good or very bad, depending on the circumstances.)

A huge sneaker lands nearby you, shaking you to the core once more, as the other takes its place alongside it. Your neck hurts from craning so far upwards to keep eye contact with the mysterious titan. His eyes blink, once, then twice, as he seems to be deciphering what exactly he's looking at, and finally, his lips part to say...

"My, what a strange insect."

The giant's voice sends chills down your spine (and not just because of how strangely serene he sounds, or the unnerving volume either.) How could he possibly mistake you for a bug? Is there something wrong with him? Or perhaps there's some illusionary trickery afoot. You can't help but tremble a little as the giant seems to tilt his head, discerning what to do with the 'bug' at his feet. You shout out to plead that you're human, and even wave your arms up and down, but your efforts seem to fall on deaf ears for some reason. Is the boy hypnotized or something?!

The giant's intentions for you become abundantly clear as he...
1551212.title: An Insect before the King

15512122.content:
It doesn't take much guesswork to figure out the giant's plans for you as you notice his towering leg shifting, beginning to arc up so that he can position his foot above you...

"Sorry," he says, with a surprisingly genuine amount of sincerity in his voice. "But Father cannot abide insects in here."

His massive shoe settles above you, high in the sky, and you peer up, admiring the details in the shoe's sole - the green material has intricate patterns running across it, and not a single spot of dirt or debris marks it. It's like he never goes outside (or has his shoes cleaned regularly.)

You quickly realize that this probably isn't the best time to be admiring footwear, and self-preservation kicks in, causing you to dive backwards as he steps down, causing a mighty tremor as the bus-sized foot crashes into the spot where you were standing not one second ago. It shakes you to your core, thinking about what it would be like to be beneath such power. The giant inspects closely, and notices his missed shot. Still looking sad about the circumstances but determined to get rid of you, the giant begins raising his other foot, and you swiftly turn around and flee from his incoming wrath.

You sprint as fast as your feet can carry you, as his much-larger feet attempt to stamp you out. He misses once, then again, but you know that you can't keep this up forever. You surge yourself towards the safety of the bed's underside, where his deadly shoes cannot reach you, just as you feel a cold shadow over your back. It seems he finally figured out to stomp where you're going to be...

Is your exhilarated sprint enough to reach the sanctuary that is Under the Bed?
15512122.title: N the Exterminator

choices: "Ugh, forget it." N leaves you be... for now.

You flee further into the darkness and the carpet fibers, safe from the giant's thundering stomps, and catch your breath as best as you can.

As you do, you see the giant crouch down and peer underneath the bed, blotting out the light as his large emerald-green eyes flicker around to try and find you. In an attempt to catch you again, he stretches one of his enormous arms forward, grasping around in the darkness for you, but fortunately, you are beyond his reach. With a disappointed sigh, the giant gets back to his feet.

What will he do next, you wonder...?
155121221.title: Safe from N's Wrath

155122.content:
The green-haired giant has turned his head away from where you were, looking straight ahead, and you realize that he's written off your cry for help as some faraway or random noise. He continues his walk, his monolithic legs striding across the enormous room in record time, each step shaking you to your bones. Thump, thump, thump. You get brief glances of the rubber soles of his green sneakers, practically immaculate, with only one or two strands of the carpet fibers buried amongst the treads... and you swiftly figure that you should get out of the way before you join them. You dive to the side as his foot slams down near where you once stood - THUMP - and the force alone knocks you off your feet and onto your behind.

You get a brief moment where the giant towers over you, his figure so colossal that it sends shivers down your spine, before he finishes his walk, standing by the bed. Taking a moment to stretch, he kicks away his sneakers to the side of the bed, revealing his soft white socks, which he then sits on the edge of the bed to take off. You continue calling for his aid, but the giant seems to be dismissing the 'noise' he heard entirely now... or perhaps he is too tired to hear? A yawn confirms your suspicions, and he swiftly removes the rest of his clothing (save for his underwear, of course) and places them beside the bed near the sneakers, before curling up under the sheets and trying to fall to sleep. You give one more shout, just to be certain, but he doesn't respond.

The door to the room is closed, so you aren't leaving any time soon, which means you have little choice but to climb up the bed and get the giant's attention - hopefully before he is fast asleep. Using the long-hanging sheets of the bed and several tools and bits from toys around the room, you enact a makeshift plan of clambering up the bed. Now on top of the massive mesa that is the giant's bed, you notice that you climbed up near...

155122212.content:
As you move your hands in frustration, the ground beneath you shifts violently. Your initial reaction to hold on to the smooth skin beneath you is cut short by a ceiling of flesh collapsing on top of you, burying you between two flawless ivory walls. You begin to panic, but as you try to struggle you realize that you're simply caught too tightly between the giant's toes, and eventually stop, taking deep, lotion scented breaths as you try to calm down. Finally you're thinking clearly again, wondering if perhaps your captor will notice you between the tickles and your recent squirming, but that question is brutally answered as you hear the distant sound of his soft snoring.

Nevermind all that! You'll wait until the toes loosen their grip, and then slip away into the night! As you stealthily wait, you feel the toes start to move again, but any thoughts of escaped are crushed out of you as the toes clench tightly together again, rubbing your face against the giant's pale toes and pushing the air right out of your lungs. Exhausted from the brutal constriction, and intoxicated by warmth and the smell of lotion, you black out.

You awake to feel yourself shifting through the air. Your heart skips a beat as your captor's foot pushes out over the side of the bed, and then begins to descend to the floor. You scream and tuck your legs to your chest as your entire world slams into the ground. The massive toes stretch upwards, allowing you to start to slip free, only to slam back to the ground and clench again, roughly pushing your body against the ball of his foot. As the toes unclench, you look up to see the barechested giant stretching his arms up to the ceiling, only for him to bend down, his fingers resting just short of you. You weakly try to move to get his attention, but despite his grey eyes gazing down at his feet, he quickly stands straight again, ready to start his day.
155122212.title: A Royal Pain

You're feeling adventurous and decide on the scenic route. Finding an opening, you crawl underneath the stadium-sized covers and find yourself in near-darkness. It's not quite pitch black, with the occasional opening from the sides allowing trickles of light inside the 'cave', but it's definitely difficult to see where you're going. Fortunately, you only need to head forwards.

Of course, you wonder whether or not you should walk on the bed or climb up and walk across the giant himself. The covers, despite their size, was barely any weight to you, so you could easily lift it as you walked across him. 15521.content:
You wake up and the first thing you hear is loud, blaring rock music. Under normal circumstances, you would have liked waking up to rock music, but not this loud. Hell, the sound of it causes you to groan and cover your ears before anything else, and then you realize that the feeling under your body isn't the warm bed you're used to. Oh no, this is laminated hardwood. And surely this wasn't the hallway of your house...

Finally opening your eyes, you immediately see a wall of dark purple rising up in front of you, but the bottom seemed... wrinkled? Curious, you go up to it and touch it, and realize that this feels more like a bedsheet than a wall... because it is a bedsheet. You turn your head around and see what appears to be the bedroom of a giant rock music enthusiast, with posters and various string instruments hanging from the walls, and all too far up for you to even hope of touching. Not that you would touch someone's stuff without asking, but still. It was the elevation of them that mattered. There was also a purple vanity desk with a matching chair, and from the distance you could see what looked like makeup containers and a jewelry holder in the shape of bones -- from this, you could figure out this was probably a woman's room,

*Thoom.*

You hear a noise in the distance, louder than the rock music, but you can't see a door anywhere. Even if you did, it wouldn't really matter. Running into the unknown isn't a good decision.

*Thoom.*

This time, the sound was closer.

*THOOM. THOOM. THOOM.*

Not only were these noises getting closer, they were most definitely coming to this room. A click of a doorknob confirmed this.

From your position next to the bed, you can't see the supposed giantess -- yet. You decide that now is either a good time to hide or a good time to try to get noticed.
15521.title: Roxie: Poison Days, Poison on the Stage!

155211.content:
You quickly throw your head around in every direction, searching for something to hide in before the fast-approaching giant arrives. The bedsheet is covering your way to the underside of the bed, and from your position on the floor of this enormous room, there's not many hiding spots left. With quick thinking, you can only spot two within a reasonable distance - an abandoned pair of black leather high-platform boots, laying sprawled on their side, and a discarded black purse (with several stickers promoting obscure bands plastered on its side.)

The clicking of the doorknob intensifies, and you hear faint cursing as the giant seems to be having trouble with their keys. You take the oppurtunity and, just as they figure it out and open the door, you have thrown yourself into...
155211.title: Hiding from Roxie

choices: "Where did that little guy go?" She's looking for you...?
1552111.content:
You dive into the overturned black boot, retreating into the 'dark cave' from the approaching giant. From what you saw in the bedroom, you assumed that a young punk teenager was the bedroom's owner, and the inside of the enormous boot is just as you would imagine the interior of a teenager's footwear to be like - is personal hygeine really so difficult for some people? Despite the musky unpleasantness, you stay in your hiding place - you don't like the idea of the giant teenager spotting you and thinking you are some sort of insect (or some sort of pervert...)

The heavy ground-shaking footfalls continue as the giant enters the room, and through the boot's opening, you can see two humongous feet (clad in purple-and-black striped socks) stomping around. The giant is muttering with frustration under their voice (which sounds female) and seems to be looking for someone. But for what...?
1552111.title: The Shelter of Roxie's Boot

15521111.content: Now where are you I know you're around here somewhere your heart is racing as you hear her voice as she is looking for you you decide to take a look out side of the boot and you see a girl with white hair and freckles on her nose wearing a purple and blue dress over a black top and shorts you realise that it's Roxie the gym leader and the lead singer of your favourite band you also had a crush on her then you realise that she is looking right at you and she says so that's where you are before you can react she has just picked you up and is bringing you up to her face you look at her giant face and she says don't worry I'm not going to hurt you your my new

Now as my new toy you should know one thing I play rough with my toys now my little toy I'm going to flip a coin heads you get a reward tails you get punished. You watched as Roxie flipped the coin into the air then it landed in her had you saw a smile from on her face then she said it's
