15531.content: Viola, Grant, Korrina or Ramos?
15531.title: Viola / Grant / Korrina / Ramos

choices: She walks away from you, and to a sofa to rest after a battle.
She walks towards you, either to grab something, or just to pass through.
1553111.content:
You awaken... somewhere flat, hard and cold. It takes you a while to see clearly again, though you note that there is something resembling ceiling, though it appears to be very, very... very high... How odd, you've never heard of any building having a ceiling that went anywhere near that height. Just as that thought is finished, your attention lies towards that of the immediate surroundings. Everything was at a size that wouldn't fit any normal human! So, either someone had to be playing a prank in poor taste, and left you in possibly the strangest art exhibit, or...

The other possiblity seemed like something out of a nightmare. But it would make the most sense given the sheer scale of everything here. There's no way anyone would try making something that big unless they intended to use it. Comparatively, you were as big as an ant, give or take a millimeter or so, maybe...

BOOM!
BOOM!
BOOM!

Powerful noises cut through the once quiet air like a knife, each one getting louder and begin to shake the earth more and more. The loudest noise was followed almost instantly with a strong gust of wind coming from behind. Turning to see what caused the sudden winds, your eyes meet with what more or less confirms your predicament.

A woman, or at least a late teenage girl, stands at the collossal doorway, her shadow looming directly over you and reaching out for hundreds of metres in every direction. You could see her chest rise and fall rhythmically with every breath, and legs and booted feet, that kept her eyes far away from any potential beings that lied beneath her. After looking towards her face, however, you begin to recognise this girl as Viola, the gym leader of Santalune City. Your thoughts are interuptted as her feet beginning to march into the room once again, the noise and tremors worsening once again.

The only question that remains is where Viola is trying to get to...
1553111.title: Viola - The Bug Loving Photographer

1553121.content: You find yourself waking from a deep sleep, aching all over and ringing in your eyes. You groan as you get to your feet, and as your vision clears, you look around your surroundings. You stop in shock as you are not where you used to be. It's gigantic in scale, so enormous that you imagine its occupants would be living giants... or perhaps you've shrunken down to a tiny size? Whichever is the case, you seem to be in a humongous...
1553121.title: Korrina: The Evolution Master

choices: ...booming footsteps. The giant is coming into the room!
...loud snoring. The giant is asleep in the bed!
15531211.content:
You appear to be in a gigantic bedroom, lying in the middle of a forest of orange carpet fibers. Aside from the usual furniture you would expect (albeit at a dizzyingly large scale) you can see posters of Fighting-type Pokemon and television shows that you don't recognize. Additionally, you can see lifting weights and sweatbands abandoned around the room, along with a pair of well-worn rollerskate boots lying discarded by the side of the bed. The mountainous wardrobe in the room is slightly open, and you can spot several women's clothing within, so you can guess the room's occupant is female.

Speaking of the room's occupant, you hear something in the distance. It sounds like...
15531211.title: Korrina's Bedroom

choices: You decide to hitch a ride in her skate.
You don't want to risk it and decide to move on.
15531212.content:
You seem to be in a humongous skating park, which can only mean one thing. Uh Oh.

As anyone else would, you realize your standing right in the middle of a skate park, which means unaware people skating along. You quickly get up on you feet and run to the nearest exit, which is a slope. You'll have to climb up it. You run up until it gets too steep then you hold on with all of your might, hoping somebody won't come along and crush you. Just when you think that, a girl wearing roller skates quickly comes along, you have no choice but to let go before you get flattened (or worse, sliced). You look up and recognize the the girl as none other than Korrina: The Evolution Master.

You quickly fall back to the ground, get up, and try again. This time, you're successful. You run up to the shade behind a brick seat near the skate house and quickly lie down and regain your breath. The ground is extremely hot, so you jump back up. Then you see Korrina again, she's out of breath, and getting up to go back inside. She sits down on the seat you're hiding behind. She rests for a second, and then leans down to take off her shoes. She unties the laces of her right shoe, then takes off the skate, revealing her sock with a stripe of red on the near toe and near bottom sole. She then takes her sock off, revealing her bare foot. She has a size 9 with medium long red painted toes.

She puts her sock down and begins to untie her other skate. You figure this is your chance to hitch a ride in her right skate. Although it is a risk due to you due to her ability to easily put it back on. But you remember that you only have so much time, and you might not be able to stay hidden for very much longer.
15531212.title: Just Rolling Along

155312121.content:
A bit hungry, knowing it would only be so long until you're found, you decide to hitch a ride in Korrina's skate, thinking she wouldn't put them on as she's done skating. You quickly and quietly sneak over to her skate, evading the vision of any other giants. You slowly walk in to the dark cave known as Korrina's roller skate.

You identify the wall and her sole, and when you press it, it comes back up, due to it being made of memory foam. After a few seconds, you finally reach the toe. you slowly lay down, preventing yourself from moving the skate, and rest for a second. And that's when you wish you had remembered that the ground was very hot outside. You feel the boot rumbling and moving, you fall down to the hole of the skate, and hoping that she can't see you, you see Korrina's big foot coming straight for you. you try to climb up the shoe but it's too late. You're pushed to the toe of the shoe. Your head pinned underneath Korrina's five wiggling toes, and the rest of your body pinned underneath her upper sole.

Korrina begins to walk and with each step, you're pushed down and the memory foam pops back up just for your face and her toes to be reunited. This goes on for about 15 more minutes until it finally stops. You sigh a sigh of relief until you fell her foot once again pressing into you. She's driving. Knowing it's hopeless but still willing to try, you open your mouth and scream "Hey, Down Here!" For that you get one of her toes in your mouth. Later, you are able to turn your back to her foot. Just then you feel her walking again she stops. You feel her foot finally coming off of you. You look out of her boot and you realize where you are.
155312121.title: A Long Uncomfortable Ride

15532.content: Clemont, Valerie, Olympia or Wulfric?
15532.title: Clemont / Valerie / Olympia / Wulfric

1553212.content:
You have a vague memory of flashing lights and laughter, but it swiftly disappears as you gain consciousness, dazed and confused. Groaning from lethargy, you bring yourself to your feet, and notice the smell of incense and nature around you. This is not what your bedroom smells like, and with a fresh state of alarm surging in your veins, you look around at your strange new surroundings.

You appear to be in a...
1553212.title: Valerie, the Fairy Maiden

choices: Go limp and pretend you are a doll.
Get ready to run the moment she opens the house.
15532122.content:
It seems like an ordinary house - a bedroom, specifically - but something seems off. All the furniture lacks the finer details, like everything was made with broad strokes, and you can't hear the usual ambiance of pipes or electricity in the walls. Uncomfortable with this strange new scenario and its deathly quiet, you venture outside the room.

You explore the rest of the house, only to find the same "can't quite put my finger on what's wrong" feeling with the furniture and the walls. There's nobody else here, either. The kitchen is devoid of any food, and the television in the living room is just a prop. What is going on?

As you sigh in frustration, you finally decide to peer through the window. While it's difficult to discern at first, you can see other houses around a large expanse, but they seem to be on... giant tables? You look up towards the sun to get your bearings, only to find an enormous lampshade covering it.

Is this a dollhouse...?

Far away, you hear a heavy creaking - a door has swung open, and given how it sounded, it was to the same scale as the tables 'outside.' Through the window, you can see a figure approaching, and she is enormous. Clad in a strange dress-like attire with blends of pink and yellow, complete with high-platform boots and an assortment of hair decorations, the woman begins to approach your 'home.'

You panic with the surrealness of the situation, and quickly try to think of what to do, as the dollhouse's owner draws near and prepares to open it up and look inside...
15532122.title: Valerie, Your New Owner

choices: "Hm, I don't remember getting this doll..."
155321221.content:
Instinctively, you flop on the ground and go limp, playing dead. You figure that you could pass for a doll at your current size. Granted, you aren't wearing the 'fancy attire' you would expect from a 'resident' of this dollhouse, but it still seems like a better idea than just panicking and running around in circles.

You lay on the ground motionless, and then the house seems to be ripped open as the whole front wall folds away, revealing your 'landlady' - a massive woman with eeriely black eyes and skin like a porcelain doll. She's wearing a flamboyant pink dress and her black hair seeps around her shoulders. Her beauty would be almost captivating if she wasn't so unnerving to you (what with the whole 'being incredibly big' thing.)

The woman glances around the dollhouse, and you think those unsettling eyes of her rest on you for a little longer than usual...
155321221.title: Playing Pretend with Valerie

Your mind feels wafer-thin and watery, and as your senses begin to return you as you sit up, you begin to realize that you are not where you used to be. Wherever you are, it's... enormous. Either this place is built for giants, or you must be the size of an insect, but whichever is the case, you now find yourself in a tremendously large...
15533112.title: Siebold, the Cuisine Connoisseur

155331122.content:
While the scale skews your perception, your brain finally clicks as to where you are - a kitchen (though vastly more enormous than you are used to.) It's not your kitchen, either - it's far too ornate and clean, with more cupboards and drawers in its architecture than most people had in their whole home. The counter, stretching outwards around you, seems smoothed down with a perfectionist's personal touch, and not a drop or smudge of anything can be seen anywhere. The sink is as deep as a large swimming pool, the appliances (like the toaster and the microwave) resemble futuristic buildings, a wide plate is laid out with a fresh salad that could feed you for weeks, and a knife lodged into a cutting board sends shivers down your spine - it could cleave a train in two with ease.

The silence of the gigantic kitchen is broken as you hear the jingling of keys and a door opening far away. You assume that the owner is returning! You initially hesitate, unsure of how to act - perhaps they will be friendly? Perhaps they will not? After some deliberation, and as the footsteps of the approaching giant grow louder, you decide to...
155331122.title: In Siebold's Kitchen

155332.content:
You awake uneasy and wearily, and your whole body aches. You groan as your dulled senses return to normal, and you pick yourself off the hard ground to see where you are.

It's a shock when you realize that it's not just a bedroom you don't recognize, but an enormous bedroom you don't recognize. Furniture looms above you, like wonders of the world, the walls feel like they are beyond the horizon, and the ceiling might as well be the sky. Aside from the insane surrealism of its scale, you also notice how high-class and exquisite the bedroom itself is, from the immaculately clean pearl-white carpet 'field' to the silver-lined mirror on the wall and the delicately-patterned wallpaper. Strangely, you notice, far above on a mountainous desk, several Pokeballs lying on its surface. This seems like a room fit for royalty... But of course, if the room is this large, then...

Your thought is finished for you as you feel vibrations in the carpet fibers, as they bristle in response. They come steadily, and each one is just a little bit stronger than the last. It's something big approaching.

You look around for any hiding places, but to no avail - all of the furniture is laid straight on the floor, with nowhere to crawl under, and even the underside of the king-size bed is obscured by bedsheets so massive, they drape straight over both sides and down to the ground. It might as well be a cliff to you (albeit a very soft one.)

Any other plans you could have concocted are thrown straight out the proverbial window when the door opens, and the source of the tremors reveals herself to you, in all of her gigantic glory...
155332.title: Diantha, the Kalos Champion

choices: Her nightgown. She's going to sleep
1553321.content: A huge women walked into the room, wearing all white with gold trimmings. It's Diantha! From your perspective, she was stunningly beautiful. Her blue eyes sparkled and her smiled shined back. She might be able to help you with your current size, but you don't know how she might react. You felt the room shake again as she approaches you. It looked like she doesn't see you, until you realized you were in front of her wardrobe. You scurried towards one of the wardrobes legs and hid behind one (and you thought there was no place to hide). She reached the wardrobe and opened it revealing tons of white clothing. Diantha took of her scarf and placed it into the wardrobe and took out....
1553321.title: The Giant Beauty

15533211.content:
Diantha took out a white nightgown which had the same gold trim as her normal attire. She took off her clothing, revealing her naked body. You wanted to look away and give her privacy, but the temptation was too strong. Your eyes scanned her body from her gorgeous breasts, to her exposed woman-hood. She later pulled up a new pair of panties and putted on her nightgown. She climbed into bed and turned off the lights. You had two choices:

1. You could climb the bed and explore her body.

2. Diantha's door was still a bit opened. You could her voices coming from outside.
15533211.title: Gorgeous body

choices: Try and get the Gardevoir's attention.
1553322.content:
While easy to mistake for a human, the gigantic figure that enters the room is certainly a Pokemon, albeit one that would remind most people of feminine grace with its white 'dress' and green 'hair'. In fact, as impressive as they are under normal circumstances, they are made even more magnificent at such a grand scale. Their white legs reaching upwards like ivory towers (partially hidden behind their 'dress'), their long slender arms being large enough to pluck people in their soft hand like a gentle guardian...

In fact, you spend so much time admiring the Gardevoir that it takes a while for your eyes to reach the top, where you finally notice that the Gardevoir's large eyes are situated straight ahead, and as it takes a gargantuan (yet somehow dainty) step into the room, you realize that being in the middle of the room isn't a wise idea right now. Fortunately (or unfortunately) the tall exquisite carpet mostly hides your form, and it seems that the Gardevoir hasn't immediately sensed you with its psychic powers - perhaps it needs to actively know you are there first?

Then again, do you even want this Pokemon noticing you? Gardevoirs are traditionally kind to humans, but it might not even recognize you as a human (and instead, possibly a snack...?)
1553322.title: The Giant Gardevoir

15533221.content:
You decide to try and get the Pokemon's attention. Gardevoirs are known for their gentle and understanding nature. Well, most Gardevoirs...

You make your best effort to jump up and down, waving your arms, shouting out, and doing anything else that comes to mind for getting the attention of a skyscraper-sized Pokemon (which is, believe it or not, uncommon to you.) The Pokemon continues to move, stepping forward and shaking the earth once more as, with another magnificent footstep, its pearl-white sole meets the ground, and for a moment, you're worried that she's in a trance or just not very attentive. However, the Gardevoir seems to halt for a moment, and then after a tense silence, those large crimson eyes drift down to spot you on the floor.

The Gardevoir approaches you slowly, and despite being so monumental in stature, her new efforts to walk lightly are actually quite effective - there's only a slight tremble when her feet hit the ground now. (You wonder why she doesn't just float, but it's not important.) As if approaching a strange new animal (which, to her, you might as well be), she cautiously comes closer, now dominating most of your view as she looms over you. You now begin to notice a slight aura emanating from the Gardevoir, and it's...
15533221.title: Noticed by Gardevoir

155332211.content:
The Gardevoir radiates with a blue light that makes you feel at ease. Slowly, it crouches down to inspect you more closely, while still trying to keep a distance from you so as not to be too frightening with its sheer size. You are somewhat paralyzed by indecision at it watches you with its bright red eyes, and you can feel a faint tickling sensation in the back of your head... Is she reading your mind...?

Seemingly content with whatever she was doing, the Gardevoir then focuses her eyes ever-so-slightly on you, and you find yourself enveloped by the same strange aura, and lifted from the ground. You hover in the air and feel your stomach turning upside-down as she slowly lifts you through the air, before letting you fall gently onto her open hand. It feels warm and immaculate, and it is very comforting - she even cups her fingers just a little to make sure you won't fall off. Despite her enormity, you can getting the sensation that this Gardevoir doesn't have a mean bone in its body.

The Gardevoir...
155332211.title: The Gentle Gardevoir

1553322112.content: Where the Gardevoir takes you?
1553322112.title: ...silently takes you elsewhere.

choices: ...raises one of its feet to stomp on you!
...picks you up in its telepathic grasp and brings you towards its mouth!
155332212.content:
The towering Gardevoir, casting a huge shadow across you, was already intimidating, but as red energy seeps around its being, you realize that it's worse than that. Normally, Gardevoirs are gentle creatures, but perhaps it views you as an intruder or an unknown, and feels endangered or protective of its owner. Whatever the case, you feel your knees wobbling and sweat running down your forehead as you realize that this gigantic psychic creature doesn't view you as a friend, and you don't exactly have a lot of escape routes...

The giant Pokemon's red eyes bare down on you as, in its silent judgement, the Gardevoir...
155332212.title: The Not-So-Gentle Gardevoir

choices: She doesn't squash you, and instead plays with you with her feet.
1553322121.content:
Gardevoirs are meant to be graceful and peaceful creatures, but the sight of this towering Pokemon raising one of her feet above you makes you think that there might be exceptions to this rule.

You sprint away in immediate fear as the Gardevoir's foot come crashing down, slamming into the ground. Despite the softness of both the carpet and the Gardevoir's sole, it feels like the earth is splitting apart as she stomps down. She chases after you (causing more vibrations with each booming steps) and plants one of her feet in front of your path. causing you to hit the brakes and change direction to avoid slamming into the snow-white wall of her ankle. Every time you seem to gain some distance, she blocks your path once more or goes for the mortal blow again, with only your quick reflexes and a great amount of luck saving you from being caught beneath her foot.

Unfortunately, it's a futile effort to escape the Gardevoir when she is so large compared to you, and soon enough, you feel yourself exhausted and cornered by the malevolent Pokemon. As your heart feels like it's going to burst out of your chest, she raises her huge foot above you and you feel a cold shadow engulf you as it approaches...
1553322121.title: Gardevoir Used Stomp

15533221211.content:
There was no hope. You knew it when you looked into her eyes. Her cold, uncaring gaze sent shivers down your spine so bad, you were slightly glad when her foot moved over, and blotted out her face behind its milky white sole. Only slightly, though, as now you had another terrifying view to deal with.

The foot came down slowly, agonizingly so. You wondered what the reasoning behind that could be, because it's not like you had anything better to do in your current state. It couldn't have been just from her trying to be thorough with her work. You wondered if perhaps Gardevoir was just trying to entertain herself as much as she possibly could with an action as boring and mundane as squashing a bug. Because you had to remember, that's what you were to her. Whether she recognized you as a human or not, it didn't matter to her in the slightest. You were nothing but a minuscule miscreant, violating her master's room with your mere presence. Such offense demanded a punishment, and Gardevoir was ready to provide it in the form of her life-crushing foot.

Finally, her sole came to rest directly above you, her heel coming down beside your legs. The ball of her foot hanged above your head, sprinkled with dust stuck to the sweaty flesh of her sole. The chase had a small toll on her as well, it seemed, thought you were now paying for it more than her, as the potent scent coming off her feet assaulted your senses.
By craning your neck, you were able to take a look at her pudgy toes. You expected them to hang dormant, stiff as the rest of her sole, but instead they were wide awake, so to speak. Gardevoir was clenching them, unclenching them, wiggling them all over the place, a clear sigh that she found this situation highly stimulating. Not really all that surprising, come to think of it. Gardevoir or not, she was the local champion's ace. Fighting and dominating the opposition was in her blood. To have her foe reduced to such a sorry state, hopelessly waiting for her foot to come down and snuff it out of existence... Such rush of power no other battle could provide. She'll miss this feeling greatly, but there was a task to carry out, and she will not fail.

Your end came swiftly. With a mighty stomp, her foot came down like a hammer, instantly recuding your diminutive body into a sad, red puddle. Oh, what a lovely feeling it was for Gardevoir, your little body popping immediately into mush under the awesome power that was her sole. Blinded by the adrenaline, Diantha's ace Pokemon rose her heels off the ground, at least doubling the pressure exterted on what was left of your body. She began grinding her foot left and right, somehow making your already two-dimensional form even flatter. She was literally squeezing as much enjoyment out of you as she possibly could.

After 2 minutes of this, Gardevoir finally came to her senses, and stopped. She moved her foot out of the way, cringing a little at the sorry state she left you in. WIth her psychic powers, she drew a few tissues, and cleaned your remains off the floor, as well as what got stuck to sole. Without even looking at the trash bin, she threw you out with perfect accuracy, and made her way out of the room, ready to continue her daily routine.
15533221211.title: Critical Hit! You blacked out...

choices: Suddenly, you are spat out, and you hear a voice. "Gardevoir, how dare you!"
There's no deus ex machina - Gardevoir swallows you whole.
1553322122.content:
The Gardevoir's eyes burn brightly with a strange purple light, and suddenly you feel your muscles seize up and turn rigid, leaving you paralyzed! You struggle to regain control of your body, but whether it is because of its size or its power, you cannot overcome the Gardevoir's psychic hold. With laughable ease, it raises you from the ground with just its thoughts alone, giving you an feeling of vertigo as you see the floor disappear further and further away, and you ascend higher and higher into the air. Past the Pokemon's legs, past her stomach, past its chest, and finally held in place just above its head.

You hear the Pokemon's stomach grumble slightly, and you gulp. Intelligent as it may be, a Gardevoir is a Pokemon, and Pokemon will take whatever food they can when they are hungry...

While you still try and struggle against the telekinetic grasp, the Gardevoir opens its mouth wide, with you dangling just above it. You feel its breath wash over you as it gives you an intricate view of its tongue, waiting to be placated by her tiny meal, and her dark throat, leading to her belly and an unpleasant demise. Your efforts to break free continue, but to no avail. Without warning, the psychic hold is released... dropping you straight into the Pokemon's inviting maw.

As you pass the Gardevoir's lips, it tilts its head back down, causing you to land in a heap on the large, saliva-coated tongue. The tongue writhes and wriggles with your taste, the Pokemon clearly enjoying your flavor for whatever reason. You quickly struggle to escape, but the Gardevoir easily closes its mouth, shutting you in darkness. The tongue continues to 'play' with you, and your efforts to fight back only seem to make the Gardevoir even more pleased with its meal. Finally, amidst the dark nightmare that you are trapped in, you feel the world tilt once more, and you realize that the Gardevoir is going to make you slide down its tongue and straight down its throat...
1553322122.title: Gardevore

Or give up and live inside of her?
15533221222212.content: The Gardevoir seemed to enjoy eating you. However, you are immune to her insides, so you now live inside her. You do not want to though, and you need to get out. What do you do?
15533221222212.title: Living inside Gardevoir (you live and are immun...

15533222.content:
You decide that you want nothing to do with this gigantic Pokemon - you don't even know if it'll be friendly or not! Unfortunately, despite the enormity of the room (or perhaps because of it) you have very few hiding spots to utilize, other than the underside of the furniture. With the bed being too far away, you opt for running to the safe shadows of the dresser's underbelly, and you immediately begin your run.

As you do, the Gardevoir wanders around the room, seemingly looking for something. Its footfalls threaten to knock you off balance, and it's only by a stroke of good luck that her path doesn't cross you for most of your sprint - you have little doubts about what'll happen to you if one of those massive white soles slam down on you, whether it be by accident or not. You move as fast as you can through the carpet fibers, all while the Gardevoir continues its search.

Just as you are nearing the dresser, the Gardevoir turns and wanders near you, her feet stomping dangerously close to you. You feel a cold shadow on your back, and in a fit of desperation, you quickly throw yourself in a random direction, just before the giant Pokemon finishes its step...
15533222.title: Hiding from Gardevoir

info.brief_description: The Gym Leaders, Elite Four, and Champions of Pokemon are in for a small surprise - you.
info.description:
UPDATE: I've added the Kalos league, as of request. Unfortunately, I've had to sort of squeeze them at the end, due to how options become more limited as chapters progress, so you might have to dive through some chapters to get to the late-game characters. My sincerest apologies to Diantha fans.

NOTES AND RULES:

1a) All the characters - not just the female ones - are included to cater to readers regardless of sexuality or gender.
1b) Because of the possible variety in readers, please try to write in the second person, as in "you take the time to read the rules because you are smart and you deserve a cookie."
2a) Try to avoid excessive sex or violence. The item should be as open as possible. Be sensible (i.e. some nudity or some blood is fine, rape or dismemberment is not).
2b) If the character is possibly underage, no sexual content whatsoever. To my knowledge, this includes: Bugsy, Tate, Liza, Maylene, Iris and Clemont. If there is confirmed sources stating a character here is of consenting age, please message me and I'll correct this.
3) No scatological material, and no sexual content involving Pokemon (non-sexual interaction is fine, though.) Descriptions of scents should be kept at a minimum.
4) Whether or not the reader character has knowledge of the character or Pokemon in general is up to you.
5) New chapters should be at least a paragraph or so, though that's not a set rule.
6) The death of the reader is allowed, as long as it is avoidable (i.e. do not create a one-option-only path that leads to death.)

Other than that, have fun.
